texts.es: María Luisa de treinta y nueve años de edad vive junto a sus cuatro hijos; ella se dedica al cultivo de maíz y frijol, tiene varios años de dedicarse a la agricultura y se  ha hecho de mucha experiencia que le permite siempre obtener las mejores cosechas, el terreno de siembra está ubicado en un cantón cercano a la localidad donde reside, comercia en todas las zonas aledañas y ya tiene mucha clientela pues saben que todo lo que vende es de muy buena calidad y a precios realmente accesibles además se caracteriza por el buen servicio; María es una mujer visionaria y muy  trabajadora siempre está a la expectativa de nuevas oportunidades que la acerquen a un futuro mejor, en la cosecha anterior tuvo pérdidas debido al mal clima y en esta temporada 2012 quiere recuperarse, quiere invertir para aumentar la producción pero necesita de capital por eso solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar semilla de maíz, frijol, fertilizante, insecticida, etc. María Luisa tiene buenas referencias crediticias, está segura que podrá saldar la deuda y a la vez tiene la esperanza que podrá darle a su familia una vida mejor.
texts.en: María Luisa is thirty nine years old. She lives with her four children. She grows corn and beans and has a lot of experience, which allows her to obtain the best harvests. Her cropland is located in a canton near to the place she lives. She sells innearby communities and has a lot of customers because they know that what she sells is of a good quality and at really accesible prices. She is also known for having good service. María is a visionary and very hardworking woman. She is always awaiting new opportunities for a better future. With the previous harvest she experienced some losses due to bad weather and she wants to recover now in 2012. She wants to invest to increase production but she needs capital. That is why she is asking INTEGRAL for a loan that will allow her to buy corn and bean seeds, fertilizer, insecticide, etc. María Luisa has a good credit history. She is sure that she can pay off the debt and hopes that she can give her family a better life.

loans.use: to buy corn and bean seeds, fertilizer and insecticide.

loans.name: Mariam

texts.en:
Mariam is a 43-year-old married woman.  She is a mother of 3 children and she lives in Al Aqaba, Jordan.

Mariam is seeking a loan of 500 JOD so she can buy new furniture for her home and improve her home living conditions.

loans.use: to buy new furniture and improve her home living conditions

loans.name: Haleema

texts.en:
Haleema is a 57-year-old married woman who is the mother of three children. She lives in Al Hashmi, Amman, Jordan.

Haleema is requesting a loan of 700 JOD to buy more quantities of cosmetics, accessories, and makeup to sell. She hopes that her income will increase so she will be able to open a showroom in her home.

loans.use: to buy cosmetics, accessories, and makeup to sell

loans.name: Marwan

texts.en:
Marwan is a 30-year-old single man living in Al Salt, Jordan.

Marwan is requesting a 600 JOD loan to fix his home and improve his living conditions. In the future, he wants to add more rooms to his home.

loans.use: to fix his home and improve his living conditions

loans.name: Nawar

texts.en:
Nawar is a 38-year-old married woman.  She is a mother of 1 child and she lives in Al Russeifeh, Jordan.

Nawar is seeking a loan of 400 JOD so she can fix her home and improve her living conditions.

loans.use: to fix her home and improve her living conditions

loans.name: Fekra

texts.en:
Fekra is a 49-year-old divorced woman who lives in Al Hashmi, Amman, Jordan.

Fekra is requesting a 500 JOD loan to buy more quantities of cosmetics to sell. In the future, she hopes that her income will increase and her social level will be better.

loans.use: to buy cosmetics to sell

loans.name: Morad

texts.en:
Morad is a 38-year-old married man who has one child. He lives in Al Hashmi, Amman, Jordan.

Morad is requesting a 700 JOD loan to fix his home and improve his living conditions. He hopes to make his home a better place to live for his family.

loans.use: to improve his home and living conditions

loans.name: Sabah

texts.en:
Sabah is a 22-year-old single woman who lives in Al Karak, Jordan. She is under 30 years old and she qualifies for a youth loan.

Sabah is requesting a 600 JOD loan to buy more quantities of clothes to sell. She hopes that her income will increase.

loans.use: to buy clothes to sell

loans.name: Amenah

texts.en:
Amenah is a 58-year-old married woman. She is a mother of 2 children and she lives in Baqa'a, Jordan.

Amenah is seeking a loan of 500 JOD so she can improve her home living conditions and make it more comfortable.

loans.use: to improve her home living conditions

loans.name: Nancy

texts.en:
Nancy is 28 years old and she lives in the airport community. She  is married and her husband works as security personnel. They have two children ages 3 and 7 that live at home; the oldest one attends school. 

For the past seven  years Nancy has been selling rice, oil, peppers and onions in the local market. She has many customers and she makes a good profit because she always sings in her market. Her customers really enjoy her way of selling. She  learned  the technique from friends. 

Nancy is requesting a loan to purchase more rice, oil, peppers, onions, soaps, grass and others items for her business. Her dream is to buy a piece of land and build a house.

loans.use: to purchase more rice, oil, peppers, onions, soaps, grass, and others items for her business.

loans.name: Korpo

texts.en:
Korpo is 49 years old and is married with four children between the ages of 25 to 35. They all live on their own and attend school. 

For the past 25 years she has run a table market where she sells oil, peppers, salt, onions, batteries and others items in her community. She started this business with money given to her by her husband and learned this way of selling from her mother. She is appreciative of her business. 

Her plan is to build a house. She is requesting a loan to purchase more  oil, peppers, salt, onions, batteryies and others items for her business.

loans.use: to purchase more  oil, peppers, salt, onions, batteries and others items for her business.

loans.name: Siah

texts.en:
Siah  is 20 years old and is married with two children, ages six months and three years. She lives in the airport community. For the past two years, she has been operating a business where she sells body cream, candles and other items. Siah's major business challenge is that she doesn't have enough income. She started her business selling cold water and she learned the business from her mother.

Siah is requesting a loan to purchase more body cream, powder, candles, and other items to sell. In the future, she hopes to build a house and send her children to school.

loans.use: to purchase body cream, powder, candles, and other items for her  business

loans.name: Mоriya

texts.ru: Мория воспитывалась в хорошей среднестатистической семье. С мужем  жизнь не сложилась и они решили развестись. После развода воспитывает троих детей одна. Её дети очень любят и слушаются свою мать. Сама Мория занимается торговлей обуви. Она торгует в центральном базаре города Кургантюбе. Она торгует там  уже более  шести лет. Её дети активно  помогают ей в её деятельности. Сейчас она подумывает об приобретении новой партии сезонной обуви а также просто разнообразить  свой ассортимент. Мория надеется, что вы поможете ей с займом.
texts.en:
Moriya was raised in a good, normal family. Her life with her husband did not work out, and they decided to get a divorce. After the divorce she is raising three children by herself. Her children love their mother very much and obey her.

Moriya works with selling shoes. She trades at the central market of the city Kurgantyube. She has been trading there for more than six years. Her children are actively involved in helping her in the business. 

Currently Moriya is thinking of buying a new batch of seasonal shoes, as well as simply broadening her assortment. Moriya hopes that you will help her with the loan.

loans.use: to purchase seasonal shoes and broaden her assortment

loans.name: Aminata

texts.en:
Aminata is 25 years old and lives in the Air Port Community with her husband and children. All of her children are in school and range between two and six years old. For the past six years, Aminata has been making soap to sell in the local market. Her aunt taught her how to make and sell soap and she has been able to expand her business from selling soap to selling used clothes. It has been two years since she started selling used clothing. Aminata is now making a greater profit and she is popular.

Aminata is requesting a loan to buy more used clothes for her business. In the future, her plans is to expand her business even more.

loans.use: to buy used clothes for her business

loans.name: Kebbeh

texts.en:
Kebbeh is 42 years old, married and lives with her five children.  Three children attend school. Her husband is a contractor.

Fort the past 28 years Kebbeh has been involved in business and currently she sells palm oil. She walks to reach the village to buy palm oil for her business since cars and bikes can not reach the village. She likes how her customers are waiting for her when she brings the palm oil. She enjoys how supportive she is to her family. 

She is requesting a loan to purchase more palm oil for her business. Her plan is to build a house.

loans.use: to purchase more palm oil for her business.

loans.name: Nabeeha

texts.en:
Nabeeha is a 38-year-old married woman. She is a mother of 3 children and she lives in Al Salt, Jordan.

Nabeeha is seeking a loan of 1100 JOD so she can buy more material and supplies for flower arranging. She wants to open her own flower shop in the future.

loans.use: to buy material and supplies for flower arranging

loans.name: Felecia

texts.en:
Felecia is 36 years old and married with three children between the ages of one and 16. She lives in the area of the Airport. Two of her children are attending school and they all live at home. Felecia's husband is a businessman. For the past 12 years, Felecia has been  running a charcoal business. She enjoys her business and makes a lot of profit.

Felecia is requesting a loan to purchase more charcoal to sell. She hopes to build a house for her children and expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase charcoal to sell

loans.name: Mariam

texts.en:
Mariam is a 49-year-old married woman.  She is a mother of 4 children and she lives in Irbid, Jordan

Mariam is seeking a loan of 500 JOD so she can fix her home and improve her home living conditions.

loans.use: to fix her home and improve her home living conditions

loans.name: Ricardo Antonio

texts.es: Ricardo Antonio vive junto a su esposa e hijos, por quienes el trabaja muy duro día con día, Juan se dedica a trabajar como albañil y así mismo a la siembra de frijoles y maíz, el cual vende junto a su esposa. Debido a las fuertes tormentas que arrasaron al país el año pasado, Ricardo perdió por completo su cosecha la cual había trabajado con mucho esfuerzo junto a su familia, es por esta razón que él solicita un préstamo a INTEGRAL, con el deseo de rescatar sus parcelas y de esta forma iniciar una vez más a sembrar los granos básicos que durante tantos años han sido los que le han permitido llevar el sustento diario a su hogar, con el préstamo Ricardo comprará todos los insumos necesarios como semillas, pesticidas, abono y más.
texts.en: Ricardo Antonio lives with his wife and children for whom he works very hard day after day. Juan earns a living as a construction worker and also grows beans and corn which he sells with his wife's help. Because of the harsh storms that assailed the country last year, Ricardo lost his entire harvest into which he had put so much effort alongside his family. Therefore he is seeking a loan from Integral in hopes of rescuing his land and so once more to plant the staple crops which have allowed him to provide daily sustenance to his household for so many years. With the loan Ricardo will buy all the necessary supplies such as seeds, pesticides, fertilizer and other items.

loans.use: to purchase seeds, pesticides and fertilizer.

loans.name: Yusra

texts.en:
Yusra is a conservative woman. She is unwilling to upload her photo on internet. The photo is of her husband

Yusra is a 39-years-old married woman. She lives in Jordan. She is a mother of 6 children.

Yusra is asking for a loan of 1000 JOD so she can improve her home living conditions, buy some new furniture and renovate it. She wants to build more rooms.

loans.use: to improve her home living conditions.

loans.name: Patience

texts.en:
Patience is a 25-year-old lady who lives in the Airport area with her husband and children. Her children are in school. For the past seven years, Patience has been involved in a palm oil business and she is presently selling slippers at the local market. She was helped by a friend to start her business.

Patience is requesting a loan to purchase more slippers for her business. In the future, she hopes to build a new home for her children.

loans.use: to purchase more slippers to sell

loans.name: Khadra

texts.en:
Khadra is a 56-years-old widowed woman. She is responsible for 8 family members. She lives in Jordan.

Khadra is requesting a loan of 500 JOD so she can cover her son's wedding costs.

loans.use: to cover her son's wedding costs.

loans.name: Winifred

texts.en:
Winifred is 33 years old and is married with three children between the ages of four and 15 who live with her and attend school. She lives in the airport community. Winifred stopped her education after the 8th grade. For the past ten years, she has been selling dried fish at the local market and her husband helps with the business. Winifred's major business challenge is a shortage of goods since she doesn't have a permanent store. She likes her business because it provides for her needs. 

Winifred is requesting a loan to purchase dried fish to expand their business. In the future, she plans to educate her children and build a house.

loans.use: to purchase dried fish to sell

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy materials to install electricity.

loans.name: Ernesto

texts.en:
Ernesto is 29 years old and still single. He currently lives with his parent. Ernesto just finished a high school level  education due to lack of financial support. As the second child of the family, he is responsible for taking care of their family corn field because the eldest and his other brother have both been married.

Ernesto bears in mind that he is the only one who can help his parent so, doing his best, he patiently runs their two hectares of corn field.

Ernesto wanted a loan amounting to PHP30,000, allowing him to buy certified seed, pesticides and other farm supplies needed for his corn field. He hopes to get a good harvest this next crop season to be able to gain a higher income and be able to sustain the family's basic necessities.

loans.use: to buy certified seed, pesticides and other farm supplies needed for his corn field

loans.name: Alfredo

texts.en:
Romeo is a responsible father who is engages in a hog-raising business to generate income. He aims to improve the family's standard of living to give his family a better life. Despite the hardships and difficulties he has encountered, he has the determination to achieve his goal in life. 

He has been a farmer for almost 30 years and usually earns a profit of PHP20,000 from his farming business. He plans to improve his hog-raising business to increase his earnings. Due to inadequate capital, he is requesting a loan of PHP50,000 to buy feed, vitamins and additional piglets to raise. He believes that his loan will enable him to make an improvement in the business and is hoping that he will become successful in the future.

loans.use: to buy feed, vitamins and additional piglets to raise

loans.name: Ramón Alfonso

texts.es: Ramón Alfonso vive junto a su compañera de vida, él se dedica al cultivo de granos básicos, maíz y frijol, tiene varios años de trabajar en la agricultura y se ha hecho de mucha experiencia que le permite mejorar la calidad de sus siembras día con día, el terreno está ubicado en una zona de alta incidencia agrícola y muy cercano a la localidad donde reside, comercia en las zonas aledañas y se ha hecho de  mucha clientela pues saben que todo lo  que vende es de muy buena calidad y a precios accesibles además el servicio es excelente; Ramón es un hombre visionario, con muchas ganas de salir adelante, debido a la época de lluvia tuvo pérdidas en su última cosecha y en esta temporada quiere recuperarse, necesita invertir en insumos por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar semilla de maíz, frijol, herbicida, fertilizante, herramientas, etc. Ramón tiene una moral intachable y es de muy buena paga asegura que podrá cancelar el financiamiento y a la vez podrá darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Ramón Alfonso lives with his life partner and makes a living growing basic grains, corn and beans. He has been working in agriculture for several years and has garnered a lot of experience which has helped him to improve the quality of his crops from day to day. The plot of land is located in a highly-developed agricultural area very near to where he lives. He sells in neighboring areas and has attracted a large customer base as they know that everything he sells is of an excellent quality, at accessible prices and the service is excellent. 

Ramón is a visionary man, with a keen desire to get ahead; as a result of the rainy season, he suffered losses during his most recent harvest and he wants to recover in this season. He needs to invest in basic supplies, which is why he has sought a loan from Integral to buy corn seeds, beans, herbicides, fertilizers and tools, etc. Ramón is a person of high moral standing and has a good repayment history. He states that he will be able to repay the loan and at the same time, offer his family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy corn seeds, beans, herbicides, fertilizers and tools.

loans.name: Hannah

texts.en:
Hannah is 32 years old and lives in the Airport community.  She has three children between 4 to 16 years old, they are attending school and live at home.  Her husband is a businessman.

For the past seven years Hannah has been selling rice in the market.  She is respected in her family and is also a mother in a supportive home.  One of the business problems she is facing is that she doesn't have a good location for her selling place. She is requesting a loan to purchase more rice for her business. Her plans are to expand her business and build her house.

loans.use: to purchase more rice for her business

loans.name: Noly

texts.en:
Noly has been growing corn crops on his three hectares of corn field. He has been doing this for 25 years. With the long period of time that he has devoted to his corn field, he has been able to improve their way of living. He is happily married to Marissa and they have three under school-aged children. 

Noly has successfully paid back his previous loan. At this time, he is asking for new loan amount of PHP50,000 which will be use to buy farm inputs and to pay for hired labor tol plant and prepare the corn field plot. He hopes for continuous access to the financial services of KIVA lenders through ASKI. He hopes to maintain his farming business in order for him to gain more profits, which will enable him to keep producing healthy corn crops. In this way, he can sell his yield to buyers who can pay a higher price.

In the future, Noly expects more yields to harvest, so that he can send his children to a higher level of education and provide for the needs of his family.

loans.use: to buy farm inputs and to pay for hired labor to plant and prepare the corn field plot.

loans.name: Mario

texts.en:
Mario is a hard working and optimistic person. His main priority is to send his two children to higher levels of education. To make his goal a reality, he devotes most of his time in cultivating his corn field in order for him to obtain a plentiful harvest. But he still has struggles in financial matters. That's the reason why he has applied for a loan amount of PHP30,000. This will allow him to buy certified seed, fertilizer and to pay for the cost of labor in preparing the land to be planted with corn crops.

Mario hopes to maintain his farming business in order to be able to improve their living conditions and to educate his two children.

loans.use: to buy certified seed, fertilizer and to pay for labor costs in preparing the land to be planted with corn crops.

loans.name: Cristelyn

texts.en:
Due to lack of job opportunities, Cristelyn helps her parents in managing their rice farming business to ensure a high production. She is 26 years old and still single. Her ambition in life is to become financially stable before she is going to get married. 

Currently, Cristelyn is helping her parents in financing the education of her younger brother and sister. Due  to high cost of commodities and school fees, she and her parents aim to improve their farming business to increase their yields and income. She is asking for an additional capital of PHP 40,000 to buy fertilizers, pesticides and to pay the labor incurred in transplanting rice. She believes that this loan will enable her to improve their farming business and hopies that they will be having a plentiful harvest this coming harvest season.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers, pesticides and to pay the labor incurred in transplanting rice.

loans.name: Adjignon

texts.fr:
Adjignon est une femme âgée de 31 ans. Elle est célibataire. Elle a 1 enfant de 4 ans.  
Adjignon travaille comme revendeuse depuis 2003. Elle vend des friperies pour toute personne dans un marché de la place. Elle achète ses produits à Lomé.
Adjignon a requis son troisième crédit de WAGES afin d’acheter des friperies. Elle veut acheter des marchandises. 
Dans les prochaines années, Adjignon voudrait renforcer l’activité. Elle dit qu’avec les profits, elle prévoit d’épanouir sa famille.
texts.en:
Adjignon is a 31 year old woman. She is single. She has one child who is 4 years old.

Adjignon has been working as a trader since 2003. She sells second-hand clothing for all types of customers in the local market. She buys her supplies in Lomé.

Adjignon is seeking her first loan from the micro-finance institution WAGES in order to buy second-hand clothes. She wants to buy more goods.

In the coming years,Adjignon would like to strengthen her business. She says that she will use the profits to ensure that her family prospers.

loans.use: to buy bales of second-hand clothes

loans.name: Rodolfo

texts.en:
Rodolfo is a responsible father who owns and manages a rice farming business in their village. He is 46 years old and has five school-aged children. He aims to increase his yields and income to cover his family's needs and to finance the education of his children. 

Despite the hardship in farming, Rodolfo has the strong determination to improve his farming business. He is requesting an additional capital of PHP 20,000 to buy fertilizers, pesticides and to pay for the labor incurred in transplanting rice. He believes that he can be able to improve his farming business as he continues to work hard and strive harder.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers, pesticides and pay the labor incurred in transplanting rice.

loans.name: Johnny

texts.en:
Johnny is young farmer who is married to Janelyn.This couple is blessed with a healthy child.Though he finished his degree course, still he is engaged in a farming business.

Johnny aims to have a bigger corn field to plant. But due to financial shortage, he wants to ask for additional working capital of PHP 50,000 to buy farm supplies such as fertilizer, certified seed, herbicides and to pay for labor to plant his corn field. He hopes that his business will continue to grow so that he can satisfy their household needs and save some money for the education of his only child.

loans.use: to purchase farm supplies such as fertilizer, certified seed, herbicides and to pay for labor to plant his corn field.

loans.name: Teresa

texts.en:
Teresa is 54 and happily married to a farmer. They live happily in a rural community. They were gifted with six children and they want their children to become successful in the future. Her husband manages their farm lots by planting fruits and vegetables to sell, while Teresa engages in a hog-raising business to supplement her husband's income. 

Due to financial difficulty, she aims to improve her hog-raising business to earn a higher income to satisfy their necessities and to support the schooling of her youngest child. To improve the business, she is asking for an additional capital of PHP 20,000 to buy the needed feeds, vitamins and additional piglets to raise. She mentioned that through patience and hard work, she will make an improvement in the future.

loans.use: to buy feeds, vitamins and additional piglets to raise.

loans.name: Avelina

texts.en:
Being a responsible mother, Avelina is engage in a hog-raising business to supplement her husband's income. She is now 60 years old and has six grown-up children. She aims to improve their status of living to give her children a better life. Despite hardships and difficulties in life, she has the determination to achieve her goals in the future.  

They have been farmers for more than 30 years and usually earn a profit of PHP 20,000 in every harvest season. They usually spend this income on their daily consumption and allowances for her grandchildren. She aims to improve her hog-raising business to earn sufficient income for her family. She is asking for an additional capital of PHP 30,000 to buy feeds, vitamins and additional piglets to raise. She believes that this loan will help her to improve the business and hopes that she will become successful in the future.

loans.use: to buy feeds, vitamins and additional piglets to raise.

loans.name: José Raúl

texts.es: José Raúl de cincuenta y seis años de edad vive junto a vive junto a sus hijos; Él se dedica a la agricultura específicamente al cultivo de cereales maíz y frijol, tiene varios años de trabajar en el rubro y se ha hecho de mucha experiencia que le permite obtener las mejores cosechas, comercia en todos los alrededores de la zona y ya tiene mucha clientela que lo prefiere por la calidad y por los buenos precios además de que se caracteriza por su excelente servicio; José es un hombre visionario, siempre mira hacia adelante donde están las mejores oportunidades de alcanzar el éxito, quiere aumentar la producción en esta temporada de siembra porque eso le ayudara a tener más ganancias para el hogar, para lograrlo necesita invertir en insumos y no posee suficiente capital por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar semilla de maíz, frijol, abono, insecticida, herbicida etc. José Raúl es muy responsable y tiene buenas referencias de pago, tiene la certeza que podrá cancelar el financiamiento, y a la vez tiene fe que llevara a su hogar seguridad económica.
texts.en:
José Raúl, 56, lives with his children. He makes a living working in agriculture, more specifically in the cultivation of cereals, corn and beans. He has been working in this field for many years and has gained a lot of experience, enabling him to obtain better harvests. He sells in all the neighboring areas and he already has many customers who prefer him for the quality he offers, for the competitive prices as well as for his excellent service.

José Raúl is a visionary man, he is always looking ahead for the best opportunities to be successful. He wants to increase production during this sowing season as it will help him to obtain larger profits for his home. In order to do so, he will need to invest in supplies but he doesn't have sufficient capital: that is why he has approached Integral for a loan to buy corn seeds, beans, fertilizers, insecticides and herbicides, etc. 

José Raúl is very responsible and he has good payment references, he is sure that he will be able to repay the loan and at the same time, he has faith that he will bring economic security to his home.

loans.use: to buy corn seeds, beans, fertilizers, insecticides and herbicides.

loans.name: Romeo

texts.en:
Romeo's business is raising crops, primarily planting and harvesting corn to sell. He has been doing this since he got married to Jesusa 15 years ago. He cultivates a hectare cornfield. He yields PHP 15,000 each harvest season. He applied for a loan of PHP 30,000 to improve his crops. He will buy corn seeds, fertilizers and pesticides used in farming. These farm inputs will help to ensure healthier crops and he will be able to harvest it abundantly. 

Romeo is now 52 years old and has eight grown up children. He is also strong enough to manage his farming business. Romeo hopes to achieve good profits for the overall welfare of his family.

loans.use: to buy corn seeds, fertilizers and pesticides used in farming.

loans.name: Dindo

texts.en:
Dindo happily lives at Estefania with her spouse and three children. To make a living, Dindo manages a hectare plot of land on which he cultivates and plants corn. Upon maturity, he sells the raised crops to traders at their village. He yields about PHP 20,000 each harvest season.

Dindo would like to maintain good crops, so he is borrowing a loan of PHP 30,000 to buy farm inputs such as fertilizers, insecticides and pesticides used in the maintenance of the cornfield. 

Aside from the farming business he manages, he also serves his fellow being an active Councilor at Estefania. His photo was taken inside the Barangay (smallest unit of town) during his duty. 

Dindo hopes to keep extending good service to his fellow and continuously educate his children too.

loans.use: to buy farm inputs such as fertilizers, insecticides and pesticides used in farming.

loans.name: Lucina

texts.en:
Lucina is 64 years old, a widow who had six children. She is cooking and selling malagkit and suman (glutinous rice deserts), which are ideal for snacks. Through income from the food-selling business, Lucina supported her children's needs. She aims to improve her output and increase sales but she has  insufficient funds now.  She is seeking a loan of PHP9,000 to buy flour, rice, sugar and cooking oil used in her food-selling business.

Lucina is also praying for her family's good health so that she can continuously make and sell delicious snacks to her customers.

loans.use: to buy flour, rice, sugar and cooking oil used in her food-selling business.

loans.name: Christopher

texts.en:
Christopher is 40 years of age, married, and has been blessed with two children. He is a college graduate who aims to have a better way of life and to educate his two children.

Christopher's wife is an Overseas Filipino Worker (OFW). He stands as both mother and father to his two children due to the absence of his wife. He is glad that his wife supports him in generating income to uplift their living conditions out of poverty. Christopher has been in the farming business for twenty years and is an experienced farmer. His greatest dream is to obtain a greater income in order to sustain their daily expenditures, the allowances of his children, and other obligations to traders. 

Christopher is requesting financial support amounting to 50,000 PHP that would allow him to buy farming supplies needed for his cornfield. He knows that this loan would really be a big help in improving his cornfield production.

loans.use: to buy farming supplies needed for his corn farming business.

loans.name: Albert

texts.en:
Farming has been the business involvement of Albert. He is 30 years of age and still single. Albert did not finish his studies due to lack of financial support. At his very best, he helps his parents in generating income to satisfy their daily basic needs.

Albert would like to apply for his second cycle of loan, amounting to PHP 40,000, allowing him to buy farm inputs for his raised corn crops. He hopes to keep producing healthy corn crops to earn bigger income so that, when the next planting season comes, he will have the capital to use in re-planting his corn field.

loans.use: to buy farm inputs for his raised corn crops.

loans.name: Ramon

texts.en:
Ramon is a corn grower who lives at Estefania with his wife Maricel and one child. He is now 22 years old, married and has one child. He gains about PHP 15,000 each harvest season. The income pays for their meals, bills at home and formula milk of his infant-aged child. 

Ramon would like to increase his crop production so he is asking for a loan as additional capital in buying corn seeds, fertilizers and to pay labor costs for farming. He is borrowing PHP 23,0000 to invest in his corn field. He promises to pay back his loan in full. 

Someday, he hopes to keep producing abundant harvests to save funds use in times of emergencies.

loans.use: to buy corn seeds, fertilizers and to pay labor costs in farming.

loans.name: Reynante

texts.en:
Reynante is 24 years old, single and lives with his parents at Estefania. He raises crops to sell in order to generate an income for the family. He helps his father manage the business. 

They have been planting corn for over two years now and earn about PHP 15,000 each harvest season. He would like to further improve his farming practices and output from the cornfield to gain additional income. He has insufficient funds now, so he is borrowing a loan of PHP 23,000 to buy farm inputs such as fertilizers, insecticides and pesticides used in farming. This will help ensure healthier crops leading to an abundant harvest someday. He promises to pay back his loan in full.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers, insecticides and pesticides used in farming.

loans.name: Isidro

texts.en:
Isidro is a farmer living at Estefania with his wife and four children. One of his children is still attending to school, while the rest have settled into marriage. He has been raising corn to harvest and sell for almost 10 years now. 

Isidro would like to ask for a loan of PHP 23,000 to buy corn seeds, fertilizers and insecticides used in farming. This will help him to maintain the farming business and be able to yield more crops upon harvest. 

With good profits, Isidro would like to start up a hog raising business as an additional source of income. This will allow him to boost up his revenues, leading to a better life someday.

loans.use: to buy corn seeds, fertilizers and insecticides used in farming.

loans.name: Renato

texts.en:
Renato is a corn grower at the village of Estefania. He lives with his parents and helps them generate income through his farming activities. He is now 22 years old and single. 

Renato raises corn from his hectare cornfield and sells it to traders. Renato still needs to improve his farming practices, especially his crop production. So, he is now asking for a loan of PHP 28,000 to buy fertilizers, corn seeds and pesticides used in farming.

In the future, Renato would like to make his farming business profitable and continuously support the education of his sister.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers, corn seeds and pesticides used in farming.

loans.name: Natividad

texts.es: Natividad vive junto a su hija, ella posee una tienda donde vende artículos de primera necesidad, arroz, frijoles, pan, bebidas, jabón entre otros, tiene varios años con el negocio, está ubicado en el lugar de su residencia, es muy conocida en la zona  porque es muy amable y posee la tienda más surtida, los clientes siempre encuentran ahí lo que necesitan con productos de primera calidad y a precios accesibles; Natividad es una mujer emprendedora, siempre a la expectativa de oportunidades que le permitan superarse, quiere ver crecer su negocio es uno de sus más grandes sueños pero necesita invertir en insumos por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar granos, básicos, pan, golosinas, producto instantáneo, bebidas, etc. Natividad es responsable con buenas referencias de pago está segura que podrá saldar la deuda y a la vez tiene la confianza que podrá darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Natividad lives with her daughter, she owns a store where she sells convenience store items such as rice, beans, bread, drinks and soap, among others. She has run this business for several years, it is located in her home. She is well known in the area as she is very friendly and owns the best-stocked store: customers always find what they need in terms of high-quality goods at accessible prices. 

Natividad is an enterprising woman, she is always looking out for opportunities to better herself. Seeing her business grow is one of her biggest dreams, but she needs to invest in goods, which is why she has sought a loan from Integral to buy grains, basic items, bread, sweets, instant products and drinks, etc. 

Natividad is responsible and has an excellent repayment history, she is confident that she will be able to repay the loan and is also confident that she will be able to offer her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy seeds, basic goods, bread, sweets, instant products and drinks.

loans.name: Arlan

texts.en:
Arlan is peacefully living with his spouse and four children. He is proud to be a farmer because through his business, he is able to make a living. He is thankful because his wife is supportive in running their corn farming business.

He and his wife both work in their corn field to be able to produce good corn crops. He plans to buy necessary farm inputs to ensure proper growth of his crops, but the profits gained from his previous harvest is not enough. With regards to this situation, he is applying for a loan of PHP 45,000. He hopes to obtain this requested loan amount to be able to educate his children and improve their way of living.

loans.use: to buy farm inputs to ensure proper growth of his raised corn crops.

loans.name: Fatima

texts.en:
Fatima is a 24 year old married woman. She is a mother of 4 children, she lives in Irbid, Jordan. Fatima is a conservative woman; she is unwilling to upload her photo on the internet. The photo is of her son.

Fatima is looking to have a loan of 400 JOD in order to improve her home living conditions; to fix her home to be more healthy.

Fatima is under 30 years old, so her loan is a youth loan.

loans.use: to improve her home living conditions.

loans.name: Taghreed

texts.en:
Taghreed is a 46 years old married woman she is a mother of 4 children, she lives in Irbid, Jordan. Taghreed is a conservative woman; she is unwilling to upload her photo on the internet. The photo is of her son.

Taghreed is looking to have a loan of 700 JOD in order to improve and fix her home living conditions. She wants to buy a computer and new furniture in the future.

loans.use: to improve her home living conditions.

loans.name: Shellalaine

texts.en:
Shellalaine, who wants to earn enough money for her siblings and parents, has slowly saved through her selling of variety of things. In her eagerness to provide a better living for her family, she operates this business and works harder. But this wasn’t enough because in managing a business it requires funds to continues its cycles.

Currenlty, Shellalaine is asking for a loan amount of PHP 15,000 to buy pony tails, cotton, toys, headbands and hair clips. She hopes, through these products, she can improve their poor living conditions.

loans.use: to buy pony tails, cotton, toys, headbands and hair clips.

loans.name: Robert

texts.en:
Agricultural business has been the main source of income for Robert. He grows corn crops within his local community. He aims to provide the daily needs of his only child, since he is already widower.

Robert would like to apply for a loan due to insufficient capital. He is requesting a loan of PHP 50,000, which will be used to buy certified seeds, pesticides, fertilizers and other necessary farm supplies. He hopes that KIVA lenders will continue to provide him with financial support in order to produce more healthy corn crops. Through this loan, he can sustain his child's needs and save some amount for his emergency purposes.

loans.use: to buy certified seeds, pesticides, fertilizer and other necessary farm supplies.

loans.name: Na'meh

texts.en:
Na'meh is a 40 year old married woman. She lives in Irbin, Jordan. She is a mother of 4 children.

Na'meh is looking to have a loan of 600 JOD in order to buy more quantities of clothes for trading purposes. Her income will increase and she can buy a home for her family, to be owned by them in the future.

loans.use: to buy more clothes for trading purposes.

loans.name: Zaki

texts.en:
Zaki is a 47 year old married man. He is a father of 2 children. He lives in Al Hashmi, Amman, Jordan.

Zaki is looking to have a loan of 600 JOD in order to improve and fix his home living conditions, and to pay for maintenance for his home so it will be healthier.

loans.use: to improve his home living conditions.

loans.name: Nada

texts.en:
Nada is a 62 years old married woman from Hay Nazal. Nada has a distinguisehd project, she draws on ostrich eggs and she started with a small workshop inside her house, then expanded to a bigger one.

Currently, Nada is requesting a loan of 500 JD to to purchase ostrich eggs and materials needed for drawing on the eggs. Nada is looking to improve her project and increase her income.

loans.use: to purchase ostrich eggs and materials needed for drawing on them.

loans.name: Jamla

texts.en:
Jamla is a 50 year old widowed woman from Baqa'a, Jordan and a mother of 6 children.

Jamla is working from her house. She sells clothes and is requesting a loan of 1000 JD to purchase clothes for trading purposes. Jamla is looking to estabish her own shop to increase her income.

loans.use: to purchase clothes for trading purposes.

loans.name: Khaleda

texts.en:
Khaleda is a 24 year old married woman. She lives in Al Karak, Jordan. Khaleda is a conservative woman; she is unwilling to upload her photo on the internet. The photo is of her husband.

Khaleda is looking to have a loan of 400 JOD in order to improve her home living conditions and improve the general view.

Khaleda is under 30 years old, so her loan is a youth loan.

loans.use: to improve her home living conditions.

loans.name: Hanan

texts.en:
Hanan is a 41 year old married woman from al Salt, Jordan. She supports 5 members of her family. Hanan is a conservative person; she is unwilling to upload her picture on the internet. The girl in the photo is her daughter.

Hanan is looking to improve her family's living conditions so, she is requesting a loan of 300 JD to purchase furniture for her house.

loans.use: to purchase furniture for her house.

loans.name: Carolina Marisol

texts.es: Carolina Marisol de veintinueve años de edad vive junto a su compañero de vida y sus hijos; ella se dedica al cultivo de maíz y frijol, tiene muchos años de trabajar en la agricultura  y ya tiene mucha experiencia en el rubro, eso le ha permitido tener las mejores cosechas, el terreno está ubicado en un lugar con incidencia agrícola, cercano a su vivienda, comercia en todas las zonas aledañas y ya tiene mucha clientela fija porque las personas saben que todo lo que vende es de primera calidad y a precios bajos además se caracteriza por su gran amabilidad; Carolina es una mujer visionaria y con muchas ganas de salir adelante para alcanzar un futuro más próspero, en la última cosecha tuvo pérdidas, debido al mal clima, por eso en esta temporada de siembra quiere aprovechar para recuperarse, desea comprar insumos pero necesita de capital por eso solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar semilla de maíz, frijol, herbicida, fertilizante, herramienta, etc. Carolina Marisol tiene buen record crediticio y muy buenas referencias de pago por eso asegura que podrá saldar la deuda, y a la vez darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Carolina Marisol, 29, lives with her life partner and her children. She has spent many years working in agriculture and has a lot of experience in this field, which has enabled her to achieve improved harvests. The plot of land is located in an area with an agricultural impact, near to her home. She sells in all neighboring areas and has already got a large, permanent, customer base because they know that everything she sells is of an excellent quality and at low prices, moreover, she is known for her friendliness. 

Carolina is a visionary woman who is keen to get ahead in order to have a brighter future. In the last harvest, she suffered losses due to the poor weather that is why this harvest she hopes to recover her losses. She wants to buy supplies, but she needs capital which is why she has sought a loan from Integral to buy corn seeds, beans, herbicides, fertilizers and tools, etc. Carolina Marisol has a good credit history and an excellent repayment record, which is why she states that she will be able to repay the loan, at the same time as offering her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy corn seeds, beans, herbicides, fertilizers and tools.

loans.name: Korto

texts.en:
Korto is married, 30 years old, and lives in Airport Community with her husband and children. Her children are between the ages of 8 months and 16, and all are in school.

For six years now she has been selling rubber dishes in the market.  She started this business with money given to her by her husband and learned this way of selling from her mother.  The problem she faces is the rainy season.  She is requesting a loan to purchase more rubber dishes (plates, cups, bowls) for her business. Her plans are to build a house and educate her children.

loans.use: to purchase more rubber dishes (plates, cups, bowls) for her business

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To cover his wedding costs

loans.name: Joan

texts.en: Joan lives peacefully at Cataggaman with her spouse and one child. She is now 31 years old and manages a small business selling used clothes, caps and shoes. She buys this merchandise at the public market and re-sells it in her village for profit. She aspires to increase her sales, so she is taking a loan of PHP7,000 to buy more clothes, caps, belts, and shoes to sell. She hopes to make her business grow successfully in order to meet their needs and save funds for education of her children.

loans.use: to buy more clothes, caps, belts, and shoes to sell.

loans.name: Sandra Elizabeth

texts.es: Sandra Elizabeth vive junto a sus hijos y su esposo junto al cual se dedican a trabajar para brindarle todo lo necesario a sus pequeños. Sandra trabaja sembrando maíz y frijoles, actividad gracias a la cual han logrado salir adelante. Ella se encarga además de comercializar los granos básicos en el parque central de su pueblo, donde posee ya muchos clientes fijos. Sandra solicita un préstamo por medio del cual pueda cumplir su sueño de ver sus parcelas completamente llenas, y de esta forma producir mayor cantidad de maíz y frijoles. Con esto Sandra espera mejorar en gran manera sus ventas, ya que son la única fuente de ingresos que posee su familia, por lo que es de mucha importancia mejorar el negocio y así asegurarles a sus hijos una vida mejor.
texts.en:
Sandra Elizabeth lives with her children and her husband, together they work to give their youngsters everything they need. Sandra works sowing corn and beans, and it is thanks to this activity they have been able to get ahead. She is also responsible for selling basic grains in her town's central park, where she has already gained a lot of steady customers. 

Sandra is seeking a loan through which she will be able to fulfill her dream of seeing her plots of land completely filled up, and as a result, produce a greater quantity of corn and beans. With this loan, Sandra hopes to significantly improve her sales as they are the family's only source of income, which is why it is important to improve the business and thereby provide a better life for her children.

loans.use: to buy beans to sow.

loans.name: Fatimah

texts.en:
Fatimah is a conservative person. She is unwilling to upload her picture on the internet, so the man in the photo is her brother.

Fatimah is a 35-year-old married woman from Al Khaledieh, Al Mafraq, Jordan. She is a mother.

Fatimah sells home products, so she is requesting a loan of 400 JOD to purchase more of them for trading purposes.

Fatimah is looking to improve her family's living conditions and income.

loans.use: To purchase home products for trading purposes

loans.name: Alia

texts.en:
Alia is a conservative person, so she is unwilling to upload her picture on the internet. The man in the photo is her husband.

Alia is a 33-year-old married woman from Al Aqaba, Jordan. She is a mother of four children.

Alia is looking to improve her family's living conditions, so she is requesting a loan of 500 JOD to do maintenance for her house.

Alia is looking to repaint her house and purchase new furniture.

loans.use: To do maintenance for her house

loans.name: Taghreed

texts.en:
Taghreed is a 28-year-old married woman. She lives in Al Karak, Jordan.

Taghreed is looking to get a loan of 700 JOD, so she can buy more straw to make her beautiful crafts. Her income will increase accordingly.

Taghreed is under 30 years old, so her loan is a youth loan.

loans.use: To buy straw to make her crafts

loans.name: Abdulmoin

texts.en:
Each day, Abdulmoin spends his time running his clothing business. He started this field of business in 1981. He is grateful because he is able to earn approximately PHP6,000 a month. The profits gained from his business support his family's daily household expenses and school fees and allowances for his two children who go to school.

Abdulmoin is married and blessed with five children. His greatest dream is to gain enough income to be able to support his two children in their studies. He knows that he could make all this possible through his dedication, enough capital and wise management of the business. Abdulmoin would like to buy stocks of clothing such as blouses, jogging pants, shorts, malong (a tube skirt) and formal attire,  but his capital is not sufficient. So he is asking for financial support in the amount of PHP50,000. He believes that through this loan, he could further expand his business which will enable him to give his children a better way of living and to educate the two who are students.

loans.use: to purchase stocks of clothing such as blouses, jogging pants, malong and formal attire to sell

loans.name: Reema

texts.en:
Reema is a conservative person, so she is unwilling to upload her picture on the internet. The man in the photo is her husband.

Reema is a 39-year-old married woman from Al Russeifeh, Jordan. She supports two members of her family.

Reema is looking to improve her family's living conditions, so she is requesting a loan of 1,000 JOD to do maintenance on her living room.

Reema is looking to install a ceiling for her balcony.

loans.use: To do maintenance on her living room

loans.name: José Manuel

texts.es: José Manuel tiene como oficio la agricultura, trabajo el cual ha desempeñado desde que es muy joven y el cual ha aprendido a realizarla con gran excelencia, él vive junto a su esposa e hijos. José siembra granos básicos como frijoles y maíz, los cuales posteriormente comercializa junto a su esposa e hijos. Debido a que la agricultura es el trabajo que le permite sostener a su familia, José solicita un préstamo a INTEGRAL para poder invertir en la compra de mayor cantidad de frijoles y maíz para sembrar y de esta forma aumentar su producción de granos básicos. Con lo anterior José Manuel podrá asegurar una mejor estabilidad económica a sus hijos, dandoles todo lo necesario para que puedan salir adelante, lo cual es el mayor deseo de José.
texts.en: José Manuel's work is farming, work that he has performed since he was very young and that he has learned to do with great excellence. He lives with his wife and children. José plants basic grains such as beans and corn, which he, along with his wife and children, will later sell. Since agriculture is the work that allows him to maintain his family, José is  applying to INTEGRAL for a loan so that he can invest in the purchase of a greater quantity of beans and corn to plant and in this way increase his production of basic grains. With the loan, José Manuel will be able assure greater economic stability to his children, giving them everything necessary so that they can advance, which is José's greatest desire.

loans.use: to buy corn and beans to plant

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: buy four ewes.

loans.name: Akoélé

texts.fr:
Akoélé est une veuve de 55 ans. Elle a 5 enfants. Le plus âgé a 40 ans et le plus jeune 28. 
Akoélé vend des bonbons, des bougies, du papier hygiénique ainsi que des insecticides serpentins depuis 1977 sur le marché. Elle souffre d’un manque de fonds.
Akoélé a donc demandé un premier prêt chez WAGES afin de s’approvisionner en bonbons, bougies, papier hygiénique et insecticides serpentins. Elle espère pouvoir réinjecter les profits dans l’activité. A terme, elle souhaite ouvrir une boutique d’alimentation générale et de produits divers. Elle aimerait également ouvrir d’autres points de vente pour sa famille.
texts.en:
Akoélé is a 55-year-old widow. She has five children. The oldest is 40 years old and the youngest 28.

Akoélé has been selling candy, candles, toilet paper and insecticide strips at the market since 1997. She is suffering from a lack of capital.

Akoélé therefore requested a first loan from WAGES in order to restock on candy, candles, toilet paper and insecticide strips. She is hoping to be able to reinvest her profits in her business. In the long run, she wishes to open a store to sell groceries and various items. She would also like to open other stores for her family.

loans.use: to buy candy and insecticide.

loans.name: Yawoa

texts.fr:
Yawoa est une femme de 40 ans. Divorcée, elle est mère d’un enfant de 28 ans. 
Elle est ménagère depuis l’an dernier et propose un service traiteur à qui le veut. 
Yawoa sollicite WAGES pour son premier prêt afin d’acheter des produits alimentaires pour assurer son activité. Elle épargnera sur son compte les profits supplémentaires. Dans le futur, elle aimerait élargir son activité pour servir davantage de clients. Ceci lui permettrait d’assurer une certaine aisance à sa famille.
texts.en:
Yawoa is a forty-year-old woman. She is divorced and the mother of a 28-year-old child.

She has been a housekeeper for a year and also offers a catering service to the public.

Yawoa is requesting her first loan from WAGES to purchase food products to secure her activity. She will be keeping all extra profit in her savings account. In the future, she would like to develop her activity to serve more clients. This would help her guarantee a certain level of comfort to her family.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for her restaurant.

loans.name: Manuel De Jesús

texts.es: Manuel de Jesús vive junto a su madre y su hermana, Manuel siempre se ha destacado por ser un joven muy emprendedor, quien cuenta con grandes habilidades.  El se dedica a la siembra, trabajo gracias al cual sale adelante junto a su madre y hermana quienes le ayudan a desgranar el elote para posteriormente venderlo. Además de vender maíz comercializa frijoles, los cuales los venden en diferentes mercados y tiendas. Por ser la única fuente de ingresos con los que ellos cuentan, Manuel solicita un préstamo a INTEGRAL, para poder contar con el dinero necesario para invertir en su cosecha, comprando mayor cantidad de semillas para sembrar y así mismo abono. Con esto él espera mejorar sus ventas para contar con una presente y un futuro mejor.
texts.en: Manuel de Jesús lives with his mother and his sister. Manuel has always stood out as a very entrepreneurial young man who has great abilities. His work is planting crops. Thanks to his work he is advancing, along with his mother and sister, who help him to shell corn to sell. In addition to selling corn, he sells beans, which they sell in different markets and stores. Because this is the only source of income that they have, Manuel is applying to INTEGRAL for a loan so that he will have the necessary money to invest in his harvest by buying a greater quantity of seeds to plant and by buying compost at the same time. With this he hopes to improve his sales to have a better present and future.

loans.use: to buy seeds and compost for planting

loans.name: Duglas Adolfo

texts.es: Duglas Adolfo es una persona para quien salir adelante no ha sido fácil, hace un año perdió gran parte de sus pertenencias y toda su cosecha debido a las fuertes tormentas que inundaron el lugar, por lo que ha tenido que iniciar de cero poco a poco. Él vive junto a su esposa e hijos, quienes le ayudan con el trabajo tanto del hogar como de la siembra. Duglas se dedica a la cosecha de frijoles y maíz el cual es destinada  tanto para el consumo diario como también para comercializar, actividad la cual representa todo para él y su familia debido a que es su único ingreso económico que posee. Duglas solicita un préstamo a INTEGRAL, por medio del cual le sea posible comprar semillas para sembrar y así mismo toda la materia prima para realizar este arduo trabajo, Duglas confía  que este será un año mejor para su cosecha, por lo que desea incrementar la cantidad de esta lo más posible y así percibir mayores ganancias.
texts.en: For Duglas Adolfo, getting ahead has not been easy.  A year ago he lost most of his belongings and his whole harvest, due to the strong storms that flooded his area.  For this reason, he has had to start over from zero, little by little.  He lives with his wife and children, who help him with the household chores as well as the farming.   This activity is everything for him and his family, because it is their only source of income.  Duglas is requesting a loan from INTEGRAL so that he can purchase seeds to plant and also the supplies he needs to carry out this arduous work.  Duglas trusts that this will be a better year for his harvest, and so he wants to expand the quantity as much as possible so that he can earn more income.

loans.use: to buy beans and corn to plant

loans.name: José David

texts.es: José David vive junto a su esposa e hijos, y se dedica al oficio de la siembra, lo cual aprendió muy bien de su abuela, quien es precisamente quien le da el apoyo para que siga realizando su trabajo en su pequeña parcela. José siembra frijoles y maíz, lo cual ha sido un negocio que por generaciones ha logrado sacar a la familia adelante. Razón por la que solicita un préstamo a INTEGRAL teniendo como meta sembrar mayor cantidad de semillas y así obtener más cosecha la cual pueda comercializar a buen precio. Es por esto que es de mucha importancia para José contar con el dinero necesario para comprar las mejores semillas, abono y pesticidas y de esta forma brindar calidad a sus clientes. José es un padre de familia lleno de esperanzas en darles todo lo mejor a sus hijos, lo que le impulsa a esforzarse más día con día y querer crecer en su negocio.
texts.en: Jose David lives with his wife and their children.  He is a farmer, who learned to farm very well from his grandmother.  She is also the person who has given him the support so that he can continue to carry out his work on his small parcel of land.  Jose cultivates beans and corn.  For generations, this has been the way that his family has managed to get ahead.  The reason he is requesting a loan from INTEGRAL is that he has a goal of planting a greater quantity of seeds so that he can obtain a bigger harvest to sell at a good price.  This is why it is very important for Jose to have the money he needs to buy the best seeds, fertilizers and pesticides, so that he can provide quality products to his customers.  Jose is a father who is full of hope that he can provide the best for his children.  They are his motivation to exert himself more and more each day, because he wants to grow his business.

loans.use: to buy beans and corn to plant and later sell

loans.name: Miguel Amilcar

texts.es: Miguel Amilcar vive junto a su compañera de vida y un hijo menor de edad, quien es el mayor incentivo para esforzarse día con día. Miguel se dedica al cultivo de maíz y frijoles y este año desea aumentar en gran manera su cosecha, ya que es la única forma que posee de ganarse la vida, razón por la que solicita un préstamo a INTEGRAL,  através  del cual puede contar con el dinero necesario para invertir en la compra de mayor cantidad de maíz y frijoles para sembrar, así mismo para preparar la tierra y tener los insumos necesarios para invertir en el cuidado de las matas. Con el aumento de cultivo Miguel tiene la esperanza de aumentar sus ventas lo que sería de mucha ayuda para el sostenimiento de su hogar.
texts.en: Miguel Amilcar lives with his life partner and minor child, who is the main reason he exerts himself each day.  Miguel is a farmer who cultivates corn and beans, and this year he wants to greatly expand his harvest, since this is the only means he has to earn a living.  The reason he is requesting a loan from INTEGRAL is so that he can have the money he needs to invest in a greater quantity of corn and beans to plant, and also to help him prepare the land and have the supplies he needs to invest in the care of his plants.  With more crops, Miguel hopes to increase his sales, which would be very helpful to him in supporting his household.

loans.use: to buy seeds to plant

loans.name: Feda'a

texts.en:
Feda'a is 43 years old married woman she lives in Al Khaledieh, Al Mafraq, Jordan.Feda'a is a conservative woman; she is unwilling to upload her photo on the internet. The photo is of her husband.

Feda'a is looking to have a loan of 600 JOD in order to buy furniture for her home and improve its conditions.

loans.use: to improve her home living conditions.

loans.name: Rana

texts.en:
Rana is a 44 years old married woman from al Russeifeh, Jordan and supports 6 members of her family. Rana is looking to improve her family's living conditions. She is requesting a loan of 500 JD to purchase new bedroom for her children.

Rana is looking to purchase new refrigerator.

loans.use: to purchase a new bedroom for her children.

loans.name: Maryam

texts.en:
Maryam is a 59 year old married woman from Nao'or, Jordan and she supports 4 members of her family. Maryam is looking to improve her family's living conditions so that she is requesting a loan of 500 JD to purchase paints to re-paint her house.

Maryam is looking to purchase a car for herself.

loans.use: to purchase paint for her house.

loans.name: José Roberto

texts.es: José Roberto es un señor muy trabajador, quien vive junto a su esposa y un hijo menor de edad. José ha vivido siempre en el mismo lugar por lo que es muy conocido por ser alguien responsable y comprometido por el bienestar de su familia. El se dedica a la venta de granos básicos, los cuales también se encarga de cultivar en el terreno en que reside. José siembra maíz y frijol dos de los granos básicos con más demanda ya que son parte de la dieta diaria de nuestro país. Con el enorme deseo de aumentar sus ventas, José solicita un préstamo a INTEGRAL, y de esta forma contar con el dinero necesario para invertir en la compra de semillas, pesticidas, abono, compartimientos y todo lo necesario para realizar su siembra y mantener la frescura de sus productos.
texts.en: José Roberto is a very hardworking man who lives with his wife and one minor child. José has always lived in the same place and so he is very well-known as someone who is responsible and committed to his family's wellbeing. He earns a living selling staple crops which he also grows himself on the land where he resides. José grows corn and beans, two of the staple crops most in demand since they are part of the daily diet of our country. With an enormous desire to increase his sales, José is seeking a loan from Integral so that he will have the money he needs to invest in the purchase of seeds, pesticides, fertilizer, storage bins, and all that which is necessary for the planting and to maintain the freshness of his products.

loans.use: to purchase corn and beans for planting.

loans.name: Zosima

texts.en:
Zosima is 50 years old and is engaged in buying and selling of different slippers and shoes in her community. 

It has been fifteen years since she started this business and it was a great help to improve the family’s poor lifestyle. Her business is a source of their allowance when somebody got sick from the family. 

She is aiming for higher income but she lacks capital to buy additional products. So Zosima is asking for a loan of PHP 25,000 to purchase additional slippers and shoes to sell. 

She hopes that through her availed loan, she could gain higher proceeds to save for her business and family.

loans.use: to purchase additional slippers and shoes to sell.

loans.name: Arthur

texts.en:
Arthur is 43 years old and is married to Annie. He is a responsible and patient man who lives in Villa Concepcion with his family. 

He enjoys his work as a farmer, although he encounters hardships in maintaining his cornfield, especially when a drought or flood occurs. He plants and harvests corn to sell to traders in the village. 

In order to keep producing a good harvest, Arthur is requesting a loan of PHP 40,000 to buy corn seeds, fertilizers, and insecticides to maintain his crops. He would like to earn more income.

loans.use: to buy corn seeds, fertilizers, and insecticides to maintain his crops.

loans.name: Marcelino

texts.en:
Marcelino is from the village of Villa Concepcion. To make a living, he has managed their family farmland for five years. He usually received an income amount of PHP 35,000 every crop season. 

Right now, Marcelino is asking for a loan in the amount of PHP 40,000 to buy farm inputs such as fertilizers, corn seeds, and insecticides for the proper growth of his corn production. 

Marcelino hopes to grow his business well and to harvest more corn to sell.

loans.use: to buy farm inputs such as fertilizers, corn seeds, and insecticides for the proper growth of his corn production.

loans.name: Maria

texts.en:
To make a living, Maria, aged 43, operates her charcoal production business. She earns PHP 200 each day in the business. This is being rolled into revolving capital to maintain the business but it wasn’t enough to maintain her business. 

For this reason, she is asking for a loan of PHP 10,000 as additional funds to purchase hardwoods to make charcoal.  

She hopes to further grow her business and to increase her income, which will secure her family's future and the education of her two children.

loans.use: to purchase hardwoods to make charcoal.

loans.name: Willie

texts.en:
Willie is raising four pigs to be fattened and sold. He has operated this business for four years. With this business, he is able to cover all of his family's household expenses and finance their five hectares of corn field. He aims to gain greater income in order to support two children in their studies.

Willie is married and has five children. His eldest son has been settled for marriage. Two other children are still in school, and the remaining two are working. Willie would like to take out a loan of 30,000 PHP, which will allow him to buy feed, vitamins, and vaccines for his hogs.

According to Willie, with continuous effort, patience, and hard work, he will be able to improve their way of living and educate his two children who are still in school.

loans.use: to buy feed, vitamins, and vaccines for hogs

loans.name: Mirna Cristel

texts.es: Mirna Cristel de cuarenta y siete años de edad vive junto a sus hijos, ella se dedica al cultivo de maíz y frijol, tiene muchos años de trabajar en la agricultura y se siente muy orgullosa de siempre obtener las mejores cosechas, comercia en todos los alrededores y la gente la prefiere porque siempre está a la orden del día, con producto de calidad y a precios accesibles; Mirna es una mujer emprendedora y visionaria quiere lograr un futuro más próspero y se está esforzando para alcanzarlo, quiere aumentar la producción y necesita comprar insumos por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar semilla de maíz, frijol, fertilizante, herramienta, etc. Mirna tiene un buen record crediticio y buenas referencias de pago que le permiten asegurar la cancelación de la deuda y a la vez quiere ofrecerle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Mirna Cristel is forty-seven years old and lives together with her children. She grows corn and beans for a living; she has been working in agriculture for lots of years now and feels very proud of always getting the best harvests. She sells in the surrounding areas and people prefer to buy from her because she is always available, and has quality products at accessible prices. Mirna is a very entrepreneurial and visionary woman who wants to have a prosper future and is working hard to get it. She wants to increase her production and needs to buy supplies, that's why she is requesting INTEGRAL for a loan that will allow her to buy corn seeds, beans, fertilizers, tools, etc. Mirna has a good credit record and good repayment references, which allows her to ensure the cancellation of the debt and at the same time she wants to offer her family a better life quality.

loans.use: to buy corn seeds, beans, fertilizers and tools

loans.name: Joey

texts.en:
Joey raises hogs in his local community.  He is 45 years old, is married to Josie, and has three children  His eldest child is married already, another one still attends school, and the other is his companion in running his hog raising and corn farm business.

Joey would like to ensure the good growth his hogs so that he can sell them to buyers at higher prices.  He hopes to maintain this kind of business in order to have a continuous source of income.  Joey aims to raise more pigs, but his expenses in his corn field prevent that.  With regards to this situation, he is asking for a loan of PHP30,000.  He will use this loan to buy hog feed so that he can sustain their daily maintenance and make them healthier when they reach their optimum growth. In this way, he can make his hog raising business viable as his family's source of income.

loans.use: to purchase hog feed for his hog raising business

loans.name: Elsa Ermita

texts.es: Elsa Ermita, se destaca por ser una persona muy responsable y trabajadora, quien lucha al lado de su esposo para sacar adelante a su hogar y su familia. Elsa trabaja como cosmetóloga, realizando cortes de cabello, tientes, planchados, y otros servicios más, tanto en su hogar como a domicilio, contando con una cantidad aceptable de clientes. Elsa solicita un préstamo por medio del cual pueda mejorar su casa, ella necesita construir una habitación en la cual pueda realizar su trabajo de cosmetología por lo que necesita comprar cemento, ladrillos, láminas, arena y otros materiales de construcción para realizar los muros, el piso y así mismo para contratar a las personas adecuadas para que realicen el trabajo. Con lo anterior Elsa tiene la esperanza de mejorar  su negocio y brindarles a sus clientes un lugar más apto para realizar su trabajo de belleza.
texts.en:
Elsa Ermita is known as a very responsible and hard-working person who struggles alongside her husband to advance her home and her family. Elsa works as a cosmotologist, cutting hair, tinting, doing permanents and other services in her home and in the homes of her customers. She can count on an acceptable number of clients. 

Elsa is requesting a loan to improve her house. She needs to construct a room where she can conduct her cosmotology work. To do that, she needs to purchase cement, bricks, sheet steel, sand, and other construction materials for building walls, a floor, and also to hire skilled persons to do the work. With this loan, Elsa has hopes of improving her business and offering customers a more appropriate place for conducting her beauty parlor services.

loans.use: buy bricks, cement, and steel sheets to construct a room she can use as a beauty parlor.

loans.name: Alejo

texts.en:
Alejo is a farmer who lives with his parents at Pinopoc. He is a 32 year-old, single man.  He generates income to support his parents. He plants and harvests rice to sell to traders. He has been doing it for seven years.  He is asking for a loan of PHP10,000 to buy seeds, fertilizers and insecticides use in farming. He hopes to make his business profitable in order to earn more funds for family's sustenance.

In the future, Alejo hopes to produce abundant crops every harvest season leading to business improvement. From this, he will make the family financially stable.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizers and insecticides to use in farming

loans.name: Jimmy

texts.en:
Jimmy is a rice grower at Pinopoc. He has been doing this for over 10 years and earns about P10,000. It is used for their meals and for his children's school expenses. He would like to improve his crop production for additional profits and that is why he is asking for a loan of PHP10,0000 to buy fertilizers and insecticides to use in farming. This will help maintain his business and gain more profits from it. 

With continuous efforts and hard work, Jimmy will someday alleviate his family's poverty.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and insecticides to use in farming

loans.name: Mario

texts.en:
Rice farming is the primary source of income for Mario. He is married and has four children who are currently going to school. He is happily married to Fely. From the farming business, he earns about P8,000 each harvest season, twice a year.

He would like to improve his farming output so he is asking for a loan of P10,000 to buy fertilizers and insecticides to use in farming. This will help maintain his farming business, leading to an abundant harvest.  Additional revenue will be use to pay his children's education.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and insecticides to use in farming

loans.name: Juliana

texts.en:
Juliana is 49 years old and lives with her husband at Pinopoc. Her spouse is a farmer, while she buys and sells vegetables in her village. The couple works tirelessly in generating income for the education of their three children. She would like to strengthen her husband's farming business, so she is now asking for a loan of P10,000 to buy farm inputs, such as fertilizers and insecticides. This will help ensure healthier crops to harvest and will increase their earnings.

Someday, Juliana hopes to keep become successful in their businesses and continuously to give the best education to her children, too.

loans.use: to buy farm inputs

loans.name: Sabah

texts.en:
Sabah is a 40-year-old married woman from Al Russeifeh, Jordan, and the mother of 4 children.

Sabah is looking to improve her family's living conditions.  She is requesting a loan of 800 JD to increase her living space by adding another room to her house.

loans.use: to add another room to her house

loans.name: Sumaiah

texts.en:
Sumaiah is a 52-year-old married woman from Al Russeifeh, Jordan, and the mother of 4 children.

Sumaiah is looking to improve her family's living conditions.  She is requesting a loan of 600 JD to do maintenance on her house.

loans.use: to do maintenance on her house

loans.name: Abeer

texts.en:
Abeer is a conservative person. She is unwilling to upload her picture on the Internet, so the man in the photo is her husband.

Abeer is a 42-year-old married woman from Al Salt, Al Balqa, Jordan, and a mother of five children.

Abeer is a struggling woman. She works from her house to provide her family with better living conditions and she trades in clothes, selling them to neighbours and relatives.

She is requesting a loan of 400 JD to purchase more quantities of clothes for trading purposes.

Abeer is looking to establish her own shop.

loans.use: to purchase clothes for trading purposes.

loans.name: Amjad

texts.en:
Amjad is a 29-year-old single man from Ashrafia, Amman, Jordan.

Amjad is a proud owner of a small barber shop. He is requesting a loan of 1,500 JD to add additional improvements to his shop by purchasing new equipment and tools.

Because Amjad is under 30 years old, his loan is considered as a youth loan.

loans.use: to improve his barber shop by adding new equipment and tools.

loans.name: Sodqyeh

texts.en:
Sodqyeh is a conservative person. She is unwilling to upload her picture on the Internet, so the woman in the photo is her sister.

Sodqyeh is a 45-year-old single lady from Bani Kenanah, Irbid, Jordan.

Sodqyeh is a micro-entrepreneur working from her house. She sells blankets and is requesting a loan of 500 JD to purchase additional quantities for trading purposes.

Sodqyeh is looking to establish her own shop.

loans.use: to purchase blankets for trading purposes.

loans.name: Abeer

texts.en:
Abeer is a conservative person. She is unwilling to upload her picture on the Internet so the man in the photo is her brother's son.

Abeer is a 34-year-old married woman from Bani Kenanah, Jordan. She supports two children of her family.

Abeer is selling clothes and perfumes and she is requesting a loan of 500 JD to purchase clothes and perfumes for trading purposes.

Abeer is looking to improve her family’s living conditions and looking to improve her project by opening a shop for her business.

loans.use: to purchase clothes and perfumes for trading purposes.

loans.name: Mohammad

texts.en:
Mohammad is a 62-year-old married man from Marka, Jordan.

Mohammad has a remarkable profession. He makes water fountains from clay and is requesting a loan of 1,100 JD to purchase materials, such as clay, needed for his business.

Mohammad is looking to improve his business by adding modern equipment.

An aspiration of Mohammad is to purchase a house for the family.

loans.use: to purchase materials needed for his business such as clay.

loans.name: Saúl Antonio

texts.es: Saúl Antonio de 42 años de edad se dedica a la venta de fruta como: mango, jocotes, papayas, naranja, piña, sandía y otras frutas de estación,  las cuales corta y lava para comercializarlas en bolsas individuales. Saúl es una persona soltera quien se gana la vida subiéndose a los buses ofreciendo la fruta a los pasajeros que en ellos se transportan, así mismo visita parques, y mercados todo con el deseo de vender lo más posible. Saúl solicita un préstamo a INTEGRAL, por medio del cual pueda contar con el dinero necesario para comprar mayor cantidad de frutas, así mismo comprar aderezos como sal, chile y limón para colocarle a las frutas según el gusto de sus clientes y así de esta manera mejorar sus ganancias, lo cual es su deseo principal.
texts.en:
Saúl Antonio is 42 years old. He works selling fruit like mangos, jocotes [a small fruit of the American tropics], papayas, oranges, pineapples, watermelons, and other fruits in season. He cuts and washes them to sell in individual bags.
