Saúl is single. He makes his living boarding buses to offer the fruit to passengers as well as visiting parks and markets, all with the desire of selling as much as possible.

Saúl is requesting a loan from INTEGRAL so that he can have the money necessary to purchase a larger quantity of fruit, as well as to buy garnishes like salt, chili pepper, and lemon to put on the fruit according to his customers' taste; in that way, he can improve his earnings, which is his principal desire.

loans.use: to purchase fruit along with chili pepper, lemon, salt, and other garnishes.

loans.name: Rose

texts.en:
Rose, a 36-year-old married mother of five children ranging in age from 18 to 3 years old, all in school, lives in West Point. A high school dropout, for the past 15 years Rose has been selling greens in the local market, a trade she learned from her mother.

She enjoys this kind of trading because it involves interactions with people and has enabled her to send her children to school. Now requesting a loan to purchase more cassava, potatoes, etc. for her business, Rose plans to build a house for her children.

loans.use: to purchase more cassava, potatoes, etc. for her business.

loans.name: Miatta

texts.en: Miatta lives in Airport community. She is married, and her husband is a businessman. They have three children between the ages of 3 and 8. All of their children are currently in school and live at home. For the past three years she has been running a cook shop (restaurant) where she sells delicious  Liberian food. She makes a lot of profit. She is requesting a loan to purchase more inventory (oil, pepper, onion, bitter, and salt) for her restaurant. She plans to buy land and build a house.

loans.use: to purchase more inventory (oil, pepper, onion, bitter, and salt) for her restaurant

loans.name: María Teresa

texts.es: María Teresa de 41 años de edad, madre soltera de un pequeño menor de edad y una persona muy responsable y trabajadora. María se dedica a la venta de frutas como: mango, pepino, naranja, jocotes y otros más, las que comercializa a las afueras de escuelas públicas con alumnos, maestros y personas que transitan el lugar, con lo que ella puede llevarle el sustento diario a su hijo y sostener su hogar. María desea  reparar el sistema eléctrico de su lugar de vivienda  lo que se le hace bastante difícil, por lo que solicita un préstamo a INTEGRAL, por medio del cual pueda comprar los materiales necesarios para la elaboración de la obra y así mismo para pagar los honorarios de un electricista que le realice el trabajo. Todo esto lo hace María con el enorme deseo de contar con una vivienda más segura para ella y  su hijo, en donde puedan sentirse tranquilos.
texts.en:
María Teresa, age 41, is the single mother of a young minor.  She is a very responsible and hard-working person.  María sells fruit like mangos, cucumbers, oranges, “jocotes” [a plum-like fruit], and others.

She sells them outside public schools to students, teachers, and passersby.  By doing this she is able to bring home the daily bread for her child, and she is able to support her household.  

María wishes to repair the electrical system where she lives, and it is very difficult for her.  Therefore, she is requesting a loan from Integral.  She will use the loan to buy the materials  needed to do the job.  She will also pay the electrician who does the job.

María does all of this with the enormous desire to have a safer home for herself and her child.  She wants a home where they can feel at ease.

loans.use: to pay for an electrician.

loans.name: Lorena Guadalupe

texts.es: Lorena Guadalupe, vive con su mamá y su hija de un año de edad, se caracteriza por ser una persona muy trabajadora, responsable, luchadora que día a día quiere salir adelante por su hija. En la zona donde reside tiene buenas relaciones con los vecinos, ya que es colaboradora, alegre, honesta.  Ella posee un puesto en el mercado de la localidad en la que vive,  vende verduras y frutas. Pero últimamente se ha visto en la necesidad de invertir un poco más para obtener mayores ganancias y mantener la clientela, desea vender más verduras y frutas como papas, güisquiles, pipianes, yuca, entre otros.  Es por eso que solicita la ayuda de INTEGRAL adquiriendo un crédito para comprar estos insumos ya que está segura que le ayudará a mejorar la vida de su negocio y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Lorena Guadalupe lives with her mother and her one year old daughter.  She is known for being a very hard-working, responsible, and tenacious person.  Day by day she wants to get ahead for her daughter.

In the area where she lives she has a good relationship with her neighbors because she is cooperative, happy, and honest.  She has a stand at the market in the area where she lives, and she sells fruits and vegetables.

However, she has lately seen the need to invest a little more in order to get more income and keep her clientele.  She wishes to sell fruits and vegetables like potatoes, chayote squash, “pipianes” [pipián is a variety of squash known as ‘cushaw’ in the United States], and cassava, among others.  

That is why she is requesting help from Integral.  She will use the loan to buy these supplies.  She is sure that it will help her improve the life of her business and that of her family.

loans.use: to buy wholesale fruit and vegetables like potatoes, chayote squash, cushaw squash, cassava, strawberries, and mangoes, among others.

loans.name: Ana Mirian De Jesús

texts.es: Ana Mirian de Jesús vive junto a su compañero de vida y sus hijos en casa propia; ella se dedica al cultivo de maíz y frijol desde hace ya varios años, el trabajo en la agricultura es muy importante para ella pues ama su labor además es su fuente de ingresos para sostener el hogar, con el tiempo ha ganado experiencia que le permite obtener las mejores ganancias y a la vez mejorar su calidad de trabajo cada día mas, el terreno de cultivo está ubicado cerca de su residencia y comercia en todos los alrededores del lugar, tiene mucha clientela porque además de que es una buena vendedora siempre da los precios más bajos; Ana Mirian es una mujer visionaria, con muchas metas que desea alcanzar, se está esforzando mucho por lograrlo y tiene la seguridad que alcanzara el éxito, en esta nueva temporada de siembra quiere aumentar la producción y comprar insumos por mayor por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita  comprar semilla de maíz, frijol, abono, fertilizante, herramienta etc. Ana Mirian de Jesús es una persona muy responsable y con buenas referencias de pago tiene la certeza que  cancelara la deuda y al mismo tiempo confía en que su familia tendrá una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Ana Mirian de Jesús lives with her partner and their children in their own house. She has been growing corn and beans for a living for some years. Working in agriculture is very important for her as she loves her work and it is her source of income for maintaining her home. Over time, she has gained the experience that enables her to make better profits and, at the same time, improve the quality of her work more every day. Her fields are located close to her home and she sells in all the surrounding places. She has many customers because, as well as being a good salesperson, she always sets low prices. Ana Mirian is a visionary woman with many goals that she wants to achieve. She is striving hard to reach them and to achieve success. In this new sowing season, she wants to increase her production and to buy supplies in bulk and so she is requesting a loan from INTEGRAL that will enable her to buy corn and bean seed, fertilizer, tools, etc. Ana Mirian de Jesús is a very responsible person with good references. She is sure that she will repay the loan and, at the same time, trust that her family will have a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy corn and bean seeds, fertilizer, and tools.

loans.name: Mario Antonio

texts.es: Mario Antonio de 41 años de edad, una persona muy alegre y entusiasta, vive junto a su esposa y dos hijos menores de edad, quienes se dedican a estudiar. Desde hace 30 años que Mario trabaja en el cultivo de maíz y frijoles, trabajo gracias al cual ha  podido salir adelante y criar a sus hijos. Mario desea aumentar su cultivo para poder ofrecerle más a sus clientes y así aumentar sus ventas, motivo por el que solicita un préstamo a INTEGRAL, por medio del cual pueda comprar todo los insumos necesarios como: maíz, frijoles, pesticidas y abono para realizar una mejor siembra de granos, los cuales espera comercializarlos a un buen precio y de esta forma poder aumentar sus ingresos, lo que es muy primordial para Mario puesto que solo de esta manera contara con una vida mejor para sus hijos y esposa.
texts.en: Mario Antonio is 41 years old and is a very happy and enthusiastic person.  He lives with his wife and two children who attend school.  Mario has been raising corn and beans for thirty years, thanks to which he has been able to get ahead and raise his children.  Mario wants to increase his crops and is requesting a loan through INTEGRAL so that he can buy the necessary supplies such as corn, beans, pesticides, and fertilizer to have a better crop of grains, which he expects to sell at a good price and increase his income.  This is very important to Mario, because this is the only way he can provide a better life for his children and his wife.

loans.use: to buy farming supplies.

loans.name: Kebbeh

texts.en: Kebbeh lives in West Point. She is 25 years old and is married.  She has a child, aged 4.  Her husband is a businessman. For the past  four years, Kebbeh has been selling oil, rice and salt in  the local market.  Her husband helps her in this business.  She likes this business because she is able to earn her own money and assist her husband with the home. She is requesting a loan to purchase more rice, oil, vita, and other items for the business.  Her future plan is to build a house and educate her child.

loans.use: to purchase more  rice, oil , vita, and other items for the business.

loans.name: Marta Lilian

texts.es: Marta Lilian de cincuenta años de edad vive junto a su compañero de vida Abelino  y sus hijos Lilian y Kevin; ella posee una funeraria en el que vende ataúdes y además presta el servicio de atención a las familias que desean que el cuerpo de su familiar fallecido sea velado en las instalaciones de la funeraria, el servicio que presta Marta es muy humanitario, lo hace desde hace ya un buen tiempo y le ha dado buenos resultados, adicional a esto para complementar los gastos del hogar se dedica a la venta de ropa en local independiente, tiene clientela fija que le garantiza que las personas están satisfechas con sus servicios y artículos; Marta es una mujer que le gusta mantenerse al frente de la competencia para poder alcanzar más rápido el éxito; tiene muchas metas y una de ellas es acrecentar sus negocios, necesita invertir, por eso solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar ataúdes y variedad de ropa. Marta Lilian tiene buena referencia de pago y una excelente moral, esta segura además que con este esfuerzo logrará dar una mejor calidad de vida a su familia.
texts.en:
Marta Lilian, age 50, lives with her life partner, Abelino, and her children, Lilian and Kevin.

She has a funeral home where she sells coffins.  She also provides service to the families of the deceased who wish to have a wake at the funeral home.  The service that Marta provides is very humanitarian.  She has been doing it for a good amount of time, and it has given her good results. 

She also sells clothes at an independent place in order to help with the household expenses.  She has fixed clientele, and she guarantees that people will be satisfied with her services and her merchandise.  Marta is a woman who likes to stay ahead of the competition in order to be able to be successful more quickly.

She has a lot of goals, and one of them is to increase her businesses.  She needs to invest, and that is why she is requesting a loan from Integral.  A loan would allow her to buy coffins and a variety of clothes.

Marta Lilian has good payment history and is of excellent moral character.  She is sure that with this effort she will manage to give her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy coffins and a variety of clothes like skirts, pants, and shirts.

loans.name: Chicas Bonitas Group

texts.es:
El grupo Chicas Bonitas lo conforman cuatro personas trabajadoras y emprendedoras  la coordina del grupo es Otilia Raquel es casada y tiene tres hijos de los cuales los dos menores están a su cargo de 15 y 9 años de edad los cuales estudian. Ella se dedica a la venta de productos plásticos desde panas, vasos, baldes, platos…etc. Este negocio lo inicio hace 9 años con la motivación de una señora quien le dio un pequeño lugar para que ella empezara a vender unos pocos productos como una docena de productos  y después fue creciendo el negocio.
El  crédito lo invertirá en mercadería en el negocio y su meta es construir su cuarto.
Las otras integrantes son Gloria María quien vende productos Avon desde hace 2 años, Liseth de los Ángeles  quien vende gaseosa, café, frescos, leche y pan desde hace 5 años y Yadira  quien se dedica a la venta de trajes típicos, vestidos de niña y cotonas.
texts.en:
The loan group Chicas Bonitas is comprised of 4 hardworking, enterprising people. The coordinator of the group is Otilia Raquel. She is married and has 3 children of which the 2 youngest are in her care - they are 15 and 9 years old and are in school. She works selling plastic goods such as bowls, jugs, buckets, dishes, etc. She started this business 9 years ago with the encouragement of a woman who gave her a small place where she could start selling a few goods and then the business starting growing. 
She will use the loan to invest in supplies for her business and her goal is to build her room.
The other members are Gloria María, who has been selling Avon products for 2 years; Lisbeth de los Ángeles, who has been selling sodas, coffee, juices, milk and bread for 5 years; and Yadira, who sells the local folk costumes, girls' dresses, and coats.

loans.use: to buy plastic goods (jugs, dishes, buckets, etc.)

loans.name: Rodrigo

texts.en: Rodrigo is a father of five children. He is engaged in a corn farm business. He has been in this field for five years and earns 38,000 Philippines pesos (PHP) every harvest season. He works hard to give his children a good quality of life and lift them from poor living conditions. At this time, Rodrigo wants a loan of PHP 40,000 to buy corn seedlings and fertilizers and to pay for labor cost for planting. He hopes to grow his business and harvest more corn to sell.

loans.use: to buy corn seedlings and fertilizers and to pay for labor cost for planting

loans.name: José Alberto

texts.es: José Alberto de treinta y cinco años de edad vive junto a sus padres y sobrinos, él se dedica a la agricultura específicamente al cultivo de maíz y frijol, tiene varios años de trabajar en este rubro y se ha hecho de mucha clientela, sus cosechas son las  mejores por eso las personas prefieren comprarle a José, debido a esto, con el tiempo se ha hecho de mucha clientela fija,  pues las personas saben que todo lo que vende es de primera calidad y a precios muy accesibles  además el servicio es excelente; José es un hombre visionario con muchas ganas de salir adelante, siempre está a la expectativa de nuevas oportunidades que le permitan llegar al éxito, quiere aumentar la producción pero necesita invertir en insumos agrícolas por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar semilla de maíz, frijol, fertilizante, herramienta, etc. José Alberto tiene muy buenas referencias y es muy responsable, tiene la certeza que podrá cancelar la deuda y a la vez podrá ofrecerle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
José Alberto is 35 years old and lives together with his parents and nephews. He works in agriculture; specifically, he grows corn and beans. He has been in this line of work for several years and has built a large customer base for himself. José's crops are the best, so people prefer to buy from him. Because people know that everything he sells is of the highest quality, his prices are accessible, and the service is excellent, José—with time—has built a large base of regular customers.

José is a visionary man with a great desire to get ahead in life. He is always on the lookout for new opportunities that might help him succeed. He wants to increase his production, but he needs to invest in agricultural supplies. That's why he is requesting a loan from INTEGRAL that will allow him to buy corn and bean seed, fertilizer, tools, etc. 

José Alberto has very good references and is very responsible. He is certain that he will be able to pay off his debt and, at the same time, offer his family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase corn and bean seed, fertilizers, and tools.

loans.name: Cesar Edgardo

texts.es: Cesar Edgardo vive junto a su compañera de vida y sus hijos, él se dedica al cultivo de maíz y frijol tiene muchos años de dedicarse a la agricultura y se siente orgulloso porque ha logrado obtener mucha experiencia que le permitirá día con día mejorar sus cosechas, las tierras de cultivo son propias y están ubicadas en una zona muy agrícola, el recibe todo el apoyo de su familia ellos le ayudan a comerciar en todos los lugares aledaños ya tiene mucha clientela pues la gente lo prefiere por la calidad del producto por los buenos precios y por el buen servicio; Cesar es un hombre emprendedor, dedicado a su labor siempre esta con las ganas de superarse y llegar al éxito,  la temporada pasada tuvo pérdidas y no logró las ganancias esperadas, por eso para esta siembra quiere aumentar la producción y recuperarse pero necesita de capital que lo respalde porque todas sus compras son al contado, es así como decidió solicitarle a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar semilla de maíz, frijol, fertilizante, herramientas etc. Cesar Edgardo es responsable con buenas referencias crediticias tiene la certeza que podrá cancelar el financiamiento y a la vez darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
César Edgardo lives with his life companion and his children. He grows corn and beans, and has many years of working in agriculture. He feels proud because he has managed to acquire a great deal of experience that will allow him, day by day, to improve his harvests. 

He owns his own farmland, located in an area devoted to farming. He receives the full support of his family. They help him to sell in all the neighboring places. He already has a considerable clientele, as people prefer him because of the quality of his product, the good prices, and good service. 

César is an enterprising man devoted to his work, always eager to improve himself and achieve success.  

Last season he had losses, and didn't achieve the profits he hoped for. That is why for this planting season, he wants to increase production and recover his losses. But he needs the backing of working capital, because all his purchases are in cash. 

This is how he decided to apply to Integral for a loan that will allow him to buy corn and bean seeds, fertilizers and tools, etc. 

César Edgardo is responsible, with good credit references. He is certain he will be able to pay back the loan, and at the same time give his family a better quality of life.

loans.use: To buy corn and bean seeds, fertilizers and tools.

loans.name: Los Tres Pinos Group

texts.es:
El grupo los tres Pinos lo conforman tres personas trabajadoras y emprendedoras una de ellas es Margarita de 47 años, casada  tiene 7 hijos pero a su cargo solo los dos menores de 20 y 15 años de edad. Ella se  dedica al cultivo y la venta de cosechas de mango, tamarindo y pipián y con el crédito anterior además de lograr alquilar una manzana de tierra para la cosecha logro comprar cerdos.
Este préstamo lo invertirá en el cultivo de pipián y maíz.
Los otros integrantes son Mariana del Carmen quien desde hace 2 años tiene una pulpería y Pedro José quien comercializa ropa y cosméticos.
texts.en:
The loan group Los Tres Pinos is comprised of three hardworking and enterprising people. One of them is 47 year old Margarita. She is married and has 7 children but only the two youngest (who are 20 and 15) live at home. She works growing and selling mangoes, tamarind, and pumpkin. With a previous loan she was able to rent some land for her crops and to buy pigs.
The other members are Mariana del Carmen, who has had a grocery store for 2 years, and Pedro José, who sells clothes and cosmetics.

loans.use: to invest in cultivating pumpkins and corn.

loans.name: Jatu

texts.en:
Jatu lives in the West Point area.  She is 48 years old.  She is married and has 6 children.  The oldest one is 25 years old and the youngest one is 12 years of age.  All of them stay at home and four of them are in school. 

For the past 10 years,  Jatu has been selling charcoal in her community.  She makes a good profit because she is the only one who sells charcoal in her community.  Charcoal selling has improved her life. and she is able to help her husband with the home.  She has some difficulties during the rainy season.  She is requesting a loan to purchase more charcoal for her business.

loans.use: to purchase more charcoal for her business

loans.name: Feliciano

texts.en: Feliciano is 46 years old and married. Feliciano is a very responsible and loving person. He is engaged in raising crops. He plants corn. Feliciano is dedicated to agriculture and the sale of corn. This means that he can be around his family, helping to raise their quality of life and educate his two children. Feliciano has been characterized as a person who is hard working since he has been working in agriculture for seven years. This kind of work requires effort, dedication, and above all, strength. Agriculture can also include heavy work, meaning that people get tired quickly. In spite of this, Feliciano is determined to raise the level of living of his family and to improve the quality of the seeds he cultivates.

loans.use: to buy corn seed and fertilizer for his farm.

loans.name: Mecelinda

texts.en: At the age of 48, Mecelinda is very productive through her Vita Plus business, which she has been operating for five years. In order to attain her dream of enabling her three children to remain in school until they have finished their desired courses, Mecelinda wishes to increase her income. She is therefore requesting a loan of PHP 10,000 to buy more Vita Plus products, including vitamins, to achieve that goal.

loans.use: to buy various Vita Plus products.

loans.name: Hawa

texts.en: Hawa lives in the West Point area.  She is 39 years old.  She is married and has four children between the ages of 3 and 20 years.  Three of them stay at home with their parents, while one of the children lives with their aunt. Hawa's husband is a photographer.  She has been selling door locks ,nails and hinges for the past 15 years.  Her husband helps her in this business.  She is proud of this business because she is able to contribute in her home.  She has few resources so she is requesting a loan to purchase more nails, door locks and hinges for the business. She plans to build a house for her children.

loans.use: to purchased more nails, door locks, and hinges for the business

loans.name: Merlito

texts.en:
Merlito is a farmer who lives in Pinopoc with his children. He is already widowed and carries the burden alone in supporting his children's needs especially for school expenses. He has nine children. Five of them already got married while the rest still attend school. Through his income from his farming business, he was able to support their needs.

Merlito had been planting and harvesting rice to sell for over 20 years now. He still aspires to make improvements to his crop production so he is now asking for a loan of P15,000 to to buy fertilizers and insecticides used in farming. This will help ensure a healthier crop growth.

Merlito hopes to achieve abundant crops every harvest season to earn more funds. Additional revenue will be invested in the education of his children to someday achieve a better way of living.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and insecticides used in farming

loans.name: Vannak

texts.en: Vannak is 49 years old. She is married and is blessed with three children.  She lives in Kampong Kandal Province, Cambodia. She has been involved in the agricultural business for more than ten years, and is successful in her career.  She is involved in growing crops. She earns approximately $3 per day.  Her husband is a construction worker who earns about $5 per day.  Two of her children are employed in a garment factory. They earn about $6 per day. Because her farmland is flooded, Vannak is requesting a loan of $1000 to purchase soil to fill up her farmland.  By doing so, she will be able to grow vegetables and other crops in both the rainy season and the dry season. In the future, she would like to expand her business and build a new house as soon as possible.

loans.use: to purchase dirt to fill up her farmland

loans.name: Ricardo

texts.en:
Ricardo is a hardworking man. He raises his family and gives them enough sustenance through his farming business. He works untiringly in his rice field in order to grow healthier crops and harvest them abundantly. He usually earns about P12,000 each harvest season twice a year. It goes to meals and allowances for his children.
 
Ricardo is now 53 years old and has two children. His spouse is a housekeeper. Ricardo is now borrowing a loan of P15,000 to buy fertilizers and insecticides used in farming. This will help maintain good crops for his farming business leading to an abundant harvest. This way, he will gain more profits from it which will lead to financial stability.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and insecticides used in farming

loans.name: Reynaldo Alcides

texts.es: Reynaldo Alcides de veintinueve años de edad vive junto a su compañera de vida los dos trabajan, él se dedica a la vende de productos de uso personal anti transpirante, cremas, perfumes, entre otros, tiene varios años de poseer este pequeño negocio y lo realiza de manera ambulante, ya tiene mucha clientela pues la gente lo prefiere porque llega hasta las puertas de sus hogares con producto de calidad y a un buen precio, adicional a esto Reynando trabaja en una tienda con esto complementa los gastos de su casa; él es un hombre entregado a su labor, dispuesto a trabajar duro para en un futuro alcanzar el éxito está seguro que solo necesita de constancia y motivación; ha solicitado a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar artículos de uso personal perfumes, cremas, cosméticos etc. Reynando Alcides  tiene buen record crediticio y muy buenas referencias de pago, tiene la certeza que cancelara la deuda y a la vez le dará a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Reynaldo Alcides is 29, and lives with his life companion. Both of them work. He sells personal care products such as anti-perspirants, creams, perfumes and other items. 

He has owned this small business for several years, and does it door-to-door. He already has a large clientele, as people prefer him because he comes to the door of their home with quality products at a good price. In addition to this, Reynando works at a store and further contributes to the household expenses in this way. 

He is a man dedicated to his work, ready to work hard so that in the future he can attain success. He is sure that he only needs perseverance and motivation. 

He has applied to Integral for a loan that will allow him to buy personal care items such as perfumes, creams and cosmetics. Reynando Alcides has a good credit record and good payment references. He is certain that he will repay the debt, and at the same time provide his family with a better quality of life.

loans.use: To buy perfumes, creams and cosmetics.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy leather, thread and buckles to make shoes

loans.name: María Edith

texts.es: María Edith de cuarenta y seis años de edad vive junto a sus tres hijos; ella se dedica a la venta de tortillas pollo asado y carne asada, tiene varios años de poseer el negocio y está orgullosa de que con todo ese tiempo ha adquirido experiencia valiosa que le permite mejorar cada día para que los clientes estén satisfechos, el puesto está ubicado en una zona muy estratégica pues no se encuentra ningún negocio similar  en los alrededores , es por esta razón que se ha hecho de mucha clientela además las personas saben que todo lo que comercia es de primera calidad, a buenos precios y con un servicio muy rápido, adicional a esto María vende producto por catálogo, cremas, perfumes, etc. que le ayuda a complementar los gastos del hogar; es una mujer visionaria con muchas ganas de salir adelante y cumplir sus sueños, uno de ellos es acrecentar el negocio pero necesita invertir en insumos por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar maíz por mayor, pollo, carne, producto o por catálogo. María es muy responsable y con buenas referencias de crédito está segura que podrá saldar la deuda y a la vez darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
María Edith is 46, and lives with her three children. She sells tortillas, grilled chicken and meat, and has owned her business for several years. She is proud of the fact that in all this time, she has acquired valuable experience that allows her to improve each day, so that her customers are satisfied. 

Her stand is located in a very strategic area, as there is no similar business in the neighborhood. It is for this reason that she has acquired a large clientele. Also, people know that everything she sells is top quality, well-priced, with very fast service. 

In addition to this, María sells products by catalog, such as creams, perfumes, etc. which helps her further contribute to the household expenses. She is a visionary woman, with a strong desire to succeed and fulfill her dreams. 

One of these is to make her business grow, but she needs to invest in supplies, and this is why she is applying to Integral for a loan that will allow her to buy corn at wholesale, chicken, beef, as well as catalog products.

María is very responsible, with good credit references. She is sure she will be able to repay the debt and at the same time provide her family with a better  quality of life.

loans.use: To buy corn at wholesale, chicken, meat, as well as catalog products.

loans.name: Srey Touch

texts.en: Srey Touch is 42 years old. She is the mother of four children and resides with her husband in Kandal Province, Cambodia. She has been running a tailoring shop at home for more than four years, earning approximately $2 per day. Her husband is involved in fishing and earns about $3 per day. Three of her children are employed. They earn about $6 per day. In order to improve her husband’s business, Srey Touch is requesting a loan of $700 to purchase an engine boat for her husband to use in his fishing. This purchase would enable him to go to the fishing site faster and generate more income to support the family. In the future, she would like to expand her business and build a fence around her house.

loans.use: to purchase an engine boat for her husband to use in his fishing

loans.name: Oeur

texts.en:
Oeur is 50 years old. She is the mother of five children and resides with her husband in Kandal Province, Cambodia. She has been involved in fattening up cattle for more than three years, earning approximately $3 per day. Her husband is a construction worker who earns about $4 per day. Three of her children are employed. They earn about $9 per day. 

Due to the difficulty of her family’s transportation, Oeur is requesting a loan of $800 to purchase a motorbike for commuting. This purchase would enable her to use the money she saves on transportation expenses to support her family. In the future, she would like to expand her cattle farm and help her youngest child earn a bachelor’s degree. Moreover, she hopes to rebuild her house to make it bigger and more comfortable for her family.

loans.use: to purchase a motorbike for commuting

loans.name: Merlita

texts.en:
Merlita is 56 years old and widowed with two grown children. She has been running a general store for the past 10 years. She works hard to provide for her family and save for her future needs especially since she's getting older.

Merlita is requesting a 25,000 PHP loan through ASKI to buy grocery items to sell such as cup noodles, soap, toothbrushes, and toothpaste. In the future, she aspires to save money to expand her business as well as improve her family's living conditions.

loans.use: to buy grocery items to sell such as cup noodles, soap, toothbrushes, and toothpaste.

loans.name: Víctor Manuel

texts.es: Víctor Manuel de cuarenta y ocho años de edad vive junto a su compañera de vida y sus ocho hijos; él se dedica al cultivo de maíz y frijol desde hace mucho tiempo, tiene mucha experiencia en el rubro la cual utiliza a la hora de sembrar, el terreno está ubicado en una zona agrícola cerca de su vivienda; el comercia en todos los alrededores  y se ha hecho de mucha clientela fija que lo prefiere por la calidad, los buenos precios y el buen servicio, adicional a  esto trabaja con la crianza de ganado que le ayuda a complementar los gastos del hogar; Víctor es un hombre entregado a su labor, siempre dispuesto a aprovechar todas las oportunidades que se le presentan, quiere ganarse un futuro más próspero por eso se esfuerza el doble día a día, está decidido a aumentar la producción en sus tierras pero necesita de apoyo de capital para la compra de insumos por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar semilla de maíz, frijol, fertilizante, herbicida etc. Víctor Manuel tiene buenas referencias  de pago, es muy responsable por eso tiene la certeza que podrá saldar el financiamiento y a la vez darle a su familia una vida plena.
texts.en:
Victor Manuel is 48 years old and lives with his life partner and his eight children. He has been making a living growing corn and beans for a long time and has a lot of experience in the area which he utilizes during planting time. The land is located in an agricultural zone close to his home. He sells in all of the surrounding areas and has established a large set clientele whom prefer him for the quality, good prices and good service. 

In addition to this work, he raises livestock that helps to supplement his household income. Victor is a man who is very dedicated to his work, always disposed to take advantage of all opportunities that are presented to him. He hopes to have a more prosperous future; as such he puts in double effort each day. 

He has decided to increase the production on his land but needs capital support for the purchase of supplies. This is why he is requesting a loan from Integral that would allow him to buy corn seeds, beans, fertilizer, herbicides, etc. Victor Manuel has good payment references and is very responsible. As such, he is certain that he will be able to pay off the financing and at the same time give his family a full life.

loans.use: to buy corn seeds, beans, fertilizer and herbicide.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy corn wholesale, firewood, and milk.

loans.name: Fatimah

texts.en: Fatimah is a 30-year-old married woman from Ashrafia, Amman, Jordan and the mother of two children. Fatimah is a microentrepreneur; she sells electrical home appliances. She is requesting a loan of 1,500 JD to purchase more stock for trading purposes. Fatimah is looking to improve her family's living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase electrical home appliances to sell

loans.name: Amneh

texts.en:
Amneh is a 26-year-old married woman from Ashrafia, Amman, Jordan. She supports two members of her family.

Amneh sells cleaning products and has requested a loan of 400 JOD to purchase more cleaning products for trading purposes. She hopes to establish her own store to increase her income and improve her business. Since Amneh is under 30 years, her loan is considered a youth loan.

loans.use: to purchase cleaning products for trading purposes.

loans.name: Muna

texts.en:
Muna is a 33-year-old married woman from Al Aqaba, Jordan. She supports three members of her family.

Muna is requesting a loan of 550 JOD to purchase new furniture for her house and improve her family's living conditions. She is also looking to purchase her own car.

loans.use: to purchase new furniture for her house.

loans.name: Ta

texts.en:
Ta is 26 years old. She is married and resides with two children in Prey Veng Province, Cambodia. She has been employed in a garment factory for more than 4 years, earning approximately $3 per day. Her husband is also employed in a garment factory. He earns about $3 per day. 

Due to difficulties with her family’s transportation, Ta is requesting a loan of $1200 to purchase a motorbike for commuting. This purchase would enable her to use the saved money on her transportation expenses to support the family. 

In the future, she would like to run an additional business to generate extra income to support the family and send her children to a good school. Moreover, she hopes to rebuild her present house to make it bigger and more convenient for her family.

loans.use: to purchase a motorbike for commuting.

loans.name: Eart

texts.en:
Eart is 49 years old. She is a mother of two children and resides with her husband in Kampong Cham Province, Cambodia. She is a homemaker. Her husband runs the taxi service and earns about $8 per day. Her children are employed. They earn about $6 per day. 

Due to the difficulty in her family’s transportation, Eart is requesting a loan of $1,400 to purchase a motorbike to commute. This purchase would enable her to use the saved money on her transportation expenses to support her family and help her children go to work on time. In the future, she would like to build a new house to provide better living conditions for her family.

loans.use: to purchase a motorbike to commute.

loans.name: Zaher

texts.en: Zaher is a 41-year-old married woman from Madaba, Jordan. She is supporting four members of her family. Zaher has a home-based grocery store. She is requesting a loan of 700 Jordanian dinars to purchase goods and products for her store. Zaher is looking to improve her store.

loans.use: to purchase goods and products for her grocery store

loans.name: Mervat

texts.en:
Mervat is a conservative person. She is unwilling to upload her picture on the internet. The man in the photo is her husband.

Mervat has a home-based grocery store and is working hand-in-hand with her husband to ensure better life conditions for their family. She is requesting a loan of 800 JOD to purchase grocery goods and products for trading purposes.

loans.use: to purchase grocery goods for trading purposes.

loans.name: Franklin Bernabé

texts.es: Franklin Bernabé de veintinueve años de edad vive junto a su compañera de vida y sus hijos en casa propia; el posee una panadería y vende pan el variedad francés y dulce,  quesadillas, salpores, pastelitos, tortas entre otros, es muy conocido en la zona pues elabora el pan más exquisito del lugar, el rico aroma que se siente cuando el pan está recién hecho atrae mucha clientela y se siente muy satisfecho al ver que las personas se van contentas del lugar, todo lo que vende es de primera calidad, y a precios accesibles además el servicio es excelente, adicional a esto también poseen una pequeña tienda con la que complementan el gasto del hogar; Franklin es un hombre visionario con muchas ganas de ganarse un futuro más próspero, piensa que si tiene un comienzo tendrá la lucha y si tiene la lucha lograra la victoria, ahora está buscando la lucha quiere acrecentar el negocio pero necesita de capital por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar harina por mayor,  manteca, jaleas, azúcar, sal, bandejas, etc. Franklin Bernabé es muy responsable y con un buen record crediticio tiene confianza que podrá saldar la deuda pero sobre todo tiene fe que podrá darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Franklin Bernabé is 29 years old and lives with his life partner and children in his own house. He owns a bakey where he sells french and sweet breads, quesadillas, 'salpores', cakes and pies, among other items.He is well know in his area because he makes the most exquisite bread around. The rich aroma that is made when the bread is recently made attracts many customers, making his very satisfied at seeing them leave the place content. 

All that he sells is of high quality and at accessible prices, in addition to having excellent service. He also owns a small store which supplements his household income. Franklin is a visionary man with much desire to have a more prosperous future. He believes that if he has a start he will be challenged and if he is challenged, he will reach victory. Now he is seeking a challenge of wanting to expand his business but needs capital. As such, he is requesting a loan from INTEGRAL that will allow him to purchase wholesale flour, butter, jelly, sugar, salt, trays, etc. Franklin Bernabé is very responsible and with his good credit record he has confidence that he will be able to pay off his debt, but above all he has the faith that he will be able to give his family a higher quality of life.

loans.use: to buy butter, jelly, sugar, salt and trays wholesale.

loans.name: Sa Aem

texts.en: Sa Aem is 61 years old from Kampong Cham province, Cambodia. She is widowed and blessed with three children. She is a homemaker. Her children are employed. They are construction workers and a cosmetics seller. They earn about $18 per day. In order to improve her family’s finances, Sa Aem is requesting a loan of $1000 to purchase more cosmetics for her child to resell. By doing so, she will earn more profit to support her family. In the future, she would like to expand her business and build a new house as soon as possible.

loans.use: to purchase more cosmetics for her child to resell

loans.name: Khadra

texts.en:
Khadra is a conservative person. She is unwilling to upload her picture on the internet. The man in the photo is her son. 

Khadra is a 46-year-old married woman from Irbid, Jordan. She supports four members of her family.

Khadra is looking to improve her family's living conditions. She is requesting a loan of 600 JOD to do maintenance on her house. One of her aspirations is  to add another room to her house.

loans.use: to do maintenance on her house.

loans.name: Sonia Elizabeth

texts.es: Sonia Elizabeth de cuarenta y dos años de edad vive junto a su compañero de vida Samuel y su hija de dieciséis años; ella posee una panadería en el lugar de su domicilio y tiene gran variedad de pan dulce y salado, francés, quesadillas, pastelitos, cachos, tortas entre otros, es muy conocida en la zona pues elabora el mejor pan con un sabor inigualable, comercia también en diferentes tiendas de la zona y eso ha hecho que aumente la clientela pues las personas saben que todo es de calidad a precios accesibles y con un servicio excelente; Sonia Elizabeth es una mujer dedicada a su labor, siempre dispuesta a aprovechar las oportunidades que se le presentan, piensa en grande y se esfuerza por cumplir sus sueños, quiere acrecentar el negocio, invertir en insumos para aumentar la producción pero necesita de un apoyo de capital por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar harina por mayor, azúcar, levadura, jaleas, etc. Sonia tiene muy buenas referencias de pago y es responsable confía en que saldara el financiamiento y a la vez llevara a su hogar seguridad económica.
texts.en:
Sonia Elizabeth is 42 years old and lives with her life partner Samuel and their 16 year old daughter. She owns a bakery in her home and has a large variety of sweet and savory breads, french breads, quesadillas, small cakes, "cachos" and pies, among others. She is very well known in the area because she makes the best bread with an unrivaled flavor. She also sells in different stores in the area and this has made her clientele increase because they know that all of it is high quality at affordable prices and with excellent service.

Sonia Elizabeth is a woman who is very dedicated to her work. She is always disposed to take advantage of opportunities that are presented to her. She thinks big and puts in the effort to fulfill her dreams. She wants to grow her business by investing in supplies that would increase her production but needs capital support. For this reason she is requesting a loan from INTEGRAL that would allow her to purchase wholesale flour, sugar, yeast, jelly, etc. Sonia has very good payment references and is responsible. She is confident that she will pay back the financing and at the same time bring economic security to her household.

loans.use: to buy wholesale flour, sugar, yeast and jelly.

loans.name: Thim

texts.en: Thim is 46 years old. She is the mother of four children and lives with her husband in Kampong Cham province, Cambodia. She has been selling groceries for more than two years, earning approximately $7 per day. Her husband runs a service of cutting trees in the village. He earns about $8 per day. Two of her children are employed. They earn about $6 per day. In order to improve her family’s finances, Thim is requesting a loan of $1500 to purchase more groceries to resell. By doing so, she will generate more income to support her family. In the future, she would like to rebuild her grocery store to make it bigger and help her children earn bachelor’s degrees. Moreover, she hopes to rebuild her house to make it more comfortable for the family.

loans.use: to purchase more groceries to resell

loans.name: Nour

texts.en:
Nour is a 25-year-old married woman from Al Zarqa, Amman, Jordan.
She is looking to improve her family living conditions so she is requesting a loan of 500 JD to do maintenance work on her house.
Nour is looking to purchase a house for her family instead of their current rented one.
Because Nour is under 30 years old, her loan is considered as a youth loan.

loans.use: to do maintenance work on her house

loans.name: Margot Alicia

texts.es: Margot Alicia de cincuenta y siete años de edad vive junto a su hijo, ella posee un chalet donde vende productos de primera necesidad frijoles, pan, leche, huevos, entre otros, además los viernes y sábados vende pescado; tiene varios años con el negocio y es muy conocida en el lugar se ha hecho de mucha clientela pues todo lo que comercia es de primera calidad y a precios accesibles además el servicio es excelente; Margot es una mujer emprendedora muy dedicada a su labor, piensa que el futuro pertenece a quienes creen en la belleza de sus sueños,  quiere ver crecer su negocio y necesita invertir en insumos por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar granos básicos, producto instantáneo, golosinas, bebidas, etc. Margot es muy responsable y de buena paga tiene la certeza que podrá pagar el financiamiento y a la vez darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Margot Alicia is 57 years old and lives with her child. She owns a chalet where she sells staple products like beans, bread, milk and eggs, among other iterms. In addition, she sells fish on Fridays and Saturdays. She has had the business for several years and is very well known in the area and has many customers because all that she sells is of high quality, at affordable prices and the service is excellent. 

Margot is a entrepreneurial woman who is very dedicated to her work. She hopes that the future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams. She wants to see her business grow and needs to invest in supplies. For this reason she is requesting a loan from INTEGRAL so that she will be able to purchase staple grains, instant products, candy, drinks, etc. Margot is very responsible and a good pay reputation. She is certain that she will be able to pay back the loan and at the same time give her a family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy staple grains, instant products, candy and drinks.

loans.name: Amal

texts.en:
Amal is a conservative person. She is unwilling to upload her picture on the internet so the man in the photo is her husband.
Amal is a 50-year-old married woman from Ashrafia, Amman in Jordan, and she supports 4 members of her family.
Amal has a small grocery store. She is requesting a loan of 499 JD to purchase food goods and products.
Amal is looking to increase her family income and provide them with better living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase food goods and products for her grocery store

loans.name: Choan

texts.en: Choan is a responsible father who is managing a rice mill business to support his family needs. He is now 36 years old and has four school-age children. Due to financial difficulty, he cannot afford to finance the repair and maintenance of his business as well as the schooling of their children. In this regard, Choan decided to increase their proceeds. He is now requesting for a loan of P25,000 to be utilized in repairing and maintaining his rice mill business. He hopes that through his patience and hard work, he will increase his income. In the future, they are hoping that their children will earn a degree and have a better life.

loans.use: to repair and maintain his rice mill business

loans.name: Mercedes

texts.es: Mercedes vive junto a su hija de dieciséis años la cual todavía estudia; Ella se dedica a la venta de pupusas de queso, frijol con queso y revueltas, además por las tardes vende tortillas, tiene varios años con el negocio y se ha hecho de mucha experiencia, se ha hecho de mucha clientela la gente la prefiere porque sus pupusas son exquisitas elaboradas con material de primera calidad y a precios accesibles además el servicio es el más rápido del lugar siempre está a la orden del día; Mercedes es una mujer trabajadora muy entusiasta de cumplir sus sueños su más grande secreto para alcanzar el éxito es la constancia y dedicación, quiere hacer crecer su negocio y necesita invertir en insumos por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito  que le permita comprar maíz por mayor, quesillo, frijol, verduras etc. Mercedes tiene buenas referencias crediticias y es muy responsable asegura que podrá saldar la deuda y a la vez logrará darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Mercedes lives with her sixteen year old daughter who is still in school.  She sells cheese, beans with cheese and mixed beans, cheese and fried pork skin pupusas (filled tortillas that are grilled and topped with sliced cabbage) besides selling tortillas in the afternoons.  She has been in this business for some years and she has a lot of experience.  She has many customers who prefer her pupusas because they are delicious, made with first quality ingredients and are reasonably priced.  Also she serves the fastest in the area and each day she is always ready to take care of her customers.  Mercedes is a hardworking woman and very enthuiastic about fulfilling her dreams.  Her biggest secret in this is her consistency and dedication.  She wants her business to grow and she needs to buy ingredients and that is why she is requesting a loan from INTEGRAL.  This financing will allow her to buy corn wholesale, cheese, beans, vegetables, etc.  Mercedes has a good credit history and she is very responsible.  She assures us that she will be able to get out of debt and at the same time succeed in giving her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy corn wholesale, cheese, beans and vegetables

loans.name: Nehaya

texts.en:
Nehaya is a conservative person. She is unwilling to upload her picture on the internet, so the man in the photo is her husband.
Nehaya is a 36-year-old married woman from Irbid, Jordan, and she is supporting 2 members of her family.
Nehaya is looking to improve her family living conditions, so she is requesting a loan of 500 JD to do maintenance work on her house.
Nehaya is looking to purchase her own personal computer and renew her house furniture.

loans.use: to do maintenance work on her house

loans.name: Kayi

texts.fr:
Kayi est une femme de 35 ans. Elle est mariée à un transporteur et est mère de 4 enfants. Trois de ses enfants sont scolarisés. Le plus vieux a 11 ans et le plus jeune 2 ans.
Kayi est revendeuse ambulante depuis 2004. Elle propose à ses clients des tissus et des pagnes. Elle souffre d’un manque d’argent ce qui l’empêche d’avoir un stock consistant.
De fait, Kayi sollicite un premier prêt chez WAGES. Elle utilisera son crédit afin de s’approvisionner en marchandises. A terme, elle voudrait ouvrir une boutique de vente de pagnes et de tissus. Elle espère aussi pouvoir acheter un terrain.
texts.en:
Kayi is a 35-year-old woman. She is married to a man who works in transportation, and is a mother of four. Three of her children are in school. The eldest is 11 years old and the youngest is two years old.

Kayi has been a traveling saleswoman since 2004. She offers her customers fabric and pagnes [traditional cloth]. Her problem is a lack of money, which prevents her from having a substantial stock. 

This is why Kayi is seeking her first loan from WAGES. She will use her loan to bolster her stock. Eventually, she would like to open a boutique selling pagnes and fabric. She also hopes to be able to purchase some land.

loans.use: To purchase fabric and pagnes [traditional cloth].

loans.name: Reina Beatriz

texts.es: Reina Beatriz  de treinta y tres años de edad vive junto a su compañero de vida y sus hijos; ella se dedica a la agricultura específicamente al cultivo de maíz y sorgo, tiene muchos años de trabajar en este rubro y se ha hecho de experiencia muy valiosa que le permite obtener las mejores cosechas , el terreno de cultivo está ubicado en una zona de incidencia agrícola, ella comercia en todas las zonas aledañas y ya tiene mucha clientela fija, estas personas siempre prefieren su producto pues es de calidad y a precios realmente accesibles además el servicio es inigualable, adicional a su trabajo en el campo también en su vivienda posee una pequeña tienda que le da ganancias extras para el mantenimiento del hogar; Reina es una mujer dedicada a su labor, luchadora siempre dispuesta a trabajar duro para alcanzar el éxito, quiere aprovechar el auge de su negocio para aumentar la producción y así poder tener mejores ganancias, necesita invertir en insumos pero necesita de capital por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar semilla de maíz, sorgo, abono, insecticida, herramienta, etc. Reina Beatriz tiene buenas referencias de pago y está segura que podrá saldar su deuda a tiempo, y a la vez tiene la confianza que podrá darle a su familia la vida que se merecen.
texts.en: Reina Beatriz is 33 years old and lives with her life partner and their children.  She makes a living as a farmer, and grows corn and sorghum.  She has farmed for many years, and this valuable experience helps her to grow the best crops.  Her plot of land is located in an agricultural area.  Reina Beatriz sells her produce in all of the adjacent districts and already has a large group of loyal customers.  These individuals always prefer her produce, since it is high quality and she sells it for very affordable prices—plus her service is unbeatable.  In addition to her agricultural activities, Reina Beatriz also has a small store in her house that provides additional income for maintaining her home.  Reina Beatriz is very dedicated to her work, and is always ready to work hard so she can succeed.  She wants to make the most of her business’s growth so she can increase her production and thus have higher earnings.  She needs to invest in supplies but doesn’t have enough capital.  That is why Reina Beatriz is asking Apoyo Integral for a loan that will allow her to purchase corn and sorghum seeds, fertilizer, insecticide, and tools.  Reina Beatriz has good references and is confident that she will be able to pay off her debt on time.  She is also confident that she can provide her family with the life they deserve.

loans.use: to purchase corn and sorghum seeds, fertilizer, insecticide, and tools.

loans.name: Yamen

texts.en:
Yamen is a 31-year-old married man from Marka, Amman, Jordan.
Yamen has his own Gaz van through which he sells Gaz cylinders to houses and shops.
Recently, Yamen purchased a shop for his business and he is requesting a loan of 400 JD to purchase more Gaz cylinders to fill his shop.

loans.use: to establish a Gaz cylinder for trading purposes

loans.name: Kossiwa

texts.fr:
Kossiwa est une femme célibataire et sans enfant.
Elle est revendeuse ambulante depuis 2008. Elle propose à ses clients des bazins et des pagnes. Cependant, elle souffre d’un manque d’argent chronique.
Kossiwa sollicite un premier prêt auprès de WAGES afin de s’approvisionner en bazins et pagnes. Elle aimerait réinvestir les profits supplémentaires dans l’activité. A terme, elle souhaiterait également ouvrir une boutique de vente et dégager des bénéfices qui puissent pourvoir aux besoins de la famille.
texts.en:
Kossiwa is a single woman with no children.

She has been a traveling saleswoman since 2008. She offers her customers damask and pagnes [traditional cloth]. However, she suffers from a chronic lack of money.

Kossiwa is seeking her first loan from WAGES in order to purchase damask and pagnes. She would like to reinvest the extra profits in her business. Eventually, she also hopes to open a shop and make a profit that can provide for the needs of the family.

loans.use: To purchase pagnes [traditional cloth] and damask.

loans.name: Ayoko

texts.fr:
Ayoko est une femme de 58 ans. Elle est mariée à un chef shipping et mère de trois enfants âgés entre 15 et 23 ans. 
Depuis 2000, Ayoko vend des oignons à son domicile. Elle souffre d’un retard dans ses livraisons. 
Ayoko sollicite un premier prêt chez WAGES afin d’étendre son activité, d’augmenter son capital et vendre de nouveaux produits comme l’ail et des épices.  Elle aimerait plus spécialement devenir une grande grossiste de vente d’oignons et ouvrir une grande boutique qu’elle confierait ensuite à ses enfants.
texts.en:
Ayoko is a 58-year-old woman. She is married to a shipping manager and is the mother of three children between the ages of 15 and 23.

Since 2000, Ayoko has been selling onions from her home. She is experiencing a delay in her deliveries.

Ayoko is seeking her first loan from WAGES in order to extend her business, increase her capital and sell new products, such as garlic and spices. She would especially like to become a major wholesaler of onions and open a large store, which she would then entrust to her children.

loans.use: To purchase onions.

loans.name: Komlan

texts.fr:
Komlan est un homme âgé de 35 ans. Marié à une revendeuse, il est aussi père d’un enfant de 7 ans. 
Menuisier de profession, il travaille le bois depuis 2005 à son domicile. 
Komlan sollicite un quatrième prêt chez WAGES afin d’acheter des planches pour la fabrication de fauteuils et d’armoires. Il souhaite réinjecter les profits supplémentaires dans la création d’une entreprise pour le traitement du bois (sciage, coupure…). A terme, il aimerait devenir un grand professionnel dans le domaine du bois et créer une école de formation en menuiserie.
texts.en:
Komlan is a 35-year-old man. Married to a retailer, he is also the father of seven children.

A carpenter by trade, he has been working with wood from his home since 2005.

Komlan is seeking his fourth loan from WAGES in order to purchase planks for the construction of chairs and cupboards. He hopes to reinvest the extra profits in the establishment of a business for wood treatments (sawing, cutting, etc.). Eventually, he would like to become a leading professional in the wood industry, and establish a carpentry training school.

loans.use: To purchase planks for the construction of furniture and cupboards.

loans.name: Emilio

texts.es: El señor Emilio, de 37 años de edad, esta casado con la señora Dionicia hace más de 16 años. Ambos cuentan con una instrucción de nivel primario con 4 hijos dependientes que estudian. Viven hace 15 años en la comunidad de 2da Candelaria, sindicato Rodeo Alto hacia el norte de Colomi. El señor Emilio y su esposa se dedican a la actividad agrícola y son muy trabajadores: venden papa, haba, oca y papaliza, los cuales cultivan en un terreno propio dentro de 7,800 hectáreas. Don Emilio con su esposa pasaron por nuestra oficina de CIDRE IFD a solicitar un crédito que les faltó urgentemente para comprar dos cabezas de ganado vacuno (yunta) para su uso en las faenas agrícolas. Se sienten muy felices al haber conseguido lo que más estaban necesitando; ahora sembrarán en más superficies ya que no tenían yunta para preparar terreno para la siembra de esta campaña agrícola.
texts.en:
Sr. Emilio is 37 years old and has been married to Sra. Dionicia for more than 16 years. Both of them have an elementary school education and together they have four dependent children who are in school. They have lived 15 years in the community of Candelaria, which is part of the Rodeo Alto syndicate and located north of Colomi.

Sr. Emilio and his wife are hardworking farmers who sell potatoes, beans, oca, and ulluco. They cultivate their own land, which measures 7,800 hectares. Don Emilio and his wife came to the offices of CIDRE IFD in order to request a loan. They are lacking urgent funds to purchase two head of cattle (oxen) for performing farm work. Emilio and his wife are pleased that they will be able to secure what they need most. They will now be able to plant on more of their land since they currently do not have the oxen required to perform the farm work.

loans.use: to buy oxen for performing farm work.

loans.name: Vanna

texts.en:
Vanna is 52 years old. He is the father of six children and lives with his wife in Siem Reap province, Cambodia. He has been involved in an agricultural business for more than 20 years and has extensive experience. He is successful in his career. He is involved in cultivating rice and fattening up animals. He earns approximately $5 per day. His wife runs a business buying freshwater eels and fish to resell. She earns about $6 per day. Three of his children are employed. They earn about $15 per day. 

Due to difficulties with his family’s transportation, Vanna is requesting a loan of $1000 to purchase a motorbike for commuting. This purchase will enable him to use money saved on his transportation expenses to support his family. In the future, he would like to expand his business and help his children earn bachelor’s degrees. Moreover, he hopes to build a new house as soon as possible.

loans.use: to purchase a motorbike for commuting

loans.name: Mario Alfonso

texts.es: Mario Alfonso de 43 años de edad, vive junto a su esposa y dos hijos, formando una familia muy unida y trabajadora. Mario  ha dedicado gran parte de su vida al cultivo de frijoles y maíz, una actividad muy usual en la zona rural del país. En la actualidad él junto a toda su familia se dedican a realizar este trabajo en una parcela en la cual también habitan. Mario solicita un préstamo por medio del cual pueda contar con el dinero necesario para invertir en la compra de mayor cantidad de maíz y frijoles para poder hacer crecer la siembra de su parcela y poder cosechar más granos básicos. Con el aumento de las ventas Mario tiene la certeza que podrá contar con una vida mejor junto a su familia.
texts.en: Mario Alfonso, 43, lives with his wife and two children, forming a united and hardworking family. Mario has dedicated a large part of his life to growing beans and corn, a typical activity in rural areas of the country. Currently he and his family do this work on a parcel of land where they also live.  Mario asks for a loan that will help him to have enough money to buy a larger quantity of corn and beans so he can increase how much he plants on his land and harvest more basic grains. With the increase in sales, Mario is certain that he and his family will have a better life together.

loans.use: to buy corn to plant.

loans.name: Sarom

texts.en:
Sarom is 43 years old, married, and blessed with three children, in Siem Reap Province, Cambodia. She has been involved in agricultural business for more than five years; she has extensive experience and is successful in her career. She is involved in cultivating rice and fattening up pigs. Approximately, she earns $6 per day. Her husband helps her run the business. Two of her children are employed, one as a security guard and the other as a construction worker. They earn about $8 per day. 

Due to the difficulty in her family’s transportation, Sarom is requesting a loan of $1,500 to purchase a motorbike to commute. This purchase would enable her to use the money she saves on transportation expenses to support her family. In the future, she would like to expand her pig farm and to rebuild her present house to make it more comfortable for her family.

loans.use: to purchase a motorbike to commute

loans.name: Godfrey

texts.en: Godfrey is a 34-year-old married man with five children living in Kagadi, Uganda. He is a teacher by profession and for the 12 years that he has been in service, he has been able to pay school fees for his children and build a semi-permanent house for a residence. He would like to educate his children and upgrade his studies as he is aiming to become a principal. Godfrey wants a loan to pay school fees for his children.

loans.use: to pay school fees for his children.

loans.name: Ahmad

texts.en:
Ahmad is a 31-year-old married man from Baqa'a, Jordan.

Ahmad has his own barber shop. He is requesting a loan of 400 Jordan dinars (JD) to purchase cosmetics products for his shop.

Ahmad is looking to establish another branch for his shop with an aspiration of purchasing a house for the family.

loans.use: to purchase cosmetics products for his barber shop.

loans.name: Richar Yefri

texts.es: Richar Yefri trabaja como mecánico y albañil, y también se dedica en época de cosecha a la siembra de frijoles y maíz, el vive junto a su esposa e hijos, y se destaca por ser una persona muy trabajadora y responsable quien trabaja muy duro por salir adelante.  Con el enorme deseo de aumentar su producción de granos básicos Richar solicita un préstamo a INTEGRAL, por medio del cual pueda contar con el dinero necesario para invertir en la compra de mayor cantidad de semilla de maíz y frijoles para sembrar, así mismo desea comprar unos depósitos para colocar la cosecha y de esta forma mantenerla siempre fresca. Richar junto a su esposa comercializan los granos básicos en diferentes tiendas y mercados, dándolos a muy buenos precios, con el préstamo también comprara abono y pesticidas para mantener sano los granos, y de esta forma asegurarse de brindar siempre la mejor calidad.
texts.en:
Richar Yefri works as a mechanic and bricklayer, and also works [during] the harvest season planting beans and corn.  He lives with his wife and children, and is noted for being a very hardworking and responsible person who works very hard to get ahead.  

With the overwhelming desire to increase his production of staple grains, Richar has requested Apoyo Integral for a loan.  Through [this loan], he would be able to rely on having the money needed to invest in the purchase of a greater quantity of maize and bean seeds to sow, as well as the purchase of storage areas to put the harvest in [for the purpose of] always keeping it fresh.  Richar, together with his wife, sell [their] staple grains to different shops and markets, giving them very good prices.  With the loan, he would also like to buy fertilizer and pesticides in order to maintain healthy grains; thus insuring [that he is] always offering the best quality.

loans.use: to purchase beans to harvest.

loans.name: Gerardo

texts.es:
Gerardo, está solicitando un nuevo préstamo para invertirlo en el negocio agrícola, pues considera tener una buena atención y un buen servicio con estos préstamos, que le ayudan a realizar su trabajo en la tierra, se comprará abono, herbicidas, insecticidas, que son necesarios para darle inicio a la siembra de maíz en una manzana de terreno.
El considera que a través de los préstamos kiva, está logrando mejorar su producción de granos básicos, le ha podido ayudar a su familia en este periodo y su condiciónes considera que van creciendo de la misma manera.
texts.en:
Gerardo is requesting a new loan so that he can invest in his farming business. He says that he has received good attention and good service with these loans, which have helped him complete the work on his land. Gerardo will buy compost, herbicides, and insecticides since these are necessary supplies that he needs to begin planting corn on one plot of land.

He believes the Kiva loans have enabled him to improve his production of basic grains. This helped his family during this period and his conditions improved at the same time.

loans.use: to buy compost, herbicides, and insecticides.

loans.name: Ana Ester

texts.es: Ana Ester  de cuarenta y dos años de edad vive junto a su compañero de vida y su hijo; él se dedica al cultivo de maíz, sorgo y frijol tiene varios años de dedicarse a la agricultura y ya tiene experiencia muy valiosa que le permite obtener siempre las mejores cosechas y a la vez le ayuda a mejorar su trabajo día con día, el terreno de siembra está ubicado en una zona de alta incidencia agrícola y está cercano a la localidad donde reside, comercia en todos los alrededores y se ha hecho de mucha clientela pues las personas saben que todo lo que vende es de muy buena calidad y a precios accesibles además se caracteriza por su gran amabilidad con los clientes; Ana es una mujer emprendedora, muy entregada a su labor, siempre está dispuesta a buscar oportunidades que le ayuden a llegar al éxito y no piensa rendirse; en la última temporada de siembra tuvo muchas pérdidas debido al clima, por eso en esta ocasión quiere recuperarse  e invertir en insumos para aumentar la producción por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar semilla de maíz, sorgo, frijol, fertilizante, herramientas, etc. Ana Ester tiene buen record crediticio y muy buenas referencias de pago tiene la seguridad que podrá saldar la deuda y a la vez darle a su familia la calidad de vida que se merecen.
texts.en:
Ana Ester is 42 years old and lives with her life partner and her son.  She makes a living by growing corn, sorghum and beans.  She has many years of  valuable experience that allows her to grow the best crops and better her job day by day.  The land where she plants her seeds is located in high altitude and is near her home.  She does business in many places and has built a strong customer base.  Her customers know that everything she sells is of high quality and affordable prices.  In addition, she has a good relationship with her customers.

Ana is an entrepreneur.  She is very dedicated to her work, is always ready to seek new opportunities that will give her success and never thinks to quit.  Last season she incurred losses due to the weather which is why she is looking to invest in supplies to increase production.  This is why she is seeking a loan from Integral that will allow her to purchase seeds for corn, sorghum, beans, fertilizer, and tools etc.  

Ana Ester has a good credit history and many good references.  She is sure she will be able to pay back the loans and at the same time giver her family the quality of life they deserve.

loans.use: to purchase seeds for corn, sorghum, beans, fertilizer, and tools.

loans.name: Darwin Adalberto

texts.es: Darwin Adalberto de treinta y tres años de edad vive junto a su compañera de vida; él se dedica al cultivo de maíz y sorgo, tiene muchos años de trabajar en la agricultura y se ha hecho de mucha experiencia que le ayuda a obtener las mejores cosechas, el terreno de cultivo está ubicado en una zona de alta incidencia agrícola y muy cerca de su vivienda, comercia en todos los lugares aledaños y tiene mucha clientela pues las personas saben que todo lo que comercia es de calidad y a excelentes precios además el servicio es inigualable; Darwin es un hombre dedicado a su labor siempre dispuesto a salir adelante y alcanzar sus sueños, piensa que si lucha no perderá la guerra, quiere aumentar la producción y necesita invertir pero necesita de capital por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar semilla de maíz, sorgo, fertilizante, abono, herramienta, etc. Darwin tiene buenas referencias de pago y está seguro que podrá saldar la deuda y a la vez darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Darwin Adalberto, 33, lives with his life partner.  He grows corn and sorghum.  He has worked in agriculture for many years and has a lot of experience, which helps him get better harvests.  His plot of land is located very close to his home in an area with a lot of farming.  He sells in all the nearby places and has a lot of customers because people know that everything he sells is high quality at a good price; also, his service is incomparable.

Darwin is dedicated to his work and always ready to get ahead and realize his dreams.  He thinks he will not lose the battle if he struggles.  He wants to increase production and he needs to invest, but he needs capital.  This is why he is asking Integral for a loan that will allow him to buy corn seeds, sorghum, fertilizer, manure, tools, etc.

Darwin has good payment references and is sure he will be able to repay the debt and give his family a better quality of life at the same time.

loans.use: to buy corn seed, sorghum, fertilizer, manure, and tools.

loans.name: Guadalupe

texts.es: Guadalupe de cincuenta y dos años de edad vive junto a su compañera de vida y sus hijos; él se dedica al cultivo de maíz y frijol, tiene varios años de trabajar en la agricultura y se ha hecho de experiencia  muy valiosa que le permite  obtener siempre las mejores cosechas, está muy orgulloso de su trabajo y su familia lo apoya en un cien por ciento, el terreno de cultivo está ubicado en una zona de incidencia agrícola muy cercano a la localidad donde reside, comercia en todos los alrededores y ya tiene muy buena clientela pues saben que todo lo que vende es de primera calidad y a precios accesibles además el servicio es inigualable, adicional a su trabajo de agricultor también se dedica a ser albañil así logra completar todos los gastos del hogar; Guadalupe es un hombre visionario que desea un futuro próspero y está seguro que podrá lograrlo, desde hace mucho tiempo quiere aumentar la producción pero necesita de capital por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar semilla de maíz, frijol, fertilizante, herramientas etc. Guadalupe tiene moral intachable y buenas referencias de pago tiene la certeza que podrá cancelar la deuda y a la vez darle a su familia una vida plena.
texts.en:
Guadalupe, 52, lives with his partner and their children. He grows corn and beans. He has worked as a farmer for some years and has made himself very valuable through his experience which allows him to get the best harvests. He's very proud of his work and his family supports him 100%. The land that they work is located in an agricultural zone near where they live. He sells his product in nearby areas and already has very good clientele because they know that everything he sells is good quality and at affordable prices; what's more, the service is unequaled. In addition to farming, he also works as a mason to cover the costs of the household.

Guadalupe is a visionary man who wants a prosperous future and is sure that he can achieve it. For a long time he has wanted to increase production but lacked the capital, which is why he's asked INTEGRAL for a loan to buy corn and bean seeds, fertilizer, tools, etc. Guadalupe has irreproachable morals and good references. He is certain that he will be able to pay off his debt and at the same time give his family a full life.

loans.use: to buy corn and bean seeds, fertilizer and tools.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy liquor to restock her business.

loans.name: Neris Armando

texts.es: Neris Armando de 42 años de edad, vive junto a su esposa e hijos, él es una persona muy humilde pero emprendedora quien trabaja muy arduamente día con día. Neris posee una parcela en la que se dedica al cultivo de maíz y frijoles, la cual posteriormente comercializa en diferentes departamentos del país, obteniendo muy buenas ganancias. Él desea aumentar su cosecha en un 50% razón por la que solicita un préstamo a INTEGRAL, por medio del cual pueda comprar pesticidas, abono, arados y semillas de frijol y maíz de la mejor calidad para sembrar y así obtener una excelente cosecha. El mayor deseo de Neris es mejorar grandemente su negocio, garantizando la calidad de su semilla y así satisfacer siempre a sus clientes y así mismo obtener otros nuevos, lo que le permita mejorar la estabilidad económica de su familia.
texts.en:
Neris Armando, 42, lives with his wife and children.  He is a very modest but enterprising person who works very hard every day.  Neris has a plot of land where he grows corn and beans, which later he sells in different departments around the country, getting good profits.

He wants to increase his crop by 50%.  This is the reason he's asking Integral for a loan with which he can buy pesticide, manure, hoes, and the highest quality of bean and corn seed to plant and get an excellent harvest.

Neris's biggest desire is to greatly improve his business, guaranteeing the quality of his seed and this way always satisfy his customers as well as get new ones, which will allow him to improve his family's financial stability.

loans.use: to buy seeds.

loans.name: Roberto

texts.es: Roberto es un señor muy trabajador y responsable, vive junto a su familia la cual está conformada por su esposa y cuatro hijos menores de edad, por quienes debe trabajar arduamente para salir adelante. Roberto se dedica al cultivo de cereales como: maicillo y maíz, los cuales comercializa por mayoreo en  mercados y tiendas. Este trabajo representa la única fuente de ingresos para él y su familia, por lo que solicita un préstamo a INTEGRAL con el cual pueda invertir en su negocio comprando mayor cantidad de materia prima para la siembra de cereales y así producir mayor cantidad, con lo que podrá mejorar de forma significativa sus ventas y por consecuente sus ganancias, el trabajo  de Roberto es bastante pesado  ya que debe sembrar las semillas para luego cosecharlas y posteriormente poder venderlas a muy buenos precios, por lo que desea poder aprovechar al máximo la temporada de inicio de siembra comprando semilla de excelente calidad en cantidades mayores.
texts.en: Roberto is a very hardworking and responsible man. He lives with his family, which is made up of his wife and four children. He works hard to get ahead for them. Roberto farms grains, such as sorghum and corn, which he sells at wholesale price in markets and stores. This work is the only source of income for him and his family. He is requesting a loan from Integral so that he can invest in his business by buying a larger amount of inputs for planting grains so that he can produce more.
