loans.use: to buy corn, beans, vegetables, meat, drinks, leather and adhesive

loans.name: Yon

texts.en: Yon is 37 years old. She is widowed and blessed with three children in Siem Reap Province, Cambodia. She has been producing sticky rice cakes (kralan) to sell for more than five years, earning approximately $7.00 per day. Her children are still in her care. Due to the difficulty of transportation for her family, Yon is requesting a loan of $800 to purchase a motorbike for commuting, as well as for carrying her cakes to sell. This purchase would enable her to carry larger amounts of cakes faster. In the future, she would like to expand her business and help her children earn bachelor’s degrees. Moreover, she would like to rebuild her present house to make it bigger and more comfortable for her family.

loans.use: to purchase a motorbike for commuting as well as for carrying her cake to sell

loans.name: Mao

texts.en: Mao is 45 years old. She is married and resides with five children in Siem Reap Province, Cambodia. She has been involved in the agricultural business for more than twenty years, has extensive experience and is successful in her career. She is involved in cultivating rice and fattening up animals.  She earns about $7 per day. Her husband helps her run the business. In order to improve her family’s finances, Mao is requesting a loan of $1000 to purchase SIM cards and scratched cards to resell. By doing so, she would earn extra income to support the family. In the future, she would like to expand her business and help her children earn bachelor’s degrees. Moreover, she hopes to rebuild her present house to make it more comfortable for her family.

loans.use: to purchase SIM cards and scratched card to resell

loans.name: Carlito

texts.en:
Carlito, age 52, is a devoted father and husband. He has been involved in farming for 10 years. He is raising four children and tries to provide the best living situation for his family. 

Carlito is now requesting a loan for PHP 15,000 to purchase seeds, fertilizers and pesticides to be used for his farm. He hopes to obtain abundant crops in the harvest season in order to save for the education of his children as well as to secure their future.

loans.use: to purchase seeds, fertilizers and pesticides.

loans.name: Samban

texts.en: Samban is 27 years old. She is married and blessed with two children.  She lives in Siem Reap Province, Cambodia. She is a homemaker. Her husband is a construction worker who earns about $7 per day. In order to improve her family’s finances, Samban is requesting a loan of $600 to purchase groceries to resell. This money will help her acquire the security to start the new business and generate more income to support the family. In the future, she would like to expand her groceries store and help her children earn bachelor’s degrees. Moreover, she hopes to rebuild her present house to make it bigger and more convenient for her family.

loans.use: to purchase groceries to resell

loans.name: Kho

texts.en: Kho is 56 years old. She is a mother of five children and resides with her husband in Siem Reap Province, Cambodia. She has been involved in producing brooms for more than ten years, earning approximately $3 per day. Her husband helps her run the business. Her children are employed as construction workers. They earn about $10 per day. Due to the difficulty in her family’s transportation, Kho is requesting a loan of $1500 to purchase a motorbike for commuting. This purchase would enable her to reduce the transportation expenses and help her children drive to work on time. In the future, she would like to rebuild her present house to make it much stronger and more convenient for her family.

loans.use: to purchase a motorbike for commuting

loans.name: Elmer

texts.en:
Elmer lives and works in La Salette. He is involved in agriculture and grows corn. Elmer has land, and he plants corn twice a year. He has been in the agricultural business for nine years now. 

Elmer plans to use the loan of PHP 18,000 to buy seed and fertilizer. This will allow him to expand his business and increase his income. In the future, Elmer hopes that he can expand his farm to improve the living condition of his parents.

loans.use: to buy corn seed and fertilizer for his farm.

loans.name: Dante

texts.en:
Dante is 53 years old, married and has five children. Two of them attend a university and need daily allowances. 

He plants and harvests rice to sell to traders in their village. He works hard every day in his rice field to ensure good crop growth. 

He is borrowing a loan of PHP 30,0000 to further improve his crop production. From his loan, he will buy fertilizers and insecticides and pay for labor costs in farming.

With continuous efforts and patience in his business, Dante hopes to someday achieve a progressive life for his family.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and insecticides and pay for labor costs in farming.

loans.name: Guillermo

texts.en:
Guillermo has been a hog raiser for two years. He is a married man with three children. All of them go to school.

Guillermo believes that the improvement of his living condition is based on his own ability to run his livestock business well. So he works hard in order for him to increase his profits. Still the income being gained is not enough. 

For this reason, he is requesting additional working capital in the amount of PHP 35,000. This amount will allow him to buy livestock feed and vaccine. Through this amount of loan, he can make his business more profitable, which will enable him to obtain financial stability. In addition, he can enable his children to finish their degree courses.

loans.use: to buy livestock feed and vaccine for his hogs.

loans.name: Romy

texts.en:
Romy is 39 years old and has two children. The eldest is already working, while the youngest is still studying. As a hardworking father, he aims to improve his corn field to increase his yields and obtain more profits to support his family.

Romy's wife is a hog raiser within their local community. The couple works hard to cover their household needs, educate their youngest son, and improve their standard of living. Romy has devoted 15 years of patience and hard labor to his farming business. He grows corn crops on his 2.5 hectare field. Romy plans to buy certified seed, fertilizer, and pesticides for his farming business, but his profits are insufficient because of the rising cost of living, so some of the loan will be used to cover household expenses, school fees, and the purchase of hog feed. Because of this situation, Romy is asking for a loan of 30,000 Philippine pesos. He hopes that this loan will enable him to improve his corn crop production and his family’s living standards.

loans.use: to buy certified seed, fertilizer, and pesticides for his farming business

loans.name: Amani

texts.en:
Amani is a 25-year-old woman from Irbid, Jordan, who supports two family members. 

She is requesting a loan of 300 JOD to purchase new furniture to help with the maintenance of her home. Since Amani is under 30, her loan is considered a youth loan. 

Amani is a conservative woman who prefers not to upload her photo on the Internet; thus the photo above is of her brother.

loans.use: to pay for new furniture in the home.

loans.name: Wilfredo

texts.en:
Wilfredo is a rice grower who lives at Palao with his wife and children. He has five children. Three of them still attend school while the rest have their employment already. 

He has a farming business that he has operated for 20 years now. He plants and harvests rice and sells the crops to traders for profits. He is happy to gain about PHP 20,000 each harvest season, twice a year. His income goes for meals, allowances for his children and medicines for his wife, who has an illness. 

He is now asking for a loan of PHP 30,000 to buy six bags of UREA (fertilizers) and insecticides used in farming. 

In the future, he hopes to keep producing good crops to harvest so that he will earn more profit. If this happens, he will achieve financial stability.

loans.use: to buy six bags of fertilizers and insecticides used in farming.

loans.name: Raúl Alfonso

texts.es: Raúl Alfonso de cuarenta y dos años de edad vive junto a su compañera de vida y sus seis hijos, él se dedica a la agricultura específicamente al cultivo de maíz y maicillo, tiene muchos años de experiencia en el rubro y está muy orgulloso de su labor, le da muy buenos resultados porque siempre obtiene excelentes cosechas, el terreno de siembra está ubicado en una zona agrícola cerca de su vivienda, comercia en todas las zonas aledañas y se ha hecho de mucha clientela pues todo lo que vende es de primera calidad y a precio accesible además el servicio es inigualable siempre está a la orden del cliente; Raúl es un hombre muy trabajador, honesto y sobre todo humilde, uno de sus más grandes sueños es alcanzar un futuro próspero y se está esforzando por alcanzarlo, en este periodo de siembra aumentara la producción y necesita capital para invertir en insumos por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar semilla de maíz, maicillo, fertilizante, insecticida etc. Raúl Alfonso tiene capacidad de pago y muy buenas referencias de ser responsable tiene la certeza que cancelara la deuda y a la vez le ofrecerá a su familia una vida plena.
texts.en:
Raul Alfonso, 42 years old, lives with his wife and their six children. He works in agriculture, specifically, he grows corn and sorghum. He has many years of experience in this area and his very proud of his work. He gets good results because he always gets excellent seeds. The field where he plants is located in an agricultural area close to where he lives. 

He does business in all the neighboring areas and has built a large clientele because everything that he sells is of the best quality and an affordable price. In addition, service is without equal; it's to the client's order. 

Raul is a very hard-working man, honest, and above all humble. One of his greatest dreams is to reach a prosperous future and he is striving to reach it. In this planting season he will add the production and capital necessary to invest in materials, and for this he is asking INTEGRAL for a loan that will allow him to buy seeds for corn and sorghum, fertilizer, insecticide, etc. Raul Alfonso is able to pay and has good references demonstrating his responsibility. He is sure that he will pay off the debt and, at the same time, that he will offer his family a full life.

loans.use: to buy seeds for corn and sorghum, fertilizer, insecticide, etc.

loans.name: Ana Luisa

texts.es: Ana Luisa, se dedica a los quehaceres del hogar y de cuidar y sostener a sus dos hijos menores de edad, así mismo trabaja comercializando ropa para niños y adultos, telas, botones, piedras de decoración;  también comercializa cremas para el cuerpo y cabello, perfumes, maquillaje  y otros más. Ella es madre soltera y trabaja muy arduamente para poder brindarles todo lo necesario a sus dos hijos.  Ana posee un puesto en el mercado en donde comercializa todos sus productos, contando con muchos clientes. Ella solicita un préstamo por medio del cual pueda comprar mayor cantidad de pantalones, blusas, faldas, sandalias, y así mismo para comprar más productos de belleza, con esto Ana espera aumentar sus ganancias, lo que es muy necesario para poder salir adelante y mejorar la condición económica de su familia.
texts.en: Ana Luisa looks after her housework and cares for and supports her two dependent children.  In addition to this, she also sells children's and adults' clothing, fabric, buttons, decorative stones, body and hair creams, perfumes, makeup and more.  She is a single mother who works very hard in order to provide her two children with everything they need.  Ana has a stall in the market where she sells all her products.  She has a lot of customers.  She is requesting a loan to buy a larger quantity of pants, blouses, skirts and sandals.  She will also buy more beauty products.  In this way, Ana hopes to increase her profits which she really needs to do in order to get ahead in life and improve her family's financial situation.

loans.use: to buy pants, blouses, skirts, sandals and cosmetics

loans.name: Soum

texts.en: Soum is 51 years old. She is married and blessed with six children in Siem Reap Province, Cambodia. She is a homemaker. Her husband runs a business purchasing creels and round baskets to resell. He earns approximately $5.00 per day. Four of her children are employed. They earn about $18 per day. In order to improve her family’s finances, Soum is requesting a loan of $1,000 for use in her husband’s business to purchase more creels and round baskets to resell. By doing so, he would generate more income to support the family. In the future, she would like to use the profit to expand her husband’s business and help her children earn bachelor’s degrees. In addition, she hopes to rebuild her present house to make it bigger and more convenient for her family.

loans.use: to raise capital in her husband's business to purchase more creels and round baskets to resell

loans.name: Diégane

texts.fr: Diégane est un homme marié.Il est père de deux enfants.Il pratique l'agriculture sous pluie et cultive chaque hivernage un champs de mile et un champs d'arachide.A la fin de la saison, il fait de l'embouche bovine pour avoir des revenus afin d'entretenir sa famille et de subvenir à ses propres besoins.Actuellement il sollicite un pret de 200 000f pour acheter un bœuf.Son ambition est d'augmenter sa capacité d'élevage.
texts.en:
Diégane is a married man who has two children. He works in agriculture during each rainy season, growing produce in millet and peanut fields. At the end of the season he fattens cattle, which provides him with income to provide for his family and for himself.

Diégane is currently requesting a loan of 200,000 francs to buy a cow. His ambition is to increase his livestock-raising capacity.

loans.use: To buy a cow.

loans.name: Amadou Yéro

texts.fr: Monsieur Amadou Yéro  habite au  Sénégal.  Il  est père de famille et  gère les besoins de son foyer. Il s’active  dans le secteur du commerce et pratique la vente de bétail . Il capitalise une expérience de plus de 20 ans dans ce domaine. Membre d’un des guichets de l’U-IMCEC, il sollicite un  crédit de 150.000 francs CFA  dans le but d’ élargir son cheptel. Ce prêt lui offrira la possibilité d’obtenir plus de ressource financière afin d’accroitre son épargne  et assurer pleinement les frais scolaires de ses enfants. Son  statut de  de soutien de famille est  le principal facteur qui justifie son rêve de devenir un grand commerçant.
texts.en:
Mister Amadou Yéro lives in Sénégal. He is a father and manages the needs of his household. He is active in business and sells livestock. He has more than 20 years experience in this field. 

A member of one of the branches of the UIMCEC, he is requesting a loan of 150,000 FCFA with the goal of expanding his livestock. This loan will offer him the possibility of obtaining more financial resources in order to grow his savings and to ensure completely taking care of his children's school fees. His status as supporting his family is the main factor that contributes to his dream of becoming a great businessman.

loans.use: to by sheep to raise and sell.

loans.name: Solidaridad Group

texts.es: Grupo Solidario Solidaridad esta integrado por dos socios, Manuela de los Santos y Aracely del Carmen. Residen en Colonia Solidaridad en Juticalpa, Olancho, Honduras. Manuela de los Santos tiene 71 anos de edad, esta casada y tiene 9 hijos. Se dedica a la elaboración de coronas de flores desde hace 28 años, oficio que aprendió con su madre. Trabaja en conjunto con sus hijos desde las 6 de la mañana hasta las 7 de la noche aunque ella no tiene horario de salida. No tiene mucha competencia pero cuando llueve tiene muchas dificultades. Doña Manuela invertirá el préstamo en materiales como papel y alambre para elaboración de las coronas. Los préstamos que ha recibido le han ayudado ya que hizo su vivienda y le sigue ayudando para mantener su negocio. Vive afuera de la cuidad y paga mucho transporte y padece de alta presión. Su meta es mejorar su casa y tener siempre su negocio, mejor surtido y con diferentes diseños de coronas de flores que puedan atraer más clientes. Ha sido cliente de FAMA por más de 6 años y ha cancelado sus cuotas puntualmente. Aracely del Carmen vende frutas y verduras en el Parque Central de Juticalpa. Con el préstamo comprara frutas y verduras para vender y aumentar sus ganancias.
texts.en: The solidarity group Solidaridad is composed of two members, Manuela de los Santos and Aracely del Carmen. They live in Colonia Solidaridad in Juticalpa, Olancho, Honduras. Manuela is 71 years old, married, and has 9 children. She has been making flower garlands for 28 years, having learned the trade from her mother. She works together with her children from 6 in the morning to 7 in the evening, though she sometimes works until later. There are not many competitors but the rain can complicate things very much. Manuela will use the loan to buy materials such as paper and wire to make garlands. The loans she has received helped her to build her house and still help to keep her business going. She lives in the suburbs and transportation is a big part of her expenses. She also has high blood pressure. Her goal is to improve her house and to continue with her business, all while improving it by offering more choices and various garland designs that would bring in more customers. She has been with field partner FAMA for more than 6 years and has always been punctual in her repayments. Aracely sells fruit and vegetables in Juticalpa's central park. With the loan, she will buy fruits and vegetables to sell, with a view to increading her income.

loans.use: to buy paper and wire.

loans.name: Roberto

texts.es: Roberto de 60 años de edad, trabaja junto a sus hermanos elaborando pan, el cual posteriormente comercializan en su casa de habitación y de forma ambulante por diferentes colonias de la zona. Roberto es una persona soltera, quien trabaja mucho para poder contar con una vida estable junto a sus hermanos. Así mismo él trabaja como agricultor, sembrando frijoles y maíz, una actividad que le permite contar con ganancias extras.  Como su mayor aspiración es duplicar la cantidad de granos básicos que cosecha, Roberto solicita un préstamo a INTEGRAL, a través del cual pueda comprar: arados, pesticidas, mayor cantidad de semillas de frijol y maíz para sembrar y así mismo para garantizar la calidad de sus semillas abono para fortalecer la siembra, con lo que Roberto podrá aumentar sus ventas gracias a dicho préstamo.
texts.en: Roberto is 60 years old and works alongside his siblings making bread.  They sell their bread from home and also by traveling around different communities in their area.  Roberto is a single man who works hard so that he and his siblings can enjoy a stable life.  He also works as a farmer, growing beans and corn.  This work enables him to make extra profits.  His biggest goal is to double the quantity of basic grains that he harvests.  Roberto is requesting a loan from INTEGRAL to buy plows, pesticides and more bean and corn seeds to sow.  In order to guarantee the quality of his seeds, he will also buy fertilizer.  The loan will enable him to increase his sales.

loans.use: to buy corn and bean seeds

loans.name: Marina

texts.es: Marina de 47 años de edad, es una persona muy trabajadora quien se dedica a plantar matas de café, ella se encarga de plantar las semillas y brindarle todos los cuidados necesarios para que sean plantas sanas que produzcan un excelente fruto. Ella vive junto a su esposo y cuatro hijos menores de edad quienes se dedican a estudiar. Marina posee muchos clientes quienes compran sus plantas a muy buenos precios para luego cultivar el café y venderlo en diferentes restaurantes, la calidad del producto es muy importante en este negocio, y para que Marina pueda obtener nuevos clientes debe asegurar de que las plantas cumplan con todas las características necesarias, lo que es un trabajo en el cual se debe invertir mucho tiempo y dinero. Por esta razón Marina solicita un préstamo a INTEGRAL, por medio del cual pueda contar con el dinero necesario para la compra de más semillas de café, abono y para invertir en la mejora de  las instalaciones  de su vivero y de esta forma garantizar la calidad del producto.
texts.en:
Marina is 47 years old. She is a very hard-working person that works planting coffee plants. She sees to planting the seeds and taking all the precautions necessary so that they will be healthy plants and produce excellent fruit. She lives with her husband and four young children, who are all in school. Marina has many customers that purchase her plants at good prices in order to grow coffee and sell it in different restaurants. 

The quality of the product is very important in this business, and in order for Marina to be able to get new clients she has to be able to assure them that the plants have all of the necessary characteristics, which is a job in which you have to invest a lot of time and money. For this reason, Marina is asking for a loan from INTEGRAL, so that she will be able to count on the money required to buy more coffee seeds, fertilizer, and to invest in the improvement of the facilities of her nursery. This way, she will be able to guarantee the quality of her product.

loans.use: to buy seeds of coffee plants to sow

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy plows, shovels, and corn seed.

loans.name: José Antonio

texts.es: José Antonio de cincuenta años de edad vive junto a su compañera de vida y sus hijos, él se dedica al cultivo de maíz y frijol, tiene varios años de trabajar en la agricultura y se ha hecho de mucha experiencia que le ha permitido obtener las mejores ganancias, el terreno de siembra está ubicado en una zona de alta incidencia agrícola y está muy cercano a su vivienda, comercia en todas las zonas aledañas del lugar y se ha hecho de mucha clientela pues las personas lo prefieren porque todo lo que vende es de primera calidad, a precios accesibles y con un servicio excelente; José Antonio es hombre trabajador con muchas ganas de salir adelante, siempre está a la expectativa de nuevas oportunidades que se le presentan porque quiere alcanzar el éxito, aumentara la producción para esta temporada de siembra y necesita invertir en insumos por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar semilla de maíz, frijol, fertilizante, insecticida, herramienta, etc. José es responsable y con buenas referencias de crédito está seguro que podrá saldar su deuda y a la vez darle a su familia una vida plena.
texts.en:
José Antonio, age 50, lives with his life partner and their children.  He grows corn and beans, and he has been working in agriculture for several years.  He has had a lot of experience, which has allowed him to get better income.

The land where he plants is located in an area with a lot of agriculture.  It is very close to his house, and he sells in all of the outlying areas.  He has gotten a lot of clientele.  People prefer him because everything he sells is first quality and has affordable prices with excellent service. 

José Antonio is a hard-working man with a great desire to get ahead.  He is always hoping to encounter new opportunities because he wants to be successful.

He will increase production for this planting season, and he needs to invest in supplies.  That is why he is requesting a loan from Integral.  The loan will allow him to buy corn and bean seeds, fertilizer, insecticide, and tools, etc.

José is responsible and has a good credit history.  He is sure that he will be able to repay the debt and give his family a full life.

loans.use: to buy corn and bean seeds, fertilizer, insecticide, and tools.

loans.name: Benedicte Jeanne

texts.fr: Jeanne est une femme de 54 ans mariée mère de 4 enfants dont l'age entre    et   , erlle a aussi 2 autres personne à sa charge. Jeanne est commerçante dans un marché de la capitale depuis 4 ans déjà. son activité c'est la vente des vivres frais(macabo, manioc,couscous) depuis 4 ans . Elle aimerait acheter en grande quantité les régimes de plantains, sacs de macabo et de manioc dans les brousses pour venir revendre dans plusieurs points de vente. Mais la petitesse de son capital ne lui permet pas de le faire, d'où la nécessité de ce crédit pour renforcer son activité.Ceci augmentera son capital, ses ventes et donc son bénéfice.Elle économisera ce bénéfice pour s'acheter dans le futur une moto carrosserie qui lui permettra de faire les livraisons à domicile.
texts.en: Jeanne is a 54-year-old married woman.  She has four children and another two other people in her care.  She has been working as a trader in a market in the capital for four years.  Her business is selling fresh food (cocoyam, cassava, couscous).  Jeanne would like to buy bunches of plantains and sacks of cocoyam and cassava in bulk.  She will buy them in the country and re-sell them from different sales locations.  However, her capital is low and will not allow her to do this.  For this reason, she needs a loan to strengthen her business.  This will increase her capital, her sales and her profits.  She will save the profits that she makes in order to buy a motorcycle which will allow her to make home deliveries.

loans.use: to buy bunches of plantains and sacks of cassava and cocoyam wholesale

loans.name: Olga

texts.en:
Olga is 36 years old and is married with three children. To make a living, Olga operates a sari-sari (convenience) store. She has been in this business for a long time. Her income is just enough to provide for the needs of her family.

Olga is requesting a loan in the amount of PHP 50,000 to buy grocery items such as canned goods, noodles, condiments and curls to sell in her sari-sari store. She hopes to expand her business to secure her family's future and continue sending her children to school.

loans.use: to buy grocery items such as canned goods, noodles, condiments and curls to sell in her sari-sari store.

loans.name: Jamilah

texts.en:
Jamilah is a business-minded woman. She is happily married and has been blessed with two children. Her eldest child goes to school while her youngest is still an infant. Her main priority in life is to increase her income to be able to improve their financial stability, educate her two children and uplift their living condition out of poverty.

Jamilah has expertise in selling clothes because she has been involved in this field of business for 15 years. With the long period of time she has devoted, she is able to improve their standard way of living. Jamilah would like to have continuous growth of her clothing sales business, so she is asking for financial assistance amounting to 30,000 PHP allowing her to buy different kinds of in demand clothing for sale. She hopes that she can maintain this business to be able for her to send her children to a higher level of education and have a better way of living.

loans.use: to buy different kinds of in demand clothing for sale

loans.name: Jocelyn

texts.en: Jocelyn is 32 years of age, married and blessed with one child. She is happy living with her husband and child. Jocelyn and her husband manage a fruit and vegetable vending business in the market. With their desire to have other sources of income that would help them prepare for a better future, Jocelyn also manages an agricultural business. She and her husband have been growing rice for three years. Jocelyn wants a loan of PHP 50,000 to buy fertilizer and rice seed to grow in their field. She believes that the loan will have a positive result toward attaining their desire.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and rice seed to grow.

loans.name: Djiguène Bakhna 41 Group

texts.fr:
Djiguène Bakhna 41 est aussi un sous groupe  du réseau femmes au développement. Elles habitent à environ 22 km de la ville principale. Elles font de la vente de produits divers.
Madame Racky  est la présidente, et elle s’active dans la vente de tissus, chaussures sacs et cela depuis 5 ans déjà. Elle est mariée et s’occupe de la scolarité de ses enfants. 
Avec les bénéfices de son activité, elle veut aider son fils ainé dans ses études supérieures universitaires.
texts.en:
'Djiguène Bakhna 41' is a sub-group belonging to the Network of Developing Women.  The group's members live approximately 22 km from the main city.  They sell a variety of goods.

Racky is the group's president.  She has been selling fabric, shoes and bags for five years.  She is married and takes care of her children's education.

With the profits she makes in her business, Racky would like to help her eldest son with his college education.

loans.use: to buy fabric, shoes and bags to re-sell

loans.name: Rafaela Haydee

texts.es: Rafaela Haydee  de cuarenta años de edad vive junto a compañero de vida y sus hijos, ella se dedica a la agricultura específicamente al cultivo de  maíz y frijol, tiene varios años de trabajar en este rubro y ya gano mucha experiencia valiosa que le ayuda a obtener las cosechas con más calidad, el terreno esta ubicado en una zona de incidencia agrícola cerca de su vivienda, comercia en todos los alrededores y ya tiene mucha clientela pues las personas saben que todo lo que vende es de calidad y a buen precio además de un servicio excelente, está orgulloso de su labor pues es un trabajo honorable y le ha dado muy buenos resultados; Rafaela es una mujer entregada a su trabajo, visionaria y con ganas de superarse, siempre está motivada y ese es su más grande secreto para llegar al éxito, en la cosecha pasada tuvo un poco de perdida debido al clima, por eso ésta temporada quiere recuperarse e invertir en insumos para aumentar la producción, necesita de apoyo de capital por eso solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar semilla de maíz, frijol, abono, insecticida, herbicida,  herramienta etc. Rafaela Haydee tiene buen record de crédito, es muy confiable y responsable, asegura cancelará la deuda en el tiempo establecido y a la vez tiene la esperanza que le dará a su familia una vida plena.
texts.en:
Rafaela Haydee, 40 years old, lives with her husband and their children. She works in agriculture, specifically growing corn and beans. She has worked many years in this role and has already gained a lot of valuable experience that helps her get higher quality seeds. The field is located in an agricultural area close to her home. She does business in all of the surrounding areas and already has many customers since the people know that everything she sells is of high quality and at a good price, in addition to being excellent service. She is proud of her work since it is an honorable profession and has given her very good results.

Rafaela is a woman who is dedicated to her work, a visionary with dreams of improving herself. She is always motivated and this is her big secret to success. Last harvest, she took a little bit of a loss due to the climate, and for this season she wants to recuperate and invest in materials to increase production. She needs capital support, and for this reason has asked INTEGRAL for a loan that will allow her to purchase seeds for corn and beans, fertilizer, insecticide, tools, etc. Rafaela Haydee has a good credit record, is very trustworthy and responsible. She is sure that she will pay off the debt within the established time and at the same time hopes to give her family a full life.

loans.use: to buy seeds for corn and beans, fertilizer, insecticide, herbicide, and tools.

loans.name: Samiarah

texts.en:
Samiarah is married and blessed with five children. Two of her children currently go to school, while the three left are still infant-age. She aims to educate them and give them a better way of living. So, to make her dreams come true, she patiently runs her clothing stall.

Samiarah offers clothes and jewelries inside the market. She has 6 years of experience in running this kind of business. She is really glad and thankful because her previous loan had a great impact in improving her clothing business. She utilized her previous loan in re-stocking her stall, which gives her better sales and income. Since she paid back her previous accounts, she is now asking for another loan amount of 30,000 PHP. This requested loan amount will be used to buy more clothing such as clothes for kids, teens and adults, men's and women's. Samiarah hopes to generate more income and satisfy her costumers' demands in order to encourage more costumers to buy her products.

loans.use: to buy more clothing for sale

loans.name: Leticia

texts.en: Leticia is a 46-year-old married woman with five children. She owns a general store where she sells a variety of products. She has been doing this work for six years. Each day, she earns approximately PHP 300. Leticia is requesting a loan of PHP 20,000 to purchase groceries such as noodles, canned goods, shampoo, soap, sugar, and coffee to sell to the people of the community. She hopes that, through the loan, she can obtain more customers. In the future, Leticia hopes that her business will expand to sustain the needs of her family.

loans.use: to purchase groceries such as noodles, canned goods, shampoo, soap, sugar, and coffee to sell

loans.name: Mario

texts.en:
Mario is a farmer who grows rice in the Philippines. He has been in this business for 20 years. Mario is proud that his expertise in farming continually improves while he runs the business. Mario is 45 years old, married and has two school-age children. Mario’s wife is a beautician expert who does hair style cutting, manicures and pedicures. Her income provides their children's daily allowances in school.
Mario is asking for a loan of PHP 35,000 to pay for the labor cost in farming and to buy fertilizer and herbicides for plant care. He expects to use the loan  wisely in his farming business.

loans.use: to pay for the labor cost in farming and to buy fertilizer and herbicides for plant care.

loans.name: Jorge Alberto

texts.es: Jorge Alberto, es un señor muy alegre y trabajador, quien ha luchado con empeño por salir adelante junto a su esposa, el se dedica a la siembra de frijol y maíz, y así mismo a la venta ambulante de zapatos para bebes, camisas, manteles, telas, bolsos, cremas, lociones y otros más. Esta actividad la realiza mientras crecen sus cultivos, de forma que pueda contar con ganancias extras, su esposa le ayuda en la elaboración de zapatos, manteles y bolsos hechos de lana y así mismo le ayuda a comercializarlos, de esta forma ambos se esfuerzan por tener una vida estable. Jorge solicita un préstamo por medio del cual pueda contar con el dinero necesario para invertir en la compra de ropa para comercializar, así mismo para comprar mayor cantidad de lana que es la materia prima de muchos de los productos que vende y que más demanda poseen, esto lo hace con el deseo de poder tener una vida estable junto a su esposa y de esta forma salir adelante.
texts.en:
Jorge Alberto is a cheerful and hardworking man. He has strived with effort to move forward with his wife. Jorge grows beans and corn. He also works as a street vendor, sells shoes for babies, shirts, tablecloths, fabrics, bags, crèmes, lotions, and other products. Jorge manages this business while his crops are growing so that he can earn extra income. His wife helps by making shoes, tablecloths, and bags out of wool. She also helps with selling these products since both of them strive to have a stable life.

Jorge is requesting a loan so that he can have the necessary funds to invest in the purchase of clothing to sell. In addition, he will buy a large quantity of wool since it is the material used in many of the products that he sells and that are in high demand. Jorge and his wife want to have a stable life and this will help them get ahead.

loans.use: to buy clothing and beauty products, as well as wool for making other products.

loans.name: Abou

texts.fr: Monsieur Abou est  réside au Sénégal. Il est célibataire et  exerce une activité de commerce par le biais duquel  il gagne sa vie. Il est propriétaire d’une mercerie et à débuté son  activité depuis 2003. Son objectif consiste a développer son activité et maximiser ses profits et ses fonds personnels. Il sollicite un crédit de 350 000 Francs CFA au guichet de l’U-IMCEC où il est membre. Ce financement  premier crédit lui offrira la possibilité de renforcer le stock de son magasin en articles de mercerie  afin de répondre a la demande accrue de sa clientèle. Il espère  revaloriser  son chiffre d’affaire et  améliorer le niveau de son épargne. Son ambition est  de devenir un grand homme d’affaire.
texts.en: Mr. Abou lives in Senegal.  He is single and runs a business which is how he earns a living.  He owns a sewing business which he started in 2003.  His goal is to develop his business and to maximize his profits and his personal income.  He is requesting a loan of 350,000 CFA from the office of l’U-IMCEC where he is a member.  The money from this first loan will allow him to build up his stock of sewing supplies in his store in order to meet the growing demand of his customers.  He hopes to increase his turnover and to raise the level of his savings.  His ambition is to become an important businessman.

loans.use: to buy sewing supplies to sell.

loans.name: Margie

texts.en:
Margie is a responsible mother of three children who is luckily married to a kind and hardworking man. She is 38 years old, and has been engaged in the farming business for over 23 years. She and her husband run a rice farming business in their village.

Margie wants to get a better yield in every crop in order to be able to sustain their family needs, especially their children's needs in school. She wishes for a loan that will help her provide her needs in farming. Margie decided to borrow a loan of 35,000 PHP to purchase rice seeds to grow, fertilizers and herbicides for plant care. She believes that the loan will have a positive impact in her farming activities.

loans.use: to purchase rice seeds to grow, fertilizers and herbicides for plant care.

loans.name: Anderson

texts.en:
Anderson has four children who attend school. He is 47 years old, married and has a rice farming business.
Anderson and his wife are helping each other to keep their family out of poverty. They manage well their rice farming business as their primary source of income. Their profit from the business pays for their children's fees in school.
Anderson wishes to improve the business while he can manage it. He is requesting a loan of PHP 35,000 to buy fertilizer and rice seed to grow in his fields. He hopes to maintain the business and will continue to send his children to school until they are college age.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and rice seed to grow.

loans.name: Franco

texts.en:
Franco is proud to share that through farming, he is able to send his daughter to school and finish her college level of education. According to him, his patience and hard work is paying off because his daughter already has her work.

Franco is 55 years old, widowed and engages in growing rice in their fields. As he grows old, Franco plans to have an extra source of income for the preparation of any future emergencies. With regards to his farming business, Franco is requesting a loan of 35,000 PHP to pay for the labor cost in farming activities and to buy farm inputs needed in rice production. He hopes to gain higher income and his plans become reality.

loans.use: to pay for the labor cost in farming activities and buy farm inputs needed in rice production.

loans.name: Modesto

texts.en:
Modesto was born in the village of Villa Luz, in Isabela province. He is a farmer. He is married and they have two children. For the past 20 years, he has been living in the town of Ilagan and working in agriculture. He has five parcels of land which were granted to him by his father. Currently, his lands have been cleared. 

He will use the PHP 40,000 from the loan to buy seeds to plant corn, and also to carry out the necessary work to prepare the soil. He is the sole support of his household, since his wife is a housewife. He is a longstanding client, and he is very grateful to the institution for the support given to him so he can continue improving his quality of life.

loans.use: to buy seeds and fertilizer for his farm.

loans.name: Assane

texts.fr: Monsieur Assane est un habitant du Sénégal. Il est marié et gère un foyer.Il a choisi l'activité de ferrailleur depuis plus de 10 ans en vue d'entretenir sa famille. Il est membre d’un des guichets de l’U-IMCEC où il sollicite un crédit d’un montant de 300.000 francs pour développer son activité de commerce.L'objectif visé est le renforcement de son stock de férail et l'augmentation de ses ressources financières. En effet, ce financement pourrait lui donner l'opportunité d'assurer les frais scolaires de ses enfants et d'améliorer les conditions de vie alimentaires de sa famille. Si les moyens le lui permettent , il souhaite réfectionner le domicile familial a travers les revenus que lui procurent son activité. Par ailleurs, son projet futur est de détenir plusieurs points de vente et de récupération de ferraille et satisfaire indépendamment son besoin en fond de roulement.
texts.en: Mr. Assane lives in Senegal.  He is married and manages a shop. He chose to work in the scrap metal business 10 years ago in order to support his family.  He is a member of  l’U-IMCEC where he is requesting a loan of 300,000 francs in order to develop his business activity.  His goal is to build up his stock of iron and to increase his financial resources.  Indeed, this loan could give him the opportunity to pay his children’s school fees and to improve the diet and living conditions of his family.  If he has the means, he would like to improve his family’s home with the income from his business.  Also, his plan for the future is to have several locations for collecting scrap metal and to be able to meet his needs independently with his own capital.

loans.use: to buy scrap metal to sell.

loans.name: Lucidel

texts.en:
Lucidel believes that, through patience and hard work, her family will survive poverty. She is a hardworking mother who is engaged in her retail shop business to help her husband in financing the education of their children, who are still studying. Because of the high costs of school fees and commodities, Lucidel aims to improve her small sari-sari store business to satisfy her children's basic necessities. 

Lucidel sells different products in their community home base, but her capital is not sufficient to acquire the products for her store. Therefore, she is asking for additional capital of 20,000 PHP to buy canned goods, noodles, cooking oil, baked breads and other items to sell in the village. She mentioned that this loan will help her situation, to make the business grow as she continues to work and strive harder.

loans.use: to buy canned goods, noodles, cooking oil, baked breads and other items to sell

loans.name: Marina

texts.en:
Marina has operated a small sari-sari (variety) store for ten years. She expresses her commitment and full devotion to her business and to her family as well. The profits earned from her business allow her to pay her family's monthly electric bill and to provide for their daily needs. 

Marina wants to strengthen her business but has insufficient funds, so she is asking for a loan of 10,000 Philippines pesos (PHP) to buy canned goods, noodles, soft drinks, vinegar, and other basic kitchen necessities to sell. She wants to stock more items in her store to meet all her customers' requests. In the future, Marina aims to have a large store to earn a higher revenue.

loans.use: to buy canned goods, noodles, soft drinks, vinegar, and other basic kitchen necessities to sell.

loans.name: Bernabe

texts.en:
Bernabe is 51 years of age and is married. He has three grown children. He is a farmer who dreams of increasing his rice production so that he can generate greater profits every crop season. He has been spending his income on his family's daily needs, such as commodities and food allowances which means that they are very quickly consumed. 

Now he is requesting a loan of PHP 20,000 to buy seeds, fertilizers and insecticides for use in his business. He hopes to yield better crops through his purchased inputs for the improvement of their living situation.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizers and insecticides for use in his business.

loans.name: Reour

texts.en:
Reour is 29 years old. She is married and blessed with two children. She lives in Siem Reap Province, Cambodia. She is a homemaker. Her husband is a taxi driver who earns about $8 per day. 

In order to improve her family’s finances, Reour is requesting a loan of $1,000 to purchase a car for her husband to run the taxi service. This purchase will enable him to generate more income to support the family. In the future, she would like to run an additional business to generate extra income to support the family and help her children earn bachelor’s degree. Moreover, she hopes to build a new house as soon as possible.

loans.use: to purchase a car for her husband to run the taxi service.

loans.name: Rebecca

texts.en:
Rebecca is 39 years old and is married with three children. She has a retail store based in her home, and she is requesting a loan of PHP 10,000 to purchase items such as biscuits, soft drinks, cooking oil, sugar and other ingredients to sell. She has been running her business for twelve years. 

She is thankful because her income has been increasing. Her husband is her motivation for improving her business. She is working hard because she wants to have a better quality of life by doing something that brings in additional income. She hopes that she can get the loan amount she has requested.

loans.use: to purchase items such as biscuits, soft drinks, cooking oil, sugar and other ingredients to sell.

loans.name: Ferival

texts.en: Ferival is from the village of Villaluz. He is 25 years old. Ferival is married. To make a living, Ferival owns and operates a transportation business. The main source of income for the business comes from providing motorcycle transport to local members of the community. Ferival has been engaged in his business for over three years and earns approximately 3,500 PHP a month for these activities. Ferival is requesting a loan of 20,000 PHP which will be used to maintain a transport vehicle used in the business.

loans.use: to maintain a transport vehicle used in the business.

loans.name: Rolando

texts.en:
Rolando is a man with courage who is dedicated to his work. Rolando is 42 years old and is married with three grown-up children. He engages in a farming business planting crops like corn. Their village is well known as an agriculture area. 

Rolando is asking for a loan of PHP 35,000 to buy corn seeds and fertilizer for his farm. Rolando hopes that someday he can see all his children finish their studies and also he can provide for the needs of his family.

loans.use: to buy seeds and fertilizer for his farm.

loans.name: Prudencio

texts.en:
Born in the village of Villa Luz, in the province of Isabela, Prudencio lives with his wife and their four children. Recognized by the people of his neighborhood as a serious man, Prudencio, a farmer, would like to expand his crop production so that it becomes a viable source of income. To do that, he needs a loan of PHP 50,000 to buy seeds and fertilizer. 

The income from it will then help him to cope with the needs of his large family and give all of his children a higher education. Prudencio is very grateful to everyone who can help him achieve his dreams with this loan.

loans.use: to buy seeds and fertilizer for his farm.

loans.name: Ricardo

texts.en:
Ricardo is a 49-year-old married man living with his family. He has been working in the agricultural field for the past 16 years. In 1998, he bought a plot of land where he started to plant crops like corn according to the season. 

With his requested loan of PHP 30,000 he will be able to purchase fertilizers and seeds in order to increase his business productivity. Therefore, his sales will increase and so will his income. In the future, he plans to buy new land to expand his business for his family to have better living conditions.

loans.use: to buy seed and fertilizer for his farm.

loans.name: Sherlita

texts.en:
Sherlita is 52 years old and blessed with four children. To make a living, she sells fruits and vegetables. She has been in this business five years. Her target market is her co-villagers. Sometimes, due to the poor income of her co-villagers, she gives credit but not all the time because she is saving to develop her business.

To meet her dream faster, she is asking for a loan amount of PHP 20,000 to buy fruits and vegetables such as squash, bananas, root crops and avocados. This is to provide a good quality service to her customers as well as allow her to gain higher income. She hopes it will be a great help for developing her business as well as their living conditions.

loans.use: to buy fruits and vegetables such as squash, bananas, root crops and avocados.

loans.name: José Teodoro

texts.es: José Teodoro, es una persona que se dedica a diferentes actividades con el fin de darle lo mejor a su familia la cual está conformada por su esposa y dos hijas. José toma fotografías en diferentes eventos sociales, así mismo se dedica a la crianza de ganado para posteriormente comercializarlo, pero su actividad principal es la cosecha de frijoles y maíz que también comercializa en la zona. José solicita un préstamo por medio del cual pueda comprar mayor cantidad de semillas para sembrar con la esperanza de poder duplicar sus ventas. José es muy responsable y se destaca por ser alguien que vela día con día por el bien y la estabilidad de su  familia.
texts.en:
Jose Teodoro is a person who is dedicated to different activities with the goal of better providing for his family, composed of his wife and 2 daughters. Jose takes photographs at a variety of social events and he also raises cattle to later sell them. But his principal activity is to cultivate beans and corn which he also sells in the zone. 

Jose is requesting a loan for purchasing seeds to sow in the hope of duplicating his sales. Jose is very responsible and is well known as someone who looks out, day after day, for the well-being and stability of his family.

loans.use: buy seeds to plant.

loans.name: Maha

texts.en:
Maha is a 44-year-old woman from Al-Hashmi, Amman, Jordan who supports four members of her family. 

She is requesting a loan of 500 JD to buy clothes. This will allow her to establish a business selling clothes. She hopes that this will help raise her family's living standards.

loans.use: to pay for clothes that she will sell.

loans.name: Yeng

texts.en:
Yeng is 42 years old. She is married and resides with five children in Siem Reap Province, Cambodia. She has been involved in an agricultural business for more than twenty years, has an extensive experience and is successful in her career. She is involved in cultivating rice, beans and fattening up animals. Approximately, she earns about $6 per day. Her husband is a carpenter who earns about $5 per day. Her children are still in her care. 

Yeng is requesting a loan of $1,500 to purchase fertilizer and pay the expenses of tilling her 5 hectares of  farmland. In the future, she would like to expand her business and help her children earn bachelor’s degrees.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer and pay the expenses of tilling her 5 hectares of farmland.

loans.name: Roberto

texts.en:
Roberto is a rice grower and lives peacefully in Carilucud with his wife. They have not had a child yet but are hoping to have a child soon. To generate an income, he raises crops, primarily planting and harvesting rice to sell. He has been doing this for over eight years now on a hectare plot of land which he inherited from his parents. 

He is now asking for a loan of PHP 33,000 to buy farm inputs such as fertilizers, insecticides and pesticides to use in farming. In the future, Roberto would like to keep making his crops productive and earn more funds for crops maintenance and and achieve financial stability.

loans.use: to buy farm inputs such as fertilizers, insecticides and pesticides to use in farming.

loans.name: Elvira

texts.en:
Elvira is an industrious person who helps her spouse to generate income for the family. She manages a small restaurant, serving food for daily meals and snacks to the people in the village where she lives. She has been operating it for over 10 years and earns approximately PHP 5,000 each month. She uses the profits for her children's education. 

She would like to improve sales from her business so she is now borrowing a loan of PHP 20,000 to buy eggs, rice, vegetables and meat used in her small restaurant. Elvira would like to offer more delectable meals that will lead her to increased profits too. From this, she will be able to continuously pay school fees of her children.

loans.use: to buy eggs, rice, vegetables and meat to cook and sell in her small restaurant.

loans.name: Rowel

texts.en:
Rowel does farming for a living. He and his wife help eachother to cultivate their land. He is 39 years of age and was blessed with two children. Rowel does his best to keep their farm productive. He has been working in this kind of business for eight years and is very determined to have a better way of life. 

He is asking  for a loan of PHP 15,000 to fund their farming business. He will use the loan to purchase seeds, fertilizers, and other farming inputs. He knows that through this loan, his income will increase and he will be able to save for the studies of his children.

loans.use: to purchase seeds, fertilizers, and other farming inputs.

loans.name: Nehemías Alonso

texts.es: Nehemías Alonso de treinta y cuatro años de edad vive junto a sus hijos, él se dedica al cultivo de maíz y frijol tiene varios años de trabajar en la agricultura y se ha hecho de experiencia muy valiosa que le ayuda a obtener las mejores cosechas, comercia en todos los alrededores de la zona y es muy conocido por su amabilidad y por vender lo que las personas necesitan de calidad y a precios accesibles además el servicio es inigualable; Nehemías es un hombre dedicado a su labor, visionario tiene grandes ideas a futuro y piensa lograrlas con esfuerzo y dedicación, empezara por acrecentar su negocio por eso invertirá en insumos para aumentar la producción pero necesita de capital por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar semilla de frijol, maíz, fertilizante, herramienta, etc. Nehemías Alonso tiene buenas referencias de pago y es muy responsable asegura que podrá saldar la deuda y a la vez ofrecerle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Nehemías Alonso, 34, lives with his children. He farms corn and beans. He has been working in agriculture for many years and has gained invaluable experience, which has helped him to obtain the best harvests. He does business in the neighbouring areas and is well known for his kindness and selling good-quality product to his customers at accessible prices with unequal service. 

Nehemías is committed to his work, a visionary with great ideas for the future that he plans to accomplish with effort and dedication. He will start by expanding his business and will invest in agricultural inputs to increase his production, but he needs capital. The loan from INTEGRAL will allow him to purchase bean seed, corn seed, fertilizer, and tools, etc. Nehemías Alonso has good references for payment and he's very responsible. He's sure that he can pay the debt and at the same time offer his family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy bean seed, corn seed, fertilizer, and tools

loans.name: Marleny

texts.es: Marleny vive junto a sus dos hijos y su esposo, ambos trabajan en la agricultura y se destacan por ser personas muy responsables y trabajadoras. Marleny comercializa en su casa y en diferentes tiendas de la zona en que reside la cosecha de frijoles y maíz, con lo que puede sostener el negocio activo. Así mismo ella se dedica a la ganadería criando vacas y bueyes, de los cuales vende leche y así mismo a los animales para destazo o carga. Marleny solicita un préstamo a INTEGRAL por medio del cual pueda comprar mayor cantidad de semilla de maíz y frijoles, así mismo para comprar alimentos, vitaminas y todo lo necesario para la crianza de vacas y bueyes. Con esto ella espera mejorar las ganancias de su negocio y poder salir adelante junto a su familia.
texts.en:
Marleny lives with her 2 children and husband. They both work in agriculture and are known to be very responsible and hard-working. Marleny sells her harvest of beans and corn from her house and in several stores in the zone where she resides. This enables her to sustain an active business. She also raises cows and oxen and sells milk plus animals to be butchered or to work in the fields.

Marleny is requesting a loan through INTEGRAL to purchase a larger quantity of corn and bean seeds, and to buy feed, vitamins, and all the necessities for raising cattle and oxen. With this loan, she expects to improve earnings from her business and to be able to get ahead together with her family.

loans.use: buy bean and corn seeds to sow plus needed supplies for raising cows and oxen.

loans.name: Roger

texts.en:
Roger is 49 years old, married, and has five children. He raises his family through his income from his farming business. Two of his children still attend school and need daily allowances. 

Roger had been planting and harvesting rice to sell for more than 10 years now. He usually earns about 15,000 PHP each harvest season, which occurs twice a year. He aspires to increase his yield, so he is borrowing a loan of 20,000 PHP to buy fertilizers and insecticides used in farming. 

With proper attention to his farming business, Roger is confident he will achieve good profits and earn money for his children's education.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and insecticides used in farming

loans.name: Benard

texts.en:
Bernard is a 48-year-old business man living in Kagadi, Uganda. He trades in produce mainly maize, beans and groundnuts. He is blessed with ten children and has been in this business for a period of 12 years. He started by growing his own crops then sold them and got capital to start buying from others. He faces a problem of price fluctuation and inflation which erodes most of the profits. 

He would like to educate his children and expand his business to other new markets. Benard wants a loan to buy maize and beans to sell.

loans.use: to buy maize and beans to sell.

loans.name: Reynaldo

texts.en:
Reynaldo lives with his wife and five children. His wife helps him in generating income through his hog-raising business. Reynaldo has been in the farming business for 15 years. He aspires to expand and improve his rice crop production, but he does not have enough capital to re-plant his two hectares of rice fields. For this reason, he is applying for a loan of 20,000 PHP to buy farm supplies needed for improving the growth of his rice crop.

Reynaldo hopes to keep producing good crops to be able to earn more income, which he will use to support the basic necessities of his family and the education of all five of his children.

loans.use: to buy farm supplies

loans.name: Aquilino

texts.en:
Farming is Aquilino’s family's main source of income. He is happily married and has six children. Two of his children have settled and are married, one is a laborer and the remaining two are still studying. Aquilino has been a rice grower for 25 years. Due to the long period of time he has devoted to his farming business, he is able to provide for his family's  basic needs and send his two children to school. 

Aquilino would like to keep producing good cops but his capital for re-planting his farm land is no longer enough due to the increasing costs of household expenditures and allowances of his two children. In this regard, he is asking for a loan of PHP 15,000 which will allow him to buy necessary farm inputs. Aquilino hopes that he can obtain more farm land someday.

loans.use: to buy necessary farm inputs for his farming business.

loans.name: Riath

texts.en: Riath is a good person. He is 34 years old, and is married. He has five children who live together with him in Taiz, Yemen. He purchased land, and then he built a house. He would like to build the second floor, so he is requesting a loan of 100,000 YER to cover the costs of purchasing construction supplies such as iron and cement. He hopes to offer his family a better life.

loans.use: to cover the costs of purchasing construction supplies such as iron and cement for his business.

loans.name: Armando

texts.en:
Armando has been engaged in an agricultural business for ten years. He plants and harvest rice crops for sale. Armando is a married man and is blessed with four children. Three of his children currently go to school while the other one is graduating this June 17, 2012. 

Armando’s main priority is to let his children finish their studies because it’s the only inheritance he could give to them. This situation pushes him to strive hard to be able to make this dream come true.

Armando would like to take out a loan of PHP 20,000 which will be used to buy fertilizers, pesticides and other farm inputs to improve his crop production. He hopes that he will obtain this requested loan amount in order to gain more profits and keep producing healthy crops. Through this amount, he can save some amount of money to give his children a bright future.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers, pesticides and other farm inputs to improve his crop production.

loans.name: Samah

texts.en: Samah is a 40-year-old married woman from Al-Hashmi, Amman, Jordan. She has a family of four. She is requesting a loan of 500 JOD to make home improvements. She wants to develop her home and make it a better space for her family.

loans.use: to pay for home improvements

loans.name: Alexander

texts.en:
Rice farming is the primary source of income on which Alexander and his spouse rely for a living. He has been managing a farming business for over 10 years now and earns about PHP 15,000 during harvest season. Alexander is now 37 years old, married, and has one child who he is sending to elementary education. 

He wanted to improve his income so he is now asking for a loan of PHP 18,000 to buy fertilizers and insecticides used in farming. This will help maintain healthier crops and will increase crop production. Alexander is praying that he will have an abundant harvest and will earn more funds to invest in buying hogs to raise which will serve as additional source of his income. Some day, Alexander hopes to become a successful rice grower in their village which will be good for the overall welfare of his family.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and insecticides used in farming.

loans.name: Jackline

texts.en:
Jackline is a forty five year old married woman with six children living in Kasese, Uganda.She has been in the produce business for three years. She started with 500,000 shillings and now has two million shillings as working capital. 

Jackline's hardships are inadequate capital to purchase stock, price fluctuations in produce and inflation. Her personal goals are to educate her children and to buy a car. Her business goals are to expand the business into new markets and to move the business to a more permanent location. Jackline wants money to buy maize and cassava flour to sell.

loans.use: to buy maize and cassava flour.

loans.name: Erisa

texts.en:
Erisa is a fifty two year old married man with eight children living in Kasese, Uganda. He has been dealing in a retail shop business for six years, which he started with 1,000,000 shillings. He now has 2,500,000 shillings as working capital. His hardships are inadequate capital to purchase stock, price fluctuation and inflation. 

Erisa's personal goals are to educate his children,to build a permanent home and to buy a car. His business goals are to hire employees to help expand the business and to move the business to a more permanent location. Erisa wants money to buy sugar, sodas, soap and beers to sell.

loans.use: to buy sugar, sodas, soap and beers to sell.

loans.name: Paskali

texts.en:
Paskali is a forty four year old married man with five children living in Kasese, Uganda. He has been a farmer for eleven years and, with the proceeds from farming, he has been able to provide basics to his family.

Paskali faces hardships of seasonal weather, inadequate capital to purchase modern farming equipments and theft. His personal goals are to educate his children, to build a permanent home and to hire employees to help expand the business. His business goals are to buy land to grow crops, to expand his business into new areas and to hire employees to help expand business. Paskali wants money to buy fertilizers for his garden.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers.

loans.name: Glenda Mayela

texts.es: Glenda Mayela de  21 años de edad, cuenta con la ayuda de su esposo quien se desempeña como responsable de ventas en una Veterinaria.  Solicita su  credito para comprar una computadora portatil ya que la necesita para realizar sus trabajos de la Universidad, pues actualmente estudia  tercer año  de la carrera Licenciatura en Administración; se caracteriza por ser una joven con alto espirirtu de superación personal y profesional, su mayor sueño en la vida culminar sus estudios y construir su propia casa.
texts.en: Glenda Mayela is a 21 year old university student attending the third year of the Bachelor's Degree in Business Administration, and she can count on the support of her husband who is a sales representative for a veterinarian. She is requesting her 1st loan to buy a laptop computer she needs to prepare her University projects. She is a young woman with a great desire to progress both in her personal and in her professional life. The biggest dream of her life is to finish studying and to have her own house built.

loans.use: To buy a laptop computer.

loans.name: Alba Luz

texts.es: Alba Luz  trabaja como directora de una  Escuela, su esposo se desempeña como agricultor en la pequeña finca que ellos poseen, ambos son trabajadores que han salido adelante con sus esfuerzos, segun referencias esta docente es muy responsable con sus compromisos.   Solicita su crédito para inverirlo en compra de materiales de construcción para construir un anexo a su vivienda, su deseo en la vida es que su familia permanezca unida en las cosas de Dios y gozar de salud y trabajo.
texts.en: Alba Luz works as a school director; her husband is a farmer and he works in the small farm they posses. They are both hard-working people who have gotten ahead thanks to their efforts. According to reference this teacher is very responsible with her commitments. She is requesting her 9th loan to buy construction materials to have an annexe to her house built. What she most desires in life is that her family remains close together in every fact of life and to have good health and a good job.

loans.use: To buy construction materials.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy construction materials.

loans.name: Marcelina Marta

texts.es: La Sra Marcelina es tiene mas de 25 años de laborar como Docente en Educacion Primaria, cuenta con otros ingresos como son los del Negocio de la Pulperia el cual invertiria con el financiemiento que le brindo Afodenic con Fondo Kiva. Es una mujer luchadora junto con su esposo e hijos, todo lo que poseen ha sido por esfuerzo propio. Desea contianuar trabajando para mejorar mas su negocio con el apoyo de la Institucion.
texts.en:
Sra. Marcelina has worked as an elementary school teacher for more than 25 years.  

Marcelina also has other income that is generated from a grocery business in which she will invest a Kiva loan provided by AFODENIC.  She is a determined woman who lives with her husband and children, all of whom have the quality of self-sufficiency.  She wants to continue working so that she can improve her business with the help of AFODENIC.

loans.use: to buy products for her store.

loans.name: El Trebol Group

texts.es: Un grupo de mujeres  que con entusiasmo y mucha dedicación sale adelante cada día. Así son las integrantes de la alcancía "El Trebol" conformado por 5 socias, llevan la ardua tarea de trabajar en sus negocios para poder mejorar la calidad de vida de sus familias. Tal es así el caso de la señora Luz de 56 años de edad  madre de 3 hijos de los cuales uno aun está a su cuidado por ser menor de edad y depende de ella para su educación, alimentos y vestimenta. La señora Luz cada día se dedica a la venta de Periodicos. Con los ingresos de estos negocios a podido llevar adelante a su familia y pudo comprar un terreno en el cual más adelante comenzará a construir en el segundo piso 3 cuartos que le pondra en alquiler. Con el presente préstamo implementara  en el puesto de periodicos la ventas de dulces. Como ella cada integrante tiene una historia en particular pero, si en algo coinciden es en el entusiasmo y las ganas de salir adelante para el bien y mejoría económica de sus negocios
texts.en:
This group of women strives to move forward each day with great enthusiasm and dedication. There are five members that make up the Communal Bank “El Trebol”. They have the arduous task of working in their businesses in order to improve the quality of life for their families.

Such is the case with Sra. Luz, a 56-year-old mother of three children. One child is still under her care and reliant on her for education, food, and clothing. Sra. Luz sells newspapers each day. With the income from her business, she was able to move her family forward and purchase a piece of land. Later on, she will add a second floor with three rooms that she can make available for rent.

With this current loan, Luz will be able to continue operating her newsstand where she also sells candy. Just like the other members, she has a unique story, but they all share the enthusiasm and drive to succeed for the good and economic improvement of their businesses.

loans.use: to buy newspapers and candy and to acquire construction materials for her home.

loans.name: Marisol

texts.es: Marisol de 47 años de edad, es una persona que siempre ha contado con grandes deseo de salir adelante y se ha esforzado por cumplir sus metas. Ella vive junto a su esposo e hijos, junto a los cuales se dedican por completo a la actividad de la agricultura, sembrando maíz y frijoles los cuales son destinados para el consumo personal y así mismo para la comercialización de estos. Marisol es una madre muy orgullosa ya que sus hijos son personas trabajadoras y luchadoras quienes desean mejorar las condiciones de su negocio. Por esta razón Marisol solicita un préstamo a INTEGRAL, por medio del cual pueda comprar todos los insumos necesarios para la siembra como: abono, semilla de maíz y frijoles, con lo que podrán cultivar mucho más de lo que han podido hasta ahora, permitiéndoles percibir más ganancias.
texts.en:
Marisol, age 47, has always been a person with a great desire to get ahead.  She has always put forth great effort to reach her goals.  She lives with her husband and children.  They completely devote themselves to agriculture.  They grow corn and beans for personal consumptions and to sell.

Marisol is a very proud mother because her children are hard-working and tenacious people who want to improve the condition of her business.  That is why Marisol is requesting a loan from Integral.  With the loan she will be able to buy all of the supplies like fertilizer and corn and bean seeds that are needed for planting.  She will use them to cultivate much more than she has been able to do so far.  This will allow them to get more income.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and corn and bean seeds to plant.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay workers who are mulching his gardens.

loans.name: Margret

texts.en:
Margret is a forty five year old married woman with six children living in Kasese, Uganda. She has been in the salon business for twenty years. She started with 500,000 shillings and now has 10,000,0000 shillings as working capital. The hardships she faces include customers not paying on time and high rent for the business premises.

Margret's personal goals are to educate her children and to buy a car. Her business goals are to hire employees to help expand the business and to expand the business into new markets. Margret wants money to buy wedding gowns for hire.

loans.use: to buy wedding gowns for hire.

loans.name: Rosemary

texts.en:
Rosemary is a 50 year old lady who deals in a textile business which she has run for a period of 2 years. She started as a teacher and a councillor then got capital and started this business. She says inadequate capital and price fluctuations are affecting the business. 

Rosemary would like buy a car and buy land to grow crops. She wants a loan to buy clothes to sell.

loans.use: to buy clothes to sell.

loans.name: Artemio

texts.en: Artemio is 29 years of age, married and has no children. He is a farmer in their community and he has been operating his farming business for over 8 years. He wants to save for his future children. For this reason Artemio is in need of additional working capital to make good his farm. He is asking for a loan amount of PHP15,000 to buy seeds, pesticides and fertilizers. Hopefully, this time he can yield much so that he can save for the future of his family as well as for his business.

loans.use: to buy seeds, pesticides and fertilizers.

loans.name: Eddie

texts.en:
Eddie is married and is a responsible father of four children. He is involved in farming, where he lives his family. He grows rice to sell and wishes to yield many crops for the next harvesting season. 

For Eddie to achieve his goal, he is requesting an additional working capital in a loan amount of PHP10,000 to buy seeds, fertilizers and pesticides. He hopes that, through this loan amount, he can grow his desired harvest. In this matter, he hopes then save for the educational needs of his children.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizers and pesticides.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy construction materials.

loans.name: Grace

texts.en:
Grace is a thirty-seven-year-old married woman living in Kamwenge, Uganda. She has a personal goal of educating her children, building a permanent house and buying a car. She has been operating a retail shop for three years now, after starting with capital of two million and  now has five million shillings. She has hardships of price fluctuations, inflation and inadequate capital to purchase enough stock to meet the increasing demand. She has a vision of moving her business to new areas and owning a wholesale shop.

Grace needs a loan to buy general merchadise such as sugar and soap for sale.

loans.use: to buy general merchadise such as sugar and soap for sale.

loans.name: Ines

texts.en:
Ines is a duck raiser in the village where she lives with her spouse and six children. She had been doing the business for almost 10 years. Whenever the ducks have reach the desired weight, she sells them at the market for profits. Her income, of about PHP4,000 each month, goes for meals and school expenses of her children. Only one of them still attends school while the rest have settled into marriage. She would like to make her business more profitable but she has insufficient funds now, so she is asking for a loan of PHP 12,000 to buy livestock feed and medicine to sell. 

With good profits from the business, she hopes to start up a piggery business for an additional source of income. This will help the family achieve economic stability.

loans.use: to buy livestock feed and medicine to sell.

loans.name: Rosa Emilia

texts.es: La profesora Rosita trabaja como docente de primaria desde hace 23 años, con gran eficiencia y honestidad ya que ama su profesión de impartir el pan de la enseñanza a niños del pre escolar en la zona urbana de Nueva Guinea.  Solicita su credito para realizarle unos pequeños arreglos a la cocina de su vivienda ubicada en la zona # 2 de Nueva Guinea , su sueño es que sus hijas culminen sus estudios y encuentren un trabajo digno y que existe el amor de Dios en su familia.
texts.en:
Rosita has been working as a school teacher for 23 years with great efficiency and honesty.  She loves her profession of imparting knowledge to pre-school children from the urban section of Nueva Guinea.  

She is requesting her eighth loan in order to make a few repairs to the kitchen in her home, which is located in District #2 in Nueva Guinea.  Her dream is for her children to finish their studies, find decent jobs, and exist with the love of God for their families.

loans.use: to repair her kitchen.

loans.name: Maricel

texts.en:
Maricel is raising hogs to fatten and breed. Whenever a hog reaches maturity, she sells it to the butcher in their village and usually earns about 3,000 PHP for each hog. She uses the income for meals and school expenses. 

She is now asking for a loan of 10,000 PHP to buy feed, medicines, and vaccines for her hogs. This will provide good nutrition for her hogs and enable her to receive a higher price for them. She hopes to keep raising healthy hogs and maintain a profitable business for the overall welfare of her family.

loans.use: to buy feed, medicine, and vaccines for hogs

loans.name: Geovany Jose

texts.es: Geovanny José se desempeña como docente de secundaria en la colonia Puerto Principe desde hace 8 años,    segun referencias comerciales , laborales y personales ha demostrado ser una joven con buen comportamiento, es soltero aun no tiene responsabilidad de una familia por lo que gana es para sus gastos y sus estudios.  Solicita su  crèdito para comprar material de construcción y asi poder mejorar la cocina de su vivienda ubicada en la comarca lo cocos, su sueño es formar su familia, gozar de salud, trabajo y seguir estudiando.
texts.en:
Geovanny José has worked as a high school teacher in the neighborhood of Puerto Principe for the past eight years. He has demonstrated that that he is a well-mannered young person, according to his business, employment, and personal references. Geovanny is single and has no family responsibilities, so what he earns goes toward his expenses and his studies.

He is requesting a loan in order to buy construction materials for improving the kitchen in his home, which is located in the region of Los Cocos. His dreams include starting a family, enjoying good health, working, and continuing his studies.

loans.use: to buy construction materials for making improvements to his kitchen.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay for labor costs in the construction of her home.

loans.name: Yolidia Esther

texts.es: La profesora Yolidia de  30 años de edad, se desempeña como docente de primaria desde hace 10 años, posee estabilidad laboral,  segun referencias comerciales y personales es una joven muy responsable con muchos deseos de superaciòn  profesional  y personal.
