Solicita su  8vo  credito para comprar materiales de construcción y asi poder mejorar la infraestructura de su casita ubicada en la zona # 6 de Nueva Guinea, su compañero de vida trabaja ambos reciben ingresos familiares ycomparten con los gastos familiares y del hogar,su sueño es mejorar poco a poco la infraestructura de su vivienda y que su familia permanezca unida.
texts.en:
Yolidia is 30 years old and has worked as an elementary school teacher for 10 years. She has a stable work history. According to her work and personal references, she is a very responsible young woman.

Yolidia is requesting her eighth loan to buy construction materials so that she can improve the infrastructure of her house located in District #6 of New Guinea. Her partner in life works, so both of them earn income for their family and share in the family and household expenses. Her dream is to gradually improve the infrastructure of her home and have her family remain together.

loans.use: to buy construction materials for home improvements.

loans.name: Anielka Yakarelys

texts.es: La sra. Anielka de 27 años de edad, es casada, tiene 1 hujo que depende economicamente de ella. Trabaja como ejecutiva de ventas en Dollar Store desde hace 1 año. Solicita el credito para invertirlos en cambio de zinc del area de la cocina ya que se encuentra en muy mal estado.
texts.en: Anielka is 27 years old, married and has one child who is financially dependent on her.  She has been working as a sales executive in Dollar Store for one year.  She is requesting this loan to invest in replacing the metal roof above her kitchen as it is in a very bad state of repair.

loans.use: to replace her roof

loans.name: Shamsullo

texts.ru: Шамсулло очень любить  заниматься скотоводством. С самого детства он любил наблюдать за ними и считал это ремесло своим предназначением. Куплей продажей КРС он занимается уже год. На Гончинскый рынок  со своим скотам он ходит раз в месяц. Своим бизнесом он доволен и хотел бы в дальнейшим  его расширить. Шамсулло хотел бы получить займ для покупки скота. В надежде на вашу помощь он обратился к нам.
texts.en: Shamsullo really enjoys raising livestock. From his childhood on, he loved watching animals and thought that he is meant for this trade. He has been buying and reselling cattle for a year. He brings his cattle to the Gnonchin market once a month. He is satisfied with his business, and would like to expand it in the future. Shamsullo would like to obtain a loan to buy cattle. Hoping for your help, he has applied to our organization.

loans.use: to buy cattle.

loans.name: Rosemarie

texts.en:
Rosemarie runs a small store at General Balao. She has been selling grocery items to the people in her village for almost two years now and earns just enough profit to sustain their needs. She would like to increase her income so she is now borrowing a loan of PHP 6,000 to buy sardines, breads, biscuits and eggs to sell in her store. This will help increase sales capacity.

She is now 25 years old and has three young children.

Extending friendly service and affordable prices will allow her to gain more customers, leading to additional profits for her children's education.

loans.use: to buy sardines, breads, biscuits and eggs to sell in her store

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy seeds to grow hay.

loans.name: Richard

texts.en:
Richard is a twenty-five-year-old married man with one child living in Kasese, Uganda. He has been dealing in clothes for eight years now. His hardships are rain, inadequate capital to purchase stock, price fluctuations and inflation. Personal goals are educating his children and buying a car, while his business goal is moving his business to a more permanent location and owning a boutique.

Richard wants money to buy clothes to sell.

loans.use: to buy clothes to sell.

loans.name: Estela Guadalupe

texts.es: Estela Guadalupe de 37 años de edad, vive junto a sus dos hijas las cuales se dedican a estudiar. Desde hace 10 años que Estela se dedica a elaborar tortillas para comercializar, para poder aprovechar al máximo su negocio, ella elabora tortillas al mediodía y por la tarde, lo que le resulta muy positivo ya que cuenta con varios clientes. Estela solicita un préstamo por medio del cual pueda contar con el dinero necesario para comprar mayor cantidad de maíz y de esta forma elaborar más tortillas y así atender a más clientes, así mismo con el dinero obtenido por el préstamo comprará cilindros extras de gas propano para contar con provisión. Estela es una madre muy responsable y trabajadora quien vela por el bienestar de sus hijas, por lo que desea mejorar su negocio y así contar con una vida mejor.
texts.en:
Estela Guadalupe, age 37, lives with her two daughters, who attend school.

Estela has been making tortillas to sell for ten years.  In order to be able to make the most of her business, she makes the tortillas at noon and in the evening.  This brings her very positive results because she has many customers.

Estela is requesting a loan to be able to buy a greater quantity of corn.  This way she will make more tortillas and tend to more customers.  She will also use the money from the loan to buy extra cylinders of propane gas in order to have a supply.

Estela is a very responsible and hard-working mother who watches out for her daughters’ well-being.  Therefore, she wishes to improve her business in order to have a better life.

loans.use: to buy corn to make tortillas.

loans.name: Roque

texts.en:
Roque is a farmer who lives in Lanna with his spouse and two children. Income from the farming business goes for meals and allowances for his children. Roque's wife is his partner in planting and harvesting rice to sell. They have been doing it for over 10 years now. 

Roque is now 47 years old and still wants to improve his farming practices and keep ensuring an abundant harvest. He is now taking out a loan of PHP 48,000 to buy farm inputs such as fertilizers, pesticides and molluscicides to use in farming. This will help maintain good profits from the business.

Roque is also praying for good health so he can continuously manage his business and pay for his children's education.

loans.use: to buy farm inputs such as fertilizers, pesticides and molluscicides to use in farming

loans.name: Aurelio

texts.en:
Aurelio is 37 years old. He is a father of two children and married to a housekeeper. He engages in a farming business in the Philippines. He has been in the business for 27 years.

At present, Aurelio is encountering financial difficulties. He is having a crisis in providing for his needs in farming. Thus, Aurelio is asking for a loan of PHP 40,000 to buy fertilizers, seeds, and herbicides for his farm. He hopes to manage the business well and get better yields for higher income.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers, seeds, and herbicides for his farm.

loans.name: Ana Luz

texts.es: Ana Luz de cincuenta y uno años de edad vive junto a su compañero de vida y sus hijos; ella se dedica a la agricultura, específicamente al cultivo de maíz y frijol, tiene varios años de trabajar en este rubro, le gusta mucho su labor y está orgullosa de todo lo que ha emprendido en el ámbito y de la experiencia que ha ganado para obtener siempre cosechas de calidad, el terreno de cultivo está ubicado en una zona de alta incidencia agrícola y muy cercano a su vivienda, comercia en las zonas aledañas y ya tiene mucha clientela fija pues la gente la prefiere porque siempre tiene lo que necesitan a precio realmente accesible; Ana es una mujer decidida, quiere alcanzar su sueños y está trabajando duro para lograrlo, sabe que con su esfuerzo llegara al éxito, en esta temporada de siembra quiere aumentar la producción para maximizar sus ganancias pero no posee de suficiente capital para la compra de insumos por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar semilla de maíz, frijol, fertilizante, herramienta, herbicida etc. Ana Luz tiene capacidad de pago y está segura que cancelara a tiempo el financiamiento y a la vez le dará a su familia una vida plena.
texts.en:
Ana Luz, 51, lives with her life partner and their children.  She works in agriculture, specifically growing corn and beans; she has been working in this line of work for several years.  She likes her work very much and is proud of everything she’s taken on and of the experience she’s gained in order to always produce quality crops.  

Her parcel of farmland is located in an area of intense agricultural activity that’s very near her house.  She sells in areas adjacent to her and has quite a few regular customers because people prefer her because she always has what they need at accessible prices.

Ana is a very determined woman who wants to reach her dreams and is working very hard to attain them.  She knows that she will attain success with her effort.

In this planting season she wants to increase production in order to maximize profits but she does not have enough capital to buy the supplies she needs which is why she’s asking INTEGRAL for a loan to be able to buy corn and bean seeds, fertilizer, tools, herbicide, etc.

Ana Luz has the capacity to repay and is sure that she will pay off the loan on time and at the same time give her family a fulfilled life.

loans.use: to buy seeds and farm supplies.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to cover his wedding costs

loans.name: Vanessa

texts.en:
Vanessa runs a small store in front of her house at Cataggaman. She has been operating it for four years and earns P5,000 each month selling grocery items to her neighborhood. Vanessa is now 26 years old and had one child attending school. She would like to increase sales capacity in her store and that requires her to expand her merchandise, too. For this reason, she is borrowing P7,000 to buy milk, sugar, coffee, soft drinks and bread to sell in her store.

Vanessa would like to stock up on more merchandise to sell in order to meet all her customers' demand due to the affordable prices she offers.

She hopes to keep acquiring good sales from her business to pay for her child's education expenses.

loans.use: to buy milk, sugar, coffee, soft drinks and bread to sell in her store

loans.name: Marilou

texts.en: Running a small store is the business of Marilou that she relies on for income for the daily allowance of her child. She started to operate her store eight years ago. Now, Marilou is asking for a loan of P7,000 to stock up on more grocery items for her store. This will help increase sales capacity and boost her profits, too. She will buy canned goods, soft drinks, bread and eggs to sell. She promises to pay back her loan in full. Someday, she hopes to make the business profitable for the overall welfare of the family.

loans.use: to buy canned goods, soft drinks, bread and eggs to sell

loans.name: Amalia

texts.en:
Rice farming is the primary source of income from Lanna. Amalia and her family peacefully live here and they plant and harvest rice from their two-hectare rice field. They have been in the farming business for almost 10 years and earn about PHP 20,000 each harvest season (twice a year). 

Amalia is now 35 years old and had four children attending school. Her income from the business goes for their meals and school expenses. She is now asking for a loan of PHP 43,000 to further improve her business. She will buy rice seeds, fertilizers, and insecticides for crop maintenance. This will help ensure healthier crops to harvest. 

Amalia would like to achieve abundant yields every harvest season to continuously pay matriculation fees of her children. She will be very happy and proud to see her children as professionals in their chosen career someday.

loans.use: to buy rice seeds, fertilizers, and insecticides for crop maintenance.

loans.name: Rodrigo

texts.es: Rodrigo, se ha dedicado desde  muy joven al oficio de la agricultura, su padre le enseño todo lo necesario para hacer este trabajo de la mejor manera. Rodrigo vive junto a su esposa y dos hijas en una casa muy humilde la cual está ubicada en el mismo terreno en el que se dedica a la siembra. Él se encarga de sembrar maíz, un grano básico que tiene gran demanda en el país por lo que es un negocio muy estable. Rodrigo solicita un préstamo por medio del cual pueda comprar maíz para sembrar y abono, con esto él aprovechara al máximo sus recursos y sembrar mucho más para esta temporada y así obtener más ganancias y hacer crecer la cantidad de cultivo, aprovechando al máximo su parcela.
texts.en: Rodrigo has been farming since he was very young.  His father taught him everything he needed to know in order to carry out his work in the best way possible.  Rodrigo lives together with his wife and two daughters in a very humble home which is located on the same plot of land as his crops.  Rodrigo grows corn, a basic grain for which there exists a lot of demand nationwide.  This makes his a stable business.  Rodrigo is requesting a loan so that he can buy corn to sow.  He will also buy fertilizer.  This will allow him to make the most of his resources, sow much more this season, increase his quantity of crops and increase his profits.  He will take full advantage of his plot of land.

loans.use: to buy seeds

loans.name: Berta Alicia

texts.es: Berta Alicia de 65 años de edad, es una persona que ha trabajado muy duro por salir adelante, ella vive junto a su única hija la cual aporta para el hogar, y por quien se esforzó día con día vendiendo carne en el mercado, trabajo el cual tuvo que dejar debido a que al pasar del tiempo se convirtió muy pesado para ella. Actualmente Berta se dedica a la elaboración de tortillas, trabajo el cual realiza en su casa de habitación y que afortunadamente le brinda grandes beneficios. Ella solicita un préstamo a INTEGRAL, por medio del cual pueda comprar maíz por mayor, ya que de este modo es un poco más barato, y así mismo cal para colocarle al maíz, con esto Berta no solo espera ahorrarse un poco de dinero sino también hacer más tortillas y de este modo aumentar sus ventas lo cual es primordial para ella.
texts.en:
Berta Alicia, 65, is a person who has worked very hard in order to get ahead.  She lives with her only daughter who shares in household expenses and for whom she strove daily selling meat in the market, a job she had to leave because in time it became too demanding for her.

Currently, Berta works making tortillas, work she does at home and that fortunately produces great benefits.

She’s asking INTEGRAL for a loan to buy corn at wholesale because it’s a little less expensive this way and also to buy lime powder to add to the corn.  With this Berta expects not only to save some money but also to make more tortillas thus increasing sales which is her main concern.

loans.use: to buy ingredients to make tortillas.

loans.name: Ayat

texts.en:
Ayat is a conservative woman who is unwilling to upload her photo on the Internet, so the photo is of her brother.

Ayat is an 18-year-old single woman who lives in Irbid, Jordan

Ayat is seeking a loan of 500 JOD si she can buy more clothes for trading purposes.

Ayat is under 30 years old so her loan is considered a youth loan.

loans.use: to buy clothes for trading purposes

loans.name: Alfredo

texts.es: Alfredo de 55 años de edad, es una persona muy trabajadora y proactiva, vive junto a su esposa en casa propia. Él cuenta con un negocio de productos perecederos como: sodas, embutidos, carnes, detergente y productos plásticos, el negocio esta ubicado en un mercado, por lo que posee clientes fijos y constantes. Alfredo y su esposa son muy conocidos en el lugar ya que brindan excelentes precios y muy  buenos productos además que el servicio al cliente es excelente. Con el enorme deseo de surtir su negocio Alfredo solicita un préstamo por medio del cual pueda comprar mayor cantidad de productos  que ya posee e incluir otros nuevos como más variedad de refrescos, leche en polvo, huevos, depósitos plásticos, detergentes, lejías y otros más. Alfredo es una persona muy positiva quien tiene toda la confianza que su negocio mejorará gracias al préstamo otorgado.
texts.en: Alfredo is 55 years old.  He is a very hard-working, pro-active person who lives together with his wife in his own home.  He has a business selling perishable foodstuffs such as soda, cold cuts, meats, detergents and plastic products.  His business is located in a market and he has regular customers.  Alfredo and his wife are very well known in their town because they offer excellent prices and very good products.  In addition, their customer service is excellent.  Alfredo really wants to stock his business and is requesting a loan to buy a larger quantity of products.  He will buy some products that he already stocks as well as some new ones.  He will buy a greater variety of soft drinks, powdered milk, eggs, plastic containers, detergents, bleach, etc.  Alfredo is a very positive person who is very confident that his business will improve as a result of the loan he is receiving.

loans.use: to buy soft drinks, powdered milk, eggs and plastic containers

loans.name: Fatima

texts.en:
Fatima is a 27-year-old married woman. She is a mother of 3 children and she lives in Nao'or, Jordan

Fatima is seeking a loan of 500 JOD so she can fix her home and improve her home living conditions.

Fatima is under 30 years old so her loan is considered a youth loan.

loans.use: to fix her home and improve her home living conditions

loans.name: Eman

texts.en: Eman is a 38-year-old married woman from Ashrafia, Amman, Jordan. She is supporting three members of her family. Eman sells clothes and she is requesting a loan of 600 Jordanian dinars to purchase larger quantities for trading purposes. Eman is looking to establish her own shop.

loans.use: to purchase clothes for trading purposes

loans.name: Leonardo

texts.en:
Leonardo lives in their community with his wife and three children. He is 53 years old, a productive husband managing their farming business for more than 15 years. This is their source of income where he usually gets the expenses used for daily necessities such as food allowances, electricity and medicine. So he wants to improve his business. 

For this reason, he is asking for a loan in the amount of P15,000 to purchase seeds, pesticides, and fertilizers that will be used in his field in order to yield a better crop by the next season. He hopes to have a big harvest to provide for the needs of his family. Through his hard work and patience to work every day in his business, he knows that there is hope for him to obtain a better living.

loans.use: to purchase seeds, pesticides, and fertilizers

loans.name: Cristina

texts.es: Cristina es una persona muy responsable quien vive junto a sus padres mayores de 80 años y una hija menor de edad, quienes dependen por completo de Cristina. Desde hace 17 años que ella posee un puesto de comida en donde elabora desayunos y almuerzos y también vende jugos, sodas, agua, golosinas, entre otros más. Su negocio se encuentra en un lugar muy estratégico debido a que está rodeado por fábricas. Cristina solicita un préstamo a INTEGRAL, por medio del cual pueda contar con el dinero necesario para comprar: verduras, granos  básicos, frutas, bebidas, carnes y toda la materia prima necesaria para la elaboración de desayunos y almuerzos y así también ofrecer más variedad. Con esto Cristina pretende dar el mejor servicio y precios accesibles para que sus clientes puedan incrementarse lo cual es fundamental para ella, ya que es la única persona que labora en su casa y es quien debe salir adelante por su familia.
texts.en:
Cristina is a very responsible person living with her elderly parents who are in their 80s and with a minor daughter who all depend entirely upon Cristina.

She’s had a food stand for 17 years where she makes breakfast and lunch and also sells juice, sodas, water and snacks, among others.  Her business is located in a very strategic place because it’s surrounded by factories.

Cristina is asking INTEGRAL for a loan in order to have the money needed to buy vegetables, basic grains, fruit, beverages, meat and all the raw materials needed to make the breakfasts and lunches and also to offer more variety.

With this Cristina intends to provide better service and accessible prices so that her customers will increase which is fundamental for her since she’s the only one who works in her household and who must get ahead for her family.

loans.use: to buy basic grains, vegetables and others.

loans.name: Cecilia Yaneth

texts.es: Cecilia Yaneth de 28 años de edad, es una madre muy responsable y dedicada que vive junto a sus dos hijos y su esposo. Cecilia se dedica a la venta de camisas, suéteres  para hombres y mujeres como también stickers para automóviles. Su negocio está ubicado en  el Centro de su ciudad de vivienda, una zona de mucho comercio debido a la gran afluencia de personas que transitan por el lugar. Debido a que la ropa que vende es con estampados juveniles y temas de moda, muchos jóvenes visitan su negocio aprovechando también los precios bajos. Cecilia solicita un préstamo por medio del cual pueda invertir en la compra de stickers,  camisas y suéteres con temas de moda para que pueda atraer la atención de más personas y de esta manera incrementar sus ventas  y brindarle toda la ayuda necesaria a su esposo para sostener su hogar.
texts.en:
Cecilia Yaneth, 28, is a very responsible, devoted mother living with her children and her husband.  Cecilia sells shirts and sweaters for men and women and also stickers for cars.  Her business is located in the center of the city she lives in, a zone that’s very commercial because many people pass through the place.

Due to the fact that the clothes she sells have youthful prints and themes that are in style, many young people visit her store taking advantage of the low prices too.

Cecilia is asking for a loan to invest in stickers, shirts and sweaters that are in style in order to attract more people thus increasing her sales and providing all the help needed for husband to be able to support their home.

loans.use: to buy shirts to sell.

loans.name: Gladys Marily

texts.es: Gladys Marily de 37 años de edad,  vive únicamente junto a sus padres en casa propia.  Gladys es comerciante de productos perecederos y de primera necesidad para el hogar como: granos básicos, jabones, papel higiénico, pasta dental, aderezos para alimentos y otros más. Gladys depende por completo de su negocio por lo que solicita un préstamo a INTEGRAL, por medio del cual pueda invertir en el, ampliando  la cantidad de productos que ofrece, ella desea comprar sopas instantáneas, pastas, golosinas y más. Lo que Gladys espera es obtener nuevos clientes y así aprovechar al máximo la ubicación que posee ya que se encuentra en el interior de un mercado, lugar que es muy concurrido, lo que es de mucho beneficio ya que día con día la cantidad de personas que llegan al lugar es bastante grande.
texts.en:
Gladys Marily, 37, lives only with her parents in a house of her own. Gladys is a merchant; she sells perishables and basic staple items for the home like basic grains, soap, toilet paper, toothpaste, spices for food and others.  

Gladys depends on her business totally which is why she’s asking INTEGRAL for a loan to invest in it expanding the amount of products she offers.  She wants to buy instant soup, pasta, snacks and more.

What Gladys expects is to attract new customers taking full advantage of the location she has which is inside a market, a place that’s very busy which is very beneficial because every day large numbers of people come to this place which is quite large

loans.use: to buy stock merchandise for her store.

loans.name: Mohammad

texts.en: Mohammad is a 25-year-old single man. He lives in Sahab, Jordan. Mohammad is looking to take a loan of 500 JOD to buy more machines and electrical tools to make electrical extensions. Mohammad is under 30 years old, so his loan is a youth loan.

loans.use: to buy machines and elecrical tools to make electrical extensions

loans.name: Mahmoud

texts.en:
Mahmoud is a 22-year-old man from Al Khaledieh, Al Mafraq, Jordan. He is requesting a loan of 1,200 Jordanian dinars to cover his wedding expenses.

Because Mahmoud is less than 30 years old, his loan is considered a youth loan.

loans.use: to cover part of his wedding expenses

loans.name: Alicia Miguel

texts.es: Alicia Miguel de cincuenta y seis años de edad vive junto a su hijo en casa propia; ella posee una tienda donde vende artículos de primera necesidad, frijoles, huevos, leche, jabón entre otros, tiene varios años de tener el negocio y le ha dado muy buenos resultados, está ubicado en una zona muy estratégica donde circulan muchas personas, se ha hecho de mucha clientela pues las personas prefieren su tienda porque es la más surtida siempre tiene los que ellos necesitan con producto de calidad y a precios accesibles además se caracteriza por su amabilidad siempre está a la orden de la clientela; Alicia es una mujer emprendedora con muchas ganas de salir adelante siempre está en búsqueda de oportunidades que le den el paso al éxito, en esta ocasión quiere acrecentar el negocio pero necesita de capital para invertir en los insumos por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar granos básicos, productos instantáneo, golosinas, bebidas, jabones etc. Alicia Miguel tiene capacidad de pago y es muy responsable asegura el pago de la deuda y a la vez confía en que llevara a su hogar seguridad económica.
texts.en:
Alicia Miguel is 56 years old and lives together with her son in her own home.  She owns a store where she sells basic household products such as beans, eggs, milk, soap, etc.  She has owned her business for a number of years and has had very good results.  Her store is located in a very strategic area where there are a lot of people passing by.  She has gained a lot of customers and people prefer to shop in her store because it is the best stocked.  She always has what people need and sells good-quality products at affordable prices.  She is also noted for her kindness.  She is always at her customers' disposal.

Alicia is an entrepreneurial woman who has a great desire to do well in life.  She is always looking for opportunities to achieve success.  Right now she would like to grow her business but she needs capital to invest in buying supplies.  For this reason, she is requesting a loan from INTEGRAL that will allow her to buy basic grains, instant products, candies, drinks, soaps, etc.  Alicia Miguel has the ability to repay her loan and is very responsible.  She is certain that she will repay her loan and, at the same time, provide her household with financial security.

loans.use: to buy basic grains, instant products, candies, drinks and soap

loans.name: Rogie

texts.en:
Rogie is a hardworking and responsible husband and father to his four children. He is happily married and is raising rice crops. According to him, he has been in his farming business since he was 14 years old.

Rogie would like to take out a loan amount of PHP 20,000, which he will use to purchase of sacks of rice seed and fertilizer to improve his farming business. He hopes that he could supply all the necessary farm supplies in his 1.8 hectares of rice fields to be able to obtain greater profit, which will enable him to sustain their daily needs and to save some amount for their emergency purposes when he gets weak.

loans.use: to buy sacks of rice seed and fertilizer to improve his farming business

loans.name: Azmi

texts.en:
Azmi is a 60-year-old farmer who is married with no children. The income he gets from agriculture isn't enough to cover all of his needs, so for the past 15 years, he has been raising and selling sheep and sheep products. This project has been profitable, but still leaves him short financially. 

Azmi is requesting a $3,000 loan from FATEN to help him cover the costs of purchasing more sheep and expanding and improving the herd's condition. This will increase sales and improve the family's income. Azmi is pictured here with his herd of sheep.

loans.use: to purchase more sheep and expand and improve his herd's condition.

loans.name: Salam

texts.en:
Salam is a 42 year-old single woman who, for the past eight years, has been sewing and selling clothes to her loyal customers. She has a good reputation amongst her customers, and her work has been profitable, but she needs addition funds to cover her costs. 

Salam is requesting a $3,000 loan from FATEN to help her cover the costs of purchasing an additional sewing machine. This will enable Salam to expand her work, increase sales, and grow her income. In this picture, Salam is photographed in her workshop.

loans.use: to purchase a sewing machine

loans.name: Tierra Group

texts.es:
Ellas son el grupo Tierra. Su nombre tiene raíz en que confían que la tierra es de quien la trabaja.
Maria Magdalena, integrante del grupo Tierra, esta muy agradecida por formar parte de un grupo de crédito solidario pues con ello, ha podido invertir en su tienda de abarrotes y proveerlo de mercancía. 
Ella es mujer, esposa y madre de dos hijos, y decidió poner este negocio en casa, para ofrecer productos básicos para el hogar ya que lo vio prometedor al ser de las primeras familias en llegar a la colonia.
María Magdalena esta muy comprometida con el préstamo, pues mediante estas inversiones a mejorado su negocio y con ello, la calidad de vida propia y de los suyos.
texts.en:
The women above belong to the Tierra (Earth) group. They chose this name because they trust in the earth which gives them succor. 

Maria Magdalena is a member of this group. She is very grateful to be part of a group that can obtain loans as the money has enabled her to invest in her grocery store by buying more stock.

Maria is married and has two children. She decided to open this business in her house in order to sell household basics. Since her family was one of the first to settle in the district, it seemed like a promising opportunity.
Her friends say that Elena is very pleased to have a loan because with these purchases she has improved her business which in turn has led to a better standard of living for herself and her family.

loans.use: buy more merchandise for her grocery store

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more items like shoes, women's dresses, and many other items.

loans.name: Sarah

texts.en: Sarah  lives in Buchanan. She is 44 years old and married with three children, aged 10 to 25, that live at home. For the past twenty-seven  years, she has been selling palm oil in the local market. She established the business with small loans from her mother. She is requesting a loan to purchase more  palm oil to expand her business. In the future she wants to build a house  and expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more  palm oil to expand her business

loans.name: Cecelia

texts.en: Cecelia is 49 years old and lives in Buchanan with her four children. They are in school. She did not go to school and she has been involved in business for the past 24 years. Currently she is operating a cook shop (restaurant.) She has a lot of customers, since her food is always on time and has a good taste. She says she has not much income and she has to cook different kinds of food every day to  meet the taste of  her customers. She is requesting a  loan to purchase more rice, oil, meat, charcoal and fish for her business. Her future plan is to build a house.

loans.use: to purchase more rice, oil, meat, charcoal and fish for her business

loans.name: María Justina

texts.es: María Justina de cuarenta y siete años de edad vive junto a sus dos hijas una de dieciséis años y otra de once en casa propia, ella posee una venta de tortillas, ya tiene varios años de tener el negocio y se ha hecho de mucha experiencia, cada día las elabora más rápido y de mejor calidad, el negocio está ubicado en la zona donde vive,  tiene ya mucha clientela fija pues las personas la prefieren por la calidad, higiene, buenos precios pero sobre todo porque es el servicio más rápido; María es una mujer emprendedora siempre dispuesta a superarse, quiere alcanzar el éxito por eso se esfuerza día con día, en las últimas semanas ha aumentado la demanda por lo que María quiere aumentar la producción  pero necesita de la compra de insumos y no posee el capital suficiente por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar maíz por mayor. María Justina tiene buen record de pago y tiene una moral intachable, asegura que podrá cancelar el financiamiento y a la vez darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
María Justina, 47, lives with her two daughters, a 16-year-old and an 11-year-old, in her own house.  She sells tortillas; she’s had the business for several years and she’s acquired much experience.  Every day she works faster and produces better quality.  The business is located in the zone where she lives and she has a large, regular clientele because people prefer her for the quality, hygiene and good prices and above all because her service is faster.

María is an enterprising person who is always ready to improve; she wants to attain success which is what she strives for day to day.  In the last few weeks demand has increased which is why María wants to increase production but she needs to buy ingredients and does not have enough capital so is asking INTEGRAL for a loan to buy corn at wholesale.

María Justina has good payment history and faultless morals.  She is sure that she will be able to repay the loan and give her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy corn at wholesale.

loans.name: Rosa Amelia

texts.es: Rosa Amelia es una señora muy humilde y trabajadora, vive junto a su esposo, dos sobrinos y un nieto, su compañero de vida se dedica al trabajo de la agricultura de frijoles y yuca. Por su lado Rosa vende frescos naturales, hielo, sodas  y hot dog, los cuales elabora y comercializa en su casa de habitación. Con la intención de incrementar sus ganancias Rosa desea poner una venta de pupusas, las cuales son elaboradas de masa de maíz, rellena de frijoles, queso y chicharrón, este es el platillo típico salvadoreño más vendido, por lo que es muy rentable. Es por esta razón que ella solicita un préstamo a INTEGRAL, para contar con el capital necesario para invertir en las compra de maíz, queso, chicharrón, verduras y todo lo necesario para iniciar con la pupusería y así mismo comprar mayor cantidad de sodas, frutas para elaborar los frescos y la materia prima para los hot dog. Todo esto llena de mucha ilusión a Rosa que tiene la fe que su negocio mejorará.
texts.en: Rosa Amelia is a very humble, hard-working lady who lives together with her husband, two nephews and one grandson.  Her husband is a farmer who grows beans and cassava.  Rosa sells natural fruit drinks, ice, soda and hot dogs which she makes and sells in her home.  With the aim of increasing her profits, Rosa would like to start a business selling pupusas, which are made from corn dough and filled with beans, cheese and chicharrón (ground cooked pork).  This is a popular, traditional Salvadoran dish and so it is very profitable.  Rosa is requesting a loan from INTEGRAL so that she will have the capital she needs to invest in buying corn, cheese, chicharrón, vegetables and everything else she needs to start her pupuseria.  She will also buy a larger quantity of sodas, fruit for making her drinks and supplies for making hot dogs.  This fills Rosa with a lot of hope as she believes that her business will improve.

loans.use: to buy corn, cheese and ground cooked pork for making pupusas

loans.name: Dalal

texts.en:
Dalal is a 33 years old, married, and a mother to four sons and three daughters. Her husband's work earns a low salary that is not enough to cover the family's needs.

For the past four years, Dalal has been raising and selling sheep and sheep products, which has been a profitable project to the family, but she needs more support to cover these costs.

Dalal wants to expand and improve her sheep business, so she is requesting a $900 JOD loan from FATEN to help her purchase more sheep and improve the herd's condition. This will increase sales and improve the family's income.

In this image, Dalal is photographed with part of her herd.

loans.use: to purchase sheep and improve her herd's condition.

loans.name: Rana

texts.en:
Rana is a young woman of 35 years, who is married to her husband Morad, with no children yet. Rana prefers not to have her photo published online, so Morad appears in her Kiva profile photo, pictured next to their house. 

Rana wants to live with her husband in better home conditions, such as paint and new windows. Both Rana and her husband are employed but get low salaries, which are not enough to cover these repairs, so she is requesting a $3,000 USD loan from FATEN. This loan will offer to Rana and her husband comfortable and suitable home condition and so they can enjoy living in the house.

loans.use: to repair and improve the condition of her house.

loans.name: Cynthia

texts.en: Cynthia, 43, lives in Buchanan, and she is married with four children between the ages of 4 and 27. Two of them are in school and live at home, while the others are living on their own. Her husband is a supervisor of a local entity. Her priority is to have more inventory for her business.  She has been selling pans, spoons, plates, bowls, cups for the past 10 years. She started with a small amount of capital which she received from her husband. She is requesting a loan to purchase more pans, plates, bowls, spoons, cups, and buckest for her business. Her plans are to educate her two younger children and build a house.

loans.use: to purchase more pans, plates, bowls, spoons, cups, and buckets for her business

loans.name: Erling Alexander

texts.es: Erling labora para una empresa de transporte desde hace varios años como conductor, es un joven trabajador,  responsable, con mucho deseo de superacion, Solicita 2do refinanciamiento para la compra de un solar que venden junto a su casa, espera aprovechar la oportunidad de mejorar su propiedad,  y asi brindar a su esposa y su hijo mejores condiciones de vida.  Su mayor sueño es que su hijo crezca sano y que estudie para ser una persona de bien.
texts.en: Erling is an employee of a transportation company, where he has been working as a driver form nay years. He is a responsible and hard-working young man with a great desire to get ahead in life. He is requesting his 2nd loan to buy a building lot close to his house, taking advantage of this opportunity to improve his property, thus granting better living conditions to his wife and child. His biggest dream is son enjoys and healthy growth and that he studies to become a respectable person.

loans.use: To buy some building land.

loans.name: Miguel Ángel

texts.es: Miguel Ángel de treinta y seis años de edad vive junto a su mama, su hermana y dos sobrinos; el posee un taller de enderezado y pintura  en el cual tiene diez años de experiencia, está orgulloso de su labor siempre trata que sea de la mejor calidad tiene mucha clientela pues los precios bajos y el servicio son excelentes; Miguel Ángel es un hombre dedicado a su labor pero sobre todo a su hogar, pues sabe que su familia es muy importante, sus tiempos de descanso los aprovecha en su vivienda, pues no hay como el hogar para disfrutar. Desde hace ya algún tiempo su casa necesita reparaciones como cambiar el techo, realizar pequeños repellos y poner balcones, por la época de lluvia quiere reparar lo más rápido posible para que su familia no tenga incomodidad, necesita de un capital de apoyo para invertir en los materiales por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar duralita, cemento, balcones, polines, etc. Miguel Ángel tiene buenas referencias de pago y es muy responsable, asegura que podrá cancelar la deuda y a la vez podrá darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Miguel Ángel, 36, lives with his mother, her sister and two nephews.  He has a car repair and paint shop; he has ten years’ experience and is proud of his work because he always tries to provide the best service.  He has a large clientele because prices are low and services are excellent.

Miguel Ángel is a man who is devoted to his work but above all to his home because he knows that his family is very important.  He uses his time off to make home improvements because there’s no place like home to enjoy.

For some time his house has needed some repairs like to have the roof replaced, to do some small plastering jobs and install balconies.  Because of the rains, he’d like to repair as soon as possible so that his family won’t be inconvenienced.  He needs support funds in order to buy the materials he needs so is asking INTEGRAL for a loan to buy Duralita [cardboard reinforced cement roofing], cement, balconies, metal roof beams, etc.

Miguel Ángel has good payment references and is very responsible; he assures that he’ll be able to repay the loan and at the same time provide his family with better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy building supplies.

loans.name: Ruth

texts.en: Ruth is 28 years old, married, and has four children between the ages of 3 and 11. All of her children attend school. Ruth works by selling items such as buckets, dish pans, slippers, blouses, and tubs. Her mother taught her to sell, and she has been doing this business for the past seven years. The biggest challenge Ruth faces is transporting the goods from Monrovia to Buchanan. She is requesting this loan to purchase more blouses, slippers, dish pans, and buckets to sell. Her business dream is to build a house for her children.

loans.use: to purchased more blouses, slippers, dish pans and buckets for her business.

loans.name: Victoria

texts.en:
victoria  is a 30-year-old businessman  who lives in Juba. she is married, and has 2 children between the ages of 2and 5. 1 goes to school. 
victoria  runs a general store, and she has been in business for 3 years. she heard about Finance Sudan through the loan officers promotion and she  is taking a loan of 3000
 SDG to purchase more goods.  

In 5 years, she wanted to open a big shop.
her  major challenges include high prices in the market. 

she is happy with kiva loans given to finance sudan.

loans.use: to purchase more items like sorghum, maize, dried cassava, and millet.

loans.name: Nosa Group

texts.en:
This group, called Nosa, consists of 4 women: Fathia, Amal, Sabah and Nosah. They live in Sana`a, Yemen. They took a loan of 180000 YER.
Sabah, pictured second from the left, is 38 years old and married with 6 children. She is hardworking and dedicated to her family, and through effort and dedication has managed to overcome adversity and get ahead. Sabah has a business selling perfumes, which she has been doing for 10 years. She applied for a loan of 50000 YER from AMB to buy perfumes for her business. Sabah is working toward increasing her income and hopes to one day own a big perfume store.

loans.use: to buy perfumes for her business.

loans.name: Benebe

texts.en: Benebe is 19 years old and lives in Buchanan, Liberia. She is a high school student and sells cosmetics in the local market so that she can afford to stay in school. Benebe started the business three years ago with the help of her oldest sister. She is requesting a loan to purchase more cosmetics for her business, and she plans to become a big business woman in the near future.

loans.use: to purchase more cosmetics to sell in the market.

loans.name: Mario Javier

texts.es: Mario Javier de cuarenta y seis años de edad vive junto a su compañera de  vida y su hijo; él se dedica a la compra y venta de lámina de hierro, tiene varios años con el negocio y le ha dejado buenos resultados, lo realiza de forma ambulante en su vehículo, tiene mucha clientela pues siempre quedan satisfechos  con los precios y con su gran amabilidad;  Mario es un hombre visionario  con muchas ganas de salir adelante, siempre aprovecha las oportunidades que se le presentan para poder alcanzar el éxito, quiere acrecentar el negocio y se dedicó a solicitarle  a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar lamina de hierro por mayor. Mario Javier tiene buenas referencias  de pago y es muy responsable tiene la certeza que podrá saldar la deuda y a la vez darle a la familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Mario Javier, 46, lives with his life companion and their son.  He buys and sells sheet metal; he’s been in business several years and it’s been quite profitable.  He does his work from place to place in his vehicle.  He has many customers because they are always satisfied with his prices and his great kindness.

Mario is a forward-looking man who very much wants to get ahead.  He always takes advantage of opportunities that arise to attain success.  He wants to enlarge the business so has asked INTEGRAL for a loan to buy sheet metal at wholesale.

Mario Javier has good payment references and is very responsible; he’s sure that he will be able to repay the loan and at the same time give his family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy sheet metal, cans and plastics to recycle.

loans.name: Anita

texts.en:
Anita is a farmer who lives in Lanna. She is married to a farmer, and they have a child in college. To support their family, Anita and her husband plant and harvest rice in their two-hectare field, which generates about PHP 20,000 twice a year (during harvest season). Anita would like to improve her income so she is now asking for a loan of PHP 48,000 to buy fertilizers and insecticides to use in farming.

Someday, Anita hopes to achieve more plentiful harvests in order to save funds for her child's school fees and to buy hogs to raise as an additional source of income. This will help boost her profits for the overall welfare of the family.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and insecticides to use in farming

loans.name: Rasha

texts.en:
Rasha is 35 years old and a married woman. Her husband serves in the military as he works in the public security directorate. They have a baby girl.

Rasha does a small business at home selling  blankets in winter only, but now she is working on expanding the business to include lighter bed sheets and covers that would suit spring and summer seasons. For that reason, she has applied to this loan to buy those products.

loans.use: to include selling lighter bed sheets and covers for summer

loans.name: Lili Siama

texts.en:
Lili siama is a 35-year-old business woman who lives in Juba. She is married and has three children between the ages of 4 and 15 years old. Two of the  children go to school. 

Siama runs a general store and has been in business for five years. She has no employees. She heard about Finance Sudan through other clients. She is taking a loan of 1500 SDG to purchase more goods.   

In 5 years, she wants to open many branches. 
Her major challenge includes inflation in the market.

loans.use: to buy beans , flour, onions etc.

loans.name: Olga Carmita

texts.es:
Olga Carmita tiene 34 años de edad es soltera tiene dos hijos,  vive con los padres en San Miguel de Bolívar.

Es integrante de la VRC PATRON SAN MIGUEL se encuentra ubicada en la comunidad Paila Loma Cantón San Miguel, a una distancia de 40 minutos a la oficina de la Cooperativa San José Agencia Chillanes, los socios se dedican a la agricultura y crianza de animales.

Olga Carmita se dedica a ala agricultura a la siembra de maíz, fréjol, mora además se dedica a la cría de ganado, cerdos. Solicita el crédito para comprar, semillas, urea, insecticidas, fertilizantes. Con la ayuda del crédito podrá comprar los fertilizantes que le hacen falta para los cultivos. Las compras y las ventas lo hace en San Pablo.

El sueño es poder ayudarles a los hijos a culminar los estudios. El sueño es poder ver televisión, salir de viaje, fiestas del patrón san Miguel, y las festividades del carnaval.
texts.en:
Olga Carmita is 34 years old, single, and has two children.  She lives with her parents in San Miguel de Bolívar.

Olga is a member of the Communal Bank “Patron San Miguel”, which is located in the community of Paila Loma in the canton of San Miguel.  This community is 40 minutes away from the Chillanes branch office of Cooperativa San José.  The members of this Communal Bank engage in agriculture and livestock breeding.  

Olga Carmita is a farmer who grows corn, beans, and blackberries.  In addition, she raises cattle and pigs.  Olga is requesting a loan in order to buy seeds, urea, insecticides, and fertilizers.  With the help of this loan, she will be able to buy the seeds and fertilizer that she needs.  Her purchases and sales are conducted in San Pablo.  Olga’s dream is to help her children finish their studies.  

In her free time, Olga enjoys watching television, traveling, celebrating the patron saint festivals of San Miguel, and celebrating the Carnival festivities.

loans.use: to purchase seeds, urea, insecticides, and fertilizers

loans.name: Joaquín

texts.es: Joaquín de cincuenta y tres años de edad  vive junto a sus tres hijos, él se dedica a la agricultura específicamente al cultivo de maíz, adicional a esto siembra chile, tomate, papaya trabaja en este rubro desde hace ya veintiséis años, tiene mucha experiencia  y para cada cultivo tiene la visión de una nueva siembra, está muy orgulloso de lo que ha logrado pues gracias a sus excelentes cosechas se ha hecho de mucha clientela, la gente lo  prefiere porque siempre tiene lo que necesitan con producto de calidad a precios accesibles además con un buen servicio; Joaquín es un hombre dedicado a su trabajo, busca las mejores oportunidades para así llegar al éxito; en esta temporada de siembra quiere aumentar la producción necesita invertir en insumos pero no posee de capital por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar semilla de maíz, frijol, fertilizante, y el pago de mano de obra. Joaquín tiene buenas referencias de credito y buena moral asegura que pagara la deuda y a la vez le dará a su familia una mejor vida.
texts.en:
Joaquín, 53, lives with his three children.  He works in agriculture, specifically growing corn; he also grows chilies, tomatoes and papaya.  He’s been in this line of work for 26 years and has much experience.  He has a plan for each new crop and is very proud of what he’s accomplished because thanks to his excellent harvests he’s acquired many customers.  People prefer him because he always has what they need: quality products at accessible prices with good service.

Joaquín is a man who is dedicated to his work; he looks for the best opportunities to attain success.  This planting season he wants to increase production and needs to invest in supplies but lacks the capital to do so which is why he’s asking INTEGRAL for a loan to buy corn and bean seeds, fertilizer and to pay labor costs.  Joaquín has good credit references and good morals; he assures that he will repay the loan and give his family a better life at the same time.

loans.use: to buy seeds, farm supplies and to pay labor costs.

loans.name: Dani

texts.en:
Dani, 33 years old and a single guy, has five brothers and sisters. 

Dani has an office supplies shop where he sells what you need whether you are an employee or a student.

Dani has applied for this loan in order to buy more stationery items for the shop.

loans.use: to buy more stationery items for the shop.

loans.name: Neomi

texts.en: Noemi lives in Compound #3, Liberia, and is 37 years old. She is married and has three children: two are in school and the oldest is out of high school. For the past 10 years she has been selling rice and oil in the market. She makes a profit because she has many customers, and she uses the profit to buy more rice and oil to improve the business and to help sustain her family. Neomi is requesting a loan to purchase more rice and oil for the business. Her future plans are to educate her children and to build a house.

loans.use: to purchase rice and oil.

loans.name: Alia

texts.en:
Alia is 50 years old and a married woman. Her husband is a driver; they both are caring for two daughters and one son.

To help her husband in supporting the family and improve their living conditions, Alia does two types of business, both at home; one is making yogurt while the other is selling clothes and blankets and sometimes accessories (depending on the availability of the products).

Now Alia wants to support her second business as she has found out that there is more demand for it, so she has applied for this loan in order to expand and get more variety of goods such as clothes and accessories to increase her revenue that will allow her to expand more in the future.

loans.use: to expand and get more variety of goods such as clothes and accessories

loans.name: Felipe  Adan

texts.es: Felipe  Adán, vive junto a su esposa y sus tres hijos quienes se dedican a estudiar. Felipe como todo padre de familia responsable se dedica al trabajo que aprendió de sus padres, ya que él trabaja como agricultor, sembrando maíz y frijoles, los cuales con mucho entusiasmo e ilusión lleva a vender al mercado de pueblo en el que reside. Así mismo se dedica a la crianza de pollos, trabajo en el que su esposa y sus hijos le ayudan con actividades como alimentar a los animales y ver que estén en un lugar adecuado para su sano crecimiento. Felipe solicita un préstamo a INTEGRAL, por medio del cual pueda comprar mayor cantidad de semillas y de frijoles y maíz y así aumentar el porcentaje de ganancias, también invertirá en la compra de gallos y gallinas para reproducir la cantidad de pollos que cría y hacer crecer su granja de aves. Esto llena de mucha alegría a Felipe  ya que le permitirá contar con un mejor futuro.
texts.en: Felipe Adán lives together with his wife and his three children who are all in school.  Felipe is a responsible father who carries out work he learned from his parents.  He works as a farmer, growing corn and beans which he sells in the town market with a great deal of enthusiasm.  He also raises chickens.  His wife and children help him with his tasks such as feeding the animals and making sure that they are in a suitable place for their healthy growth.  Felipe is requesting a loan from INTEGRAL to buy a larger quantity of bean and corn seeds so that he can increase his profits.  He will also invest in buying chickens and hens so that he can increase the number of chickens that he raises and thereby grow his farm.  This fills Felipe with a lot of happiness as it will allow him to enjoy a better future.

loans.use: to buy corn and bean seed

loans.name: Mario

texts.en:
Mario is 44 years old. He lives in the small village of San Sebastian. He is married to Norma, and they have been blessed with three children. Mario's youngest child is the only one who goes to school, while the other two are married and living with them. 

Mario has cultivated his two hectares of rice fields for 20 years. He is glad because his wife is supportive in performing some easy farming activities, enabling them to economize their expenses by not hiring laborers to do these tasks.

Mario requested a loan of PHP 20,000, which he will use to buy farm supplies to improve his farmland. The couple hopes to get a larger harvest this next crop season. Mario believes that this loan will increase his sales of rice and provide for all the needs of his family. Most especially, he wants to educate his youngest child because it's the only inheritance Mario can give him.

loans.use: to buy farm supplies to improve his farmland

loans.name: Nelson

texts.en:
Nelson is 48 years old and has one infant child. He is a hard-working man, growing rice crops in his community of San Sebastian. He has been in this business for ten years.

Nelson would like to take out for a loan of PHP 20,000 to purchase a sack of rice seed and manure for fertilizer. With this loan, he would be able to improve his crop production. He hopes that he can expand his farming business to be able to earn more income to save for the education of his only child. In addition, he hopes to improve their standard of living.

loans.use: to purchase a sack of rice seed and manure for fertilizer

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy maize flour, millet, cooking oil and other items

loans.name: Zoila Mirian

texts.es: Zoila Mirian de cuarenta y tres años de edad vive junto a sus hijos, ella posee una tienda donde vende artículos de primera necesidad, granos básicos, pan, leche, jabón, entre otros, adicional a esto vende tamales dos días a las semana, tiene varios años de trabajar en su negocio y le ha dado muy buenos resultados, está ubicado en un lugar muy estratégico y se ha hecho de mucha clientela que la prefiere porque siempre tiene lo que necesitan con producto de calidad y aprecios accesibles además el servicio es excelente; Zoila es una mujer emprendedora con muchas ganas de salir adelante siempre está a la expectativa de nuevas oportunidades que le permitan demostrarse a sí mismo que puede llegar al éxito con trabajo duro y dedicación; la demanda ha aumentado por eso necesita invertir más en productos para no decepcionar a los clientes por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar granos básicos, pan, golosinas, producto instantáneo, jabones etc. Zoila tiene buenas referencias  de pago y es muy responsable tiene la certeza que podrá pagar la deuda y a la vez darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Zoila Mirian, 43, lives with her children. She has a store where she sells basic staple items, basic grains, bread, milk and soap, among others.  In addition to this she also sells tamales two days a week.  She’s been working in her business many years and it’s given her good results.  She’s located in a very strategic spot and has acquired a good clientele that prefer her because she always meets their needs with quality products and accessible prices, besides service is excellent.

Zoila is an enterprising woman who very much wants to get ahead and is always alert to new opportunities that will prove to her that she’s able to attain success with hard work and dedication.

Demand has increased so she needs to invest in more products in order not to disappoint her customers which is why she’s asking INTEGRAL for a loan to buy basic grains, bread, snacks, instant products, soap, etc.

Zoila has good payment references and is very responsible.  She is sure that she will be able to repay the loan while at the same time giving her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy stock merchandise for her store.

loans.name: Manahi

texts.en:
Manahi is 45 years old and a conservative married woman. For that reason, she has asked her husband to take her place in the photo.

After his retirement, Manahi’s husband started working in a private company to be able to continue supporting the family. Manahi, on the other hand, decided to help him to support their six children, so she established a small barn where she has rabbits, chickens, and other types of animals that are not available for sale elsewhere in her neighborhood. 

Manahi has applied to this loan to improve the barn rooms that she has so she can include a larger number of animals of each type and buy more food for the animals.

loans.use: to improve the barn rooms

loans.name: Ikhlas

texts.en:
Ikhlas, 42 years old and a single lady, has three younger brothers but she lives by herself.

Ikhlas started a small trading business at home to be able to support herself financially, so she went to the wholesale market and free zone market to bring in different types of goods such as cosmetic products, clothes, lingerie and make up products. 

She is now looking to add selling home products mainly kitchenware to have a variety of goods that will satisfy most of her female customers, and for that she has applied for this loan.

loans.use: to add selling home products, mainly kitchenware

loans.name: María Herminia

texts.es: María Herminia vive con su compañero de vida que trabaja como taxista y sus dos hijos mayores de edad uno de 21 y otro de 30 años, éste último colabora con los gastos del hogar ya que es empleado. María es una persona alegre comprometida con su trabajo, desde hace 3 años posee una tienda ubicada en su casa gracias a la que contribuye con los gastos de la misma, el menor de sus hijos le ayuda en su negocio, ella es muy emprendedora. Necesita más producto para surtir la tienda como huevos, leche, cereales, pastas dentales y llegar hacer una de las mas grandes tiendas de la zona es por eso que solicita la ayuda a INTEGRAL  para llegar a concretar su sueño de surtir la tienda con productos de primera necesidad y está segura que las ventas aumentarán, así logrará pagar el prestamo acordado y espera darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.-
texts.en:
María Herminia lives with her life companion who works as a taxi driver and their two adult children, a 21-year-old and a 30-year-old the latter of which is employed and helps with household expenses.

María is a cheerful person who is committed to her work.  She’s had a home-based grocery store for the last three years thanks to which she contributes to household expenses.  Her youngest child helps her with the store; she is very enterprising.  

She needs more products with which to stock her store like eggs, milk, cereal and toothpaste in order to become one of the area’s largest stores which is why she’s asking INTEGRAL for a loan to make her dream of stocking her store with basic staple items a reality.  

She is sure that sales will increase so she’ll be able to repay the loan; she also hopes to give her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy stock merchandise for her store.

loans.name: Otim John

texts.en:
Otim is a 35-year-old businesswoman who lives in Juba. She is married and has four children between the ages of 4 and 12 years old. Otim runs a general store and has been in business for five years. She has no employees. She heard about Finance Sudan through promotion by the loan officers  and she is taking a loan of 700 SDG to purchase more goods.

In five years, she wants to open a big shop. She hopes to employ more people.

Her major challenges include inflation in the market and high prices.
 
She is happy that Finance Sudan is giving her a loan.

loans.use: to buy water, soda, soap  etc

loans.name: Amal

texts.en:
Amal is 50 years old and a housewife; her husband is a private distributer. They still have five sons and daughters living with them.

Amal is starting a clothing sales business at home. She got a few pieces of clothing and sold them, and now she wants to increase the quantity of clothes. For that reason, she has applied for this loan.

loans.use: to bring in more clothes to sell

loans.name: Al-Raja Group

texts.en:
This group is called Al-Raja and consists of 5 members: Royda, Arzag, Saly, Raja and Rina. They live in Aden, Yemen. They are working hard so that they can achieve their goals. 

Raja is 43 years old and is the president of the group. (She is the woman who has a handbag in this photo.) She sells clothes, perfumes and other items. She says that she began with a small business and, thanks to sacrifice and daily hard work, has been able to grow and continually improve her business. 

Raja is asking for a loan of 100,000 YER from AMB to purchase ladies' clothes such as pants, blouses, and skirts, as well as perfumes and incenses in order to be able to continue her business. She hopes to one day run a clothing shop.

loans.use: to purchase perfumes, incense, and ladies clothes such as pants, blouses, and skirts.

loans.name: Sarah

texts.en: Sarah is 45 and lives in Compound #3, Liberia, with her husband and four children, all of whom are in school. For the past seven years, Sarah has sold rice in her community. She makes a good profit because the nearest market is far away. Sarah started her business with financial help from her husband and learned to sell from her mother. She is requesting a loan to purchase more rice for her business. Sarah's future plans are to expand her business and eventually build a house.

loans.use: to purchase rice.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy iron sheets, cement, nails, etc

loans.name: Gulbahor

texts.ru: Гулбахор молодая и  независимая девушка. В протяжении пяти лет она работает в ботаническом  саду.  Она всегда  любила ухаживать за цветами  и деревьями. Можно сказать, что это больше её хобби, а не работа. После работы, когда она возвращается домой, она мечтает увидеть свой дом таким же красивым. К сожалению,  сейчас она видеть только то,  что  срочно нужно проводит косметические работы и оживить дом. Гулбахор  хочет,  взять  займ с вашей  помощью, чтобы осуществить свои давние мечты.
texts.en: Gulbahor is a young and independent woman.  She has been working at a botanical garden for five years.  She has always loved to take care of flowers and trees.  It can be said that this is more of her hobby than work.  After work, when she returns home, she dreams of seeing her home just as beautiful.  Unfortunately, now she can see only the things that need immediate renovation work, and that the home needs be brought to life.  Gulbahor wants to obtain a loan with your help to make her dreams come true.

loans.use: to renovate her house

loans.name: Hanan

texts.en:
Hanan, 47 years old, is a housewife caring for three sons and two daughters. 

To help in improving their living conditions, Hanan started buying and selling home products at her house. She recently added selling clothes, too. Now she has applied for this loan to get more goods to increase her inventory.

loans.use: to get more goods to sell: home products and clothes

loans.name: Efrén De Jesus

texts.es:
Efrén anteriormente trabajaba en las labores del campo en un municipio, donde tenía organizada toda su vida con su familia y así podían tener una buena calidad de vida, pero por circunstancias de la violencia se vio en la obligación de dejar todo a un lado y así llegó a la ciudad en busca de mejores oportunidades económicas y sociales para progresar con su familia. Hace 25 años que dejó su municipio y llego a la ciudad comenzó vendiendo frutas de manera ambulante, después comenzó a vender mercancía y por último, desde hace unos 12 años aproximadamente, montó un local de venta de calzado con el que ha podido generar ingresos para su hogar y así poder tener una buena calidad de vida con su familia. El negocio lo ha logrado sacar adelante y poco a poco ha venido incrementando sus ventas; y ahora que se acerca la temporada donde sus ventas se aumentan considerablemente, Efrén requiere de un préstamo para comprar algunas referencias de calzado que ya se han ido agotando.

De esta manera podrá tener bien abastecido su negocio para la temporada y podrá ofrecer una buena variedad de productos a sus clientes, lo que le garantizará tener muy buenas ventas en su negocio y así ingresos para su hogar. Su mayor sueño es llegar a tener un gran negocio donde pueda generar empleo para las personas que han tenido que atravesar por sus mismas circunstancias y que también este negocio le permita vivir más tranquilamente, con mejores oportunidades económicas y una mejor calidad de vida en su hogar.
texts.en:
Efren was previously a farmworker in his town, where he organized his whole family life and had a good quality of life.  But because of violence in the area, he saw the need to leave all of this and so he arrived in the city to seek better economic and social opportunities for progress with his family.  He left that town 25 years ago, and when he arrived in the city he began selling fruit in an itinerant manner.  Later, he began to sell merchandise, and lately, for the past 12 years, he has had his own business selling shoes.  With this business, he has been able to generate income for his household and have a better quality of life with his family.  He has managed to make progress with his business, gradually increasing his sales.  Now the season is approaching when his sales tend to increase considerably.  He needs a loan to buy some models of footwear that he has been running out of.

In this way, he can have a well-stocked business for the upcoming season, and he will be able to offer a good variety of products to his customers.  This will guarantee him very good sales in his business, and a good income for his household.  His main dream is to develop his business into a big business where he could generate employment for the people who have had to go through similar circumstances.  He also dreams that this business
 will allow him to live more tranquilly, with better economic opportunities and a better quality of life in his home.

loans.use: to buy some models of shoes that he has been running out of

loans.name: Juan Alberto

texts.es: Juan Alberto vive con su esposa en una casa muy humilde propia, es una persona emprendedora con deseos de salir adelante, con su esposa poseen un negocio de venta de quesadillas y productos helados como, sorbete, choco bananos, paletas y charamuscas. Pero Juan se dedica a la sastrería confecciona pantalones, camisas para hombre en la zona donde reside es muy conocido por alegre, optimista y trabajador, El necesita complementar todos los insumos que se necesitan para la costura hacer cambios en su máquina de coser entre otros es por eso que solicita a INTEGRAL un prestamos en el cual lo invertirá en su negocio comprando telas al costo, agujas, algunos repuestos como carretes, cuchillas entre otros para perfeccionar las costuras y así ayudar a su esposa en el negocio y los dos salir adelante como personas emprendedoras.
texts.en:
Juan Alberto lives with his wife in a very humble abode of his own.  He is an enterprising person who very much wants to get ahead.  He and his wife have a business selling quesadillas and frozen treats like popsicles, chocolate-covered bananas, sorbets and ‘charamuscas’ [frozen fruit juice].  

However, Juan is also a tailor; he makes men’s pants and shirts.  He’s well-known in the area where he lives for being very cheerful, optimistic and hardworking.

He needs to stock up on the sewing supplies he needs and to make some changes on his sewing machine among other things which is why he’s asking INTEGRAL for a loan to invest in his business buying such things as fabric at cost, needles and some spare parts like bobbins and blades among others to fine-tune his work thus helping his wife in the business and both of them in order to get ahead as entrepreneurs.

loans.use: to buy sewing supplies.

loans.name: Aryemo Otti

texts.en:
Aryemo Otti is a 35-year-old businesswoman who lives in Juba. She is married and has four children between the ages of 4 and 12, two of whom go to school. 

Aryemo runs a general store and has been in business for three years. She has no employees. She heard about Finance Sudan through other clients  and she is taking a loan of 700 SDG to purchase more goods.  

In five years, she wants to send all her children to school.  She hopes to expand her business.

Her major challenges include inflation in the market. 

She is happy to have the Finance Sudan service.

loans.use: to buy soda, water, soap. etc

loans.name: Afa Margret

texts.en:
Afa Margret is a 38-year-old businesswoman who lives in Juba. She is married and has three children between the ages of 4 and 11, two of whom go to school. 

Afa runs a general store and has been in business for three years. She has no employees. She heard about Finance Sudan through other clients and she is taking a loan of 700 SDG to purchase more goods. 

In five years, she wants to build a house and expand her business.

Her major challenges include high prices in the market.

loans.use: to buy soda, water, soap, etc

loans.name: Nadiah Group

texts.en:
This group is called Nadiah and it is made up of four women: Saeedh, Afrah, Nadiah and Nour,  who are natives of Aden, Yemen. They applied for a loan of 180,000 YER.

One of the members of this group is Nadiah, who is 38 years old. She has had a business selling incense, perfumes and ladies' clothes. She is a married woman and has five children who live in Aden, Yemen.  She says that she started her business by making incense at home till she was able to sell it to her customers around her area. She realized that her business was profitable and she set out to invest more in it. Now she is applying for a loan of 30,000 YER from AMB to buy perfumes and incense for her business. She hopes to have a clothing shop to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy perfumes and incense for her business

loans.name: Noel Soka

texts.en:
Noel is a 35-year-old businessman who lives in Juba. He is married and has three children between the ages of 4 and 12. One of his children goes to school. 

Noel runs a dressing making supply business and has been in business for six years. He has no employees. He heard about Finance Sudan through other clients and he is taking a loan of 2,000 SDG to purchase more goods.   

In five years, he wants to open a manufacturing service. He hopes to employ more people.

His major challenges include inflation in the market.

loans.use: to buy more dressmaking materials

loans.name: Comelio Simon

texts.en:
Comelio Simon is a 38-year-old businesswoman who lives in Juba. She is married and has two children between the ages of 9 and 12 years old, two of whom go to school. 

Comelio runs a general store and has been in business for two years. She has no employees. She heard about Finance Sudan through other clients and she is taking a loan of 700 SDG to purchase more goods. 

In five years, she wants to build a house. She hopes to expand her business.

Her major challenges include inflation in the market. 

She is happy for Finance Sudan's service.

loans.use: to buy groundnuts, soda, water, etc

loans.name: Anek Tom

texts.en:
AnekmTom is a 37-year-old businesswoman who lives in Juba. She is married and has three children between the ages of 3 and 10, two of whom go to school. 

Anek runs a general store and has been in business for three years. She has no employees. She heard about Finance Sudan through other clients and she is taking a loan of 700 SDG to purchase more goods.  

In five years, she wants to build a house.

Her major challenges include high prices in the market.

loans.use: to buy soda, water, soap etc

loans.name: Adriano

texts.en:
With his determination to succeed and easily provide for his family needs, Adriano has engaged himself in the retailing business. He sells a variety of accessories like sunglasses, flashlights, hats and mirrors in the public market. 

Adriano is married and blessed with six children. His children are all in school. His wife is his partner in managing their business. Adriano dreams of maintaining and developing the business to gain a higher income. He plans to sell other products for an additional source of income.

Adriano decided to take out a loan of PHP 50,000 to buy school supplies, radio cassettes and "radio bass". He hopes to proceed with his plan and earn additional income.

loans.use: to buy school supplies, radio cassettes and "radio bass".

location.town: San Pedro San Pablo, Aurora, Isabela

loans.name: Blelin Otoo

texts.en:
Blelin Otoo is a 36-year-old businesswoman who lives in Juba. She is married and has three children between the ages of 4 and 12 years old, two of whom go to school. 

Blelin runs a general store and has been in business for three years. She has no employees. She heard about Finance Sudan through other clients and she is taking a loan of 700 SDG to purchase more goods.

In five years, she wants to build a house.

Her major challenges include inflation in the market. 

She is happy for Finance Sudan's service.

loans.use: to buy groundnuts, water, soda, and bananas

loans.name: Zamira

texts.ru: Замира женщина в возрасте 30 лет.Она мать 3 детей.Ее вид деятельности заключается в том что она продает национальные лепешки и хлебобулочные изделия на рынке.Этот бизнес дает хороший доход.Занимаясь этим она решила сама тоже печь лепешки.Рано утром сама печет лепешки  затем идет на хлебобулочный цех за свежими булочками.Свои лепешки она сдает в местные столовые а хлебобулочные изделия продает на рынке.Эти виды деятельности ей очень нравятся.На полученный кредит она хочет приобрести несколько мешков муки.
texts.en: Zamira is a 30 year-old woman.  She is a mother of three children.  Her type of business is selling national flatbread and baked goods at a market.  This business brings in a good income.  Being involved in this business for a while, Zamira decided to bake flatbread herself.  She bakes flatbread early in the mornings and then goes to a bakery for other fresh baked goods.  She sells her flatbread to the local cafes and sells other baked goods at a market.  She likes this type of business very much.  Zamira wants to use this loan to purchase several bags of flour.

loans.use: to buy several bags of flour

loans.name: Dite Dama Group

texts.fr: Agé de 43ans, Mr Ibrahim est  jardinier de profession. Il est marié à une revendeuse, ils sont bénis de Dieu et ont 08 enfants dont 04 scolarisés. Le premier a 19ans et le dernier 2ans 5mois. Depuis 2000, il exerce son activité de jardinier en REGION CENTRALE et s’approvisionne dans les villes environnantes. Il est à son troisième  crédit de WAGES et sollicite ce prêt pour acheter des outils de travail. Il a été nommé par les autres membres du groupe pour être responsable de leur association qui a pour nom « DITE-DAMA » c’est un groupement constitué que d’hommes qui ont consacré leur vie à la culture du sol et tous cultivent du piment et des tomates. Ils veulent épargner, construire un logement pour rendre leurs familles dans de bonnes conditions. Ils souhaitent augmenter leurs superficies afin d’avoir de bons rendements et dans l’avenir  exporter leurs produits à l’étranger.
texts.en: At 43 years old, Mr. Ibrahim is a professional gardener. He is married to a retailer. They are blessed by God and have 8 children, 4 of whom attend school. The oldest is 19 years old, and the youngest is 2 years and 5 months old. Since 2000, he has been in gardening in the central region and stocks up in neighboring cities. He is on his third loan from WAGES and is seeking a loan to buy tools. He was named by the other members of his group to be the leader of their association named DITE-DAMA, which is a group consisting of men who have devoted their lives to cultivating the soil, all of whom grow peppers and tomatoes. They would like to save up and build housing to put their families in better conditions. They hope to increase their acreage in order to have good yields, and in the future, they would like to export their products abroad.

loans.use: to buy tools

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy corn and bean seeds, fertilizer and herbicide.

loans.name: Suzan Steven

texts.en:
Suzan is a 28-year-old businesswoman who lives in Nimule. She is married and has two children between the ages of two and six, one of whom goes to school. 

Suzan runs a beauty salon and has been in business for two years. She has one employee. She heard about Finance Sudan through other clients and she is taking a loan of 1,600 SDG to purchase more goods.  

In five years, she wants to increase her stock.

Her major challenges include high prices in the market.

She is happy to take a loan from Finance Sudan.
