The next person sitting down is her client in the salon.

loans.use: to buy weaves, hair oil, chemicals, etc

loans.name: Khushvakht

texts.ru: Хушвахт трудолюбивый и добрый человек. Он женат и на воспитании имеет шестерых детей. Более 6 лет он занимается купле- продажей крупного рогатого скота. Он содержит скот дома и имеет все условия для откорма и выращивания скота. Его заботливая жена помогает ему в бизнесе, и они усердно работают ради светлого будущего своих детей. Хушвахт хотел бы получить займ для покупки скота с целью пополнения оборотного капитала с целью расширения бизнеса. Он надеется на вашу доброту и помощь.
texts.en: Khushvakht is a hardworking and kind person.  He is married and raising six children.  He has been involved in buying and selling cattle for over six years.  He keeps livestock at home and has all of the necessary conditions for feeding and raising livestock.  His caring wife helps him with the business, and they work hard to provide a bright future for their children.  Khushvakht wants to obtain this loan to buy livestock in order to refill his working capital and expand his business.  He relies on your kindness and help.

loans.use: to buy cattle

loans.name: Juan José

texts.es: Juan José es apicultor y posee una venta de miel, tiene experiencia en el rubro  y siempre obtiene la mejor miel de gran calidad, comercia en todas las zonas aledañas a localidad y ya tiene mucha clientela pues todo lo que vende es a buenos precios y con un servicio inigualable; Juan José es un hombre emprendedor dispuestos a superarse y a buscar todas las oportunidades que le permitan llegar al éxito, su más grande secreto son la constancia y el amor a su labor;  quiere acrecentar el negocio pero necesita de apoyo de capital para invertir por eso solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar materia prima: laminas, madera, rejilla para el mantenimiento del apiario. Juan José tiene muy buen record crediticio es muy responsable pero sobre todo honesto y confiable, asegura que podrá saldar el financiamiento en el periodo establecido y a la vez podrá ofrecerle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Juan Jose is a beekeeper and he has a business selling honey.  He has experience in this line of work, and he always gets the best quality honey.  He sells in all of the areas surrounding his town, and he already has a lot of customers, because he sells everything at good prices with unparalleled service.  Juan Jose is an enterprising man who is ready to succeed, and who is on the lookout for all opportunities that will allow him to become successful.  His biggest secret is his perseverance and love of his work.  He wants to expand his business, but he needs support with capital to invest, and so he is requesting a loan from INTEGRAL that will allow him to buy supplies and materials (sheets of corrugated metal, wood and racks) to maintain his apiary.  Juan Jose has a very good credit record; he is responsible, but above all, is honest and reliable.  He is certain that he will be able to pay off the loan over the established schedule, and at the same time offer his family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy sheets of corrugated metal, wood and racks for his apiary

loans.name: Dolores

texts.en:
Dolores, age 46, runs a store selling a variety of merchandise. She and her husband Jaime have four children. She is a happy, enthusiastic and hard-working person who makes every effort to provide for the family's needs. Dolores did not finish her studies due to lack of financial resources.Her experiences push her to strive hard in order to secure the well-being and future of her four children.

Dolores has been running her store for 20 years. Aside from this business, she is also engaged in a livestock and farming business. According to her, the profit gained from her farming and livestock was used to secure the education of two of her children who have just finished their degree courses. She is really blessed and thankful to God because she has been given the knowledge, skills, and strength to face trials in life.

Dolores repaid her previous loan and is now asking for a new loan in the amount of PhP 30,000. She will use this loan to buy a variety of items to offer for sale in her store.She believes that she can continue to improve her business through continuous access to financial services from Kiva lenders through ASKI. She is hopeful that children will complete their education and strives to give her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy merchandise for her general store

loans.name: Lucena

texts.en:
Lucena, age 58 and widowed, raises hogs to earn a living. She lives in the village of Luzon. Being a single parent is very difficult, but Lucena brings her best efforts to lifting up her children from poor living conditions. This what what motivated Lucena to involve herself in managing a hog-raising business. 

As of now, Lucena is requesting a loan in the amount of PhP 15,000 in order to buy feed, vaccines, and vitamins to ensure the proper growth of her hogs. She is confident that through her loan, she will be able to sustain the needs of her hogs.

loans.use: to buy feed, vaccine and vitamins for the proper growth of her hogs

loans.name: Merlita

texts.en:
Merlita is a married mother of three children, two of whom are already married, while the third is working. Merlita, who has been growing and selling rice since 1986, is requesting a loan of PHP 27,000 to purchase sacks of fertilizers and insecticides to improve her rice crop production. She believes that she can keep producing good crops that will enable her to earn larger profits. In this way, she will improve their standard of living and save some money for emergency purposes.

Merlita hopes to have more farmland someday.

loans.use: to buy sacks of fertilizers and insecticides to improve her rice crop production.

loans.name: Bovochon

texts.ru: Бовочон молодой энергичный человек, который занимается оптовой продажей арбузов и помидоров.Товар привозит из города Душанбе на грузовом автомобиле и продаёт оптом торговцам рынка.Он женат и имеет шестерых детей, жена конечно же домохозяйка и занимается воспитанием детей.Бовочон текущий кредит хочет использовать на увеличение завоза товара, в данный момент арбузов и дыни. А полученную прибыль хочет потратить на ремонт дома, установку пластиковых окон, перед наступлением холодной зимы. На снимке Бовочон в день выдачи, а т.к. он оптовик , то около товара его запечатлеть не возможно из-за быстрого отъезда в Душанбе за товаром.
texts.en: Bovochon is a young and energetic person, who is involved in a wholesale sale of watermelons and tomatoes.  He brings the products from the city of Dushanbe on a truck and sells them wholesale to sellers at a market.  Bovochon is married and has six children, and his wife is obviously a homemaker, who takes care of the children.  He wants to use this loan to increase the volume of products that he brings in, which at this time would be watermelons and cantaloupes.  And he wants to use the resulting profit to repair his home by installing plastic windows prior to the onset of a cold winter.  The photograph shows Bovochon on the day of loan disbursement, but because he is a wholesaler, he could not be captured in front of his products due to his necessity to quickly depart to Dushanbe for products.

loans.use: to purchase more products

loans.name: Djiguène Bakhna 13 Group

texts.fr:
Djiguène  Bakhna 13 est une association de développement regroupant 5 membres s’activant dans la vente de fruits et de produits halieutiques.Elle est située à environ 22 km de la ville principale et est dirigée par Mme Djieynaba maiée et mère de famille.
Mme Djieynaba achète et revende des fruits selon les périodes depuis plus de 10 ans, elle demande ce crédit pour acheter et revendre ces fruits (mangue, clémentine, orange).Ce crédit lui permettra aussi de diversifier les produits en faisant l’achat et la revente de l’huile de palme.
Les bénéfices qu’elle aura  lui permettront d’aider son mari aux besoins de la maison.Ell a l’ambition d’avoir as propre boutique pour élargir son activité.
texts.en: Djiguène  Bakhna 13 is a development group with five members who sell fruits and fishing products. It is about 22 km from the main city and is led by Mrs. Djieynaba, who is a married mother. Mrs. Djieynaba has been buying and reselling seasonal fruits for more than 10 years. She is seeking this loan to buy and resell these fruits (mangoes, tangerines, oranges). This loan will also allow her to diversify her products by buying and reselling palm oil. The profits that she will gain will allow her to help her husband with household expenses. She hopes to one day have her own shop to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy seasonal fruit (mangoes, watermelon, tangerines) and fishing products

loans.name: Nelson

texts.es: Nelson de treinta y ocho años de edad  vive  junto a su compañera de vida, él se dedica al cultivo de maíz y maicillo y tiene varios años de trabajar en la agricultura tiene mucha experiencia y eso le ha permitido obtener las mejores cosechas, el terreno está ubicado en una zona de alta incidencia agrícola, comercia en todas las zonas aledañas a la localidad y ya tiene mucha clientela fiel que la prefiere porque siempre tiene lo que necesitan con producto de calidad y a precio accesible además el servicio es excelente; Nelson es un hombre dedicado a su labor siempre dispuesto a buscar oportunidades para alcanzar el éxito, quiere aumentar la producción e invertir en insumos pero necesita de capital por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar semilla de maíz, frijol, fertilizante, insecticida, herramienta, etc. Nelson tiene buenas referencias de pago y es muy responsable asegura que podrá saldar el financiamiento y a la vez darle una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Nelson, 38, lives with his life companion.  He grows corn and sorghum.  He’s been working in agriculture for several years and has much experience which has allowed him to obtain better harvests.  His parcel of land is located in a zone with intense agricultural activity.  He sells in adjoining areas and has a regular clientele that prefers him because he always has what they need: quality products at affordable prices and service is excellent besides.

Nelson is a person who is committed to his work; he’s always ready to seek opportunities to attain success.  He wants to increase production and invest in supplies but needs capital which is why he’s asking INTEGRAL for a loan to buy corn and bean seeds, fertilizer, insecticide, tools, etc.  Nelson has good payment references and is very responsible.  He’s sure he will be able to repay the loan at the same time as giving his family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy seeds, farm supplies and tools.

loans.name: Josephine

texts.en:
Josephine, age 48, raises hogs to be fattened and eventually offered for sale. She manages her business while her husband is busy in their rice field. Between the two of them, they are able to support her two children in their studies. With the help and support of her husband, Josephine has become confident in running her business successfully. From the profits she earns from her business, Josephine is able to help provide for the family's daily necessities and strives to improve their standard of living. 

Josephine has paid back her previous loan and is now requesting another loan in the amount of PhP 20,000, which she will use to buy hog feed and vitamins for her three hogs. She is hopeful that her requested loan funds will help her meet her life goals. In addition, she is grateful for the continuous access of financial services available to her from Kiva lenders through ASKI so that she can continue to ensure the proper growth of her hogs. As a result, she is able to offer her hogs to buyers at higher prices.

Through the generated income from her business, she intends to build savings toward ensuring a bright future of her children.

loans.use: to buy hog feed and vitamins for her three hogs

loans.name: Anna

texts.en:
Anna, age 23, is a beekeeper. She has been involved in this business for four years and now keeps 15 bee colonies. She sells the honey in Kapan city, where this product is in big demand.
 
Anna would like to purchase more bee colonies and expand her farm. She also wants to purchase hives in which to keep the bees, but currently does not have enough funds. This loan will help Anna to purchase more bee colonies and hives, which will mean more gathered honey and additional income from its sale.

Anna lives in Kapan city with her uncle. The house where they live needs to be renovated. Developing her beekeeping business is important for Anna, allowing her to earn more income, complete the house renovation, and foster better living conditions.

loans.use: to pay for 10 bee colonies and 11 hives

loans.name: Djiguéne Bakhna 34 Group

texts.fr:
Djiguène bakhna 34 est un groupement mixte composé de 5 membres et est situé à environ 22 km de la ville principale.Ce groupement s’active sur la vente de fruits, il est dirigé par Mme Fatou marié et mère de famille.
Mme Fatou achète et revend des fruits et légumes depuis plus de 10 ans. Elle demande ce crédit pour acheter et revendre ces mêmes produits. 
Les bénéfices qu’elle aura lui permettront d’aider son mari à la scolarisation de leurs enfants et à la dépense quotidienne.
Mme Fatou veut un jour avoir son propre magasin de vente.
texts.en: Djiguène Bakhna 34 is a mixed group with 5 members located about 22 km from the main city. This group sells fruits and is led by Mrs. Fatou, a married mother. Mrs. Fatou has been buying and reselling fruit and vegetables for more than 10 years. She is seeking a loan to buy and resell more of these products. The profits that she will have will allow her to help her husband to send their children to school and with daily expenses. Mrs. Fatou would one day like to have her own store.

loans.use: to buy various food products (palm oil, dried fish) and fruit to resell

loans.name: Margret

texts.en:
Margret is a 41-year-old married woman with three children living in Kasese, Uganda. For the past seven years she has sold poultry; she also sells clothes on the side. With her profits she has been able to pay school fees for her children. A shortage of money for chicken feed, price fluctuations and inflation challenge her.

Margret is requesting a 1,200,000 UGX loan from HOFOKAM to buy feed for her poultry. Her goals include educating her children and building a permanent home while expanding her poultry business into new markets.

loans.use: to buy feed for her poultry.
